Outdoor enthusiasts can now do more with less by using just one lightweight bag to protect their gear from the elements, compress down bulky items like jackets and sleeping bags, and even wash their clothing and themselves, absolutely anywhere. 

Keeping gear protected from rain and dry at the beach, the stealth pack is the ideal backpack for travellers. At night, it can be used to wash clothing in just minutes, saving money while reducing luggage size. The Scrubba stealth pack can also be used as a convenient carry-on bag, or can be packed down small thanks to the compression function.

A durable, weatherproof backpack spacious enough to accommodate daily essentials and most laptop sizes, the stealth pack is ideal for commuters who are routinely exposed to the elements.  
1 pack | 4 stealth functions | No limits

 
Key features of the Scrubba stealth pack

 
Weatherproof function - keep gear dry

The 40 denier, TPU coated nylon fabric works in conjunction with the weatherproof seal to protect your gear from whatever the elements - or your adventures - might throw at it.
 
Washing machine function - wash clothes anywhere

Equipped with our signature flexible, internal washboard, the stealth pack is able to provide a machine-quality wash anywhere in just minutes. Simply add water and cleaning liquid, roll down the top and seal the bag, remove air through the twist-valve, and rub for 30 seconds to 3 minutes. After a quick rinse in the bag, clothing is ready to dry.
 
Compression bag function - pack smaller

Minimise your luggage and maximise your travels! The Scrubba stealth pack's XL twist-style valve works with the shoulder straps to compress gear. Simply fill with clothing, roll and clip, expel air via the valve, wrap and clip the shoulder straps, and pack and go.
 
Camp shower function - shower anywhere

Perfect for overnight treks, camping out in the wilderness, or quickly rinsing off after a trip to the beach. Simply add 4-6 litres of water (1-1.5 gal), use one of the shoulder straps to clip the pack upside down, and twist the valve to control the water flow.
 
Other features - Load it up and go

Boasting multiple gear loops for the easy attachment of small items, a carry handle for maximum portability, and adjustable shoulder and sternum straps for heightened comfort, the stealth pack has got your back through every adventure.  
 

 

Scrubba stealth pack specs

Travel clean, light and free with the Scrubba stealth pack









 
Now shipping
Thanks to the great (and early) support of our backers, we were able to fast-track manufacturing and as of 18 August 2017, we have started shipping orders (yep 2 months ahead of schedule).  All Australian orders have been shipped and US orders will be sent on or just after 24 August 2017.  International orders will be shipped from 28 August 2017.  As we have extended our campaign, new orders will shipped as quickly as possible once placed.
The following image shows the final packaged Scrubba stealth pack:
 
And these are some of our Australian orders packed and ready to go with more stock behind in master cartons:


Finally, the following video shows the key features and functions of the Scrubba stealth pack that we are shipping to backers:


 

What We Need & What You Get

We have received many suggestions from the travelling community regarding a  neutral-coloured, larger wash bag capable of washing higher volumes at once, and are therefore confident that the Scrubba stealth pack's increased capacity and 'stealth' black colour fill a much-needed gap in the outdoor market. The Scrubba stealth pack is the outcome of our desire to add a little extra to the ordinary by creating a product that does it all, and we have innovated in accordance with our supporters' needs to ensure that our products evolve and continue to provide the best, most practical solutions for travellers everywhere. 
We are hoping to raise $5000 from the campaign, giving us the confidence to proceed with the first production run.  We already have the materials ready, we just need the green light from you. 
Risks & Challenges
This is our fifth crowdfunding campaign in the span of five years. Despite hurdles along the way, we have completed and fulfilled our previous four campaigns within only a few months, and from these experiences have learned how best to increase our overall efficiency. We therefore have great confidence that we will be able to ship most (if not all) Scrubba stealth pack orders within a month of the campaign's close. 
Although we do not anticipate any significant set backs or complications, we do believe in honesty and great customer service, so in the unlikely event that a delay does pop up, we will let you know and will quickly provide our strategy for getting back on track. So feel free to jump on-board and see how you can pack smaller and go further with the Scrubba stealth pack. 
Other Ways You Can Help
Even if the Scrubba stealth pack isn't for you, we still value your input and appreciate your support. That's why we'd love you to: 

Let your friends and family know about the stealth pack
Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word online


Media
If you would like to write a feature or create other media about the Scrubba stealth pack, we invite you to access our media kit and high-res images at: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/juunpjpehdb3u1t/AADKz7--TxEuuXcrB-ElC5b4a?dl=0
Thanks in advance for spreading the word about our campaign, and please feel free to contact us at info@thescrubba.com if you require further information. 
Our Previous Crowdfunding Success
In 2012 we revolutionised travel laundry by integrating a flexible washboard into a waterproof bag. By bringing the concept of the washboard into the 21st century, we created a new technology that has since been enjoyed by over 100,000 travellers around the globe. The support we received from the crowdfunding community was overwhelming, and we have been committed to developing lightweight, durable, portable, multi-functional, and environmentally-conscious products ever since: 
The Scrubba wash bag (2012): Crowdfunded on Indiegogo following founder and patent attorney Ash Newland's mission to overcome the difficulty of effectively washing clothes while hiking Mt Kilimanjaro, the Scrubba wash bag ultimately raised 22,525USD of its 2,500USD goal, and has today become a pack favourite across the globe. 
The Scrubba W Pack (2015):  A backpack, wash bag and dry bag rolled into one, the W pack ultimately received 27,861USD, smashing its Indiegogo goal by 123%. 
The Scrubba weightless wallet (2016): Crowdfunded late last year with a final pledge result of 18,385AUD, this 7g (~0.25oz) water- and sweat-resistant travel and active wallet is 100% upcycled using excess material from the Scrubba wash bag. Finishing its Kickstarter run in early October 2016, all pledges had been fulfilled and shipped by early December.
The Allurette washer (2017): Having completed its Indiegogo run in March of this year, we were thrilled to have all original pledges shipped by mid-April. The Allurette washer continued to receive great support on our InDemand campaign until its conclusion in May, and ultimately received 16,485USD of its 5000USD goal. 
Thanks so much for your support and enthusiasm.
FAQ
How does the Scrubba stealth pack differ from the Scrubba W pack? 
In addition to switching out our vivid Scrubba green fabric for a neutral black that allows for increased discreetness, the Scrubba stealth pack is 40% larger, enabling it to easily carry more gear and to more effectively wash bulkier items. The Scrubba stealth pack also carries an array of updates that improve upon our original design, and is thus a more technical backpack that has been built specially for the outdoors. The old squeeze valve located on our W pack has been replaced with an XL twist-style mechanism to allow for easier compression and greater versatility, while the shoulder straps have been upgraded for maximum comfort and durability. The stealth pack also features a square base for increased accessibility, along with gear loops for the convenient attachment of small outdoor accessories and a side handle for maximum portability. 
Just how multi-functional is the Scrubba stealth pack? 
We are passionate about creating multi-functional items that can be helpfully adapted in a multitude of ways to increase productivity in both urban jungles and rural environments. Although the primary uses of the Scrubba stealth pack are as a high-quality backpack, wash bag, compression dry bag, and camp shower, we have received much feedback over the years in relation to a diverse range of impressive uses for our products, bound to suit all travellers' needs. These include filling the pack with clothing, either to use as a makeshift pillow or to provide a soft environment that is ideal for transporting delicate items and souvenirs, and filling with ice for use as a makeshift ice pack/bag. Removing the stealth pack's detachable shoulder straps can afford even greater versatility, enabling the pack to be compactly stored in a larger case for use as a packing cell or laundry bag that separates dirty clothes from clean ones. 
How does the Scrubba stealth pack wash clothes?
The Scrubba stealth pack works on the same principle as an old-fashion washboard, and functions in an identical manner to our earlier Scrubba wash bag and W pack products. To wash a load of clothing, you need simply add clothes, water, and your preferred detergent to the appropriate marking level indicated on the bag's exterior, roll down the top seal and clip the ends together, twist open the valve to remove excess air, seal the valve, and then rub clothes against the internal washboard for 30 seconds - 3 minutes. You can monitor the washing process via the pack's clear viewing window. When clothes are clean, you need simply unseal the bag, replace the dirty water with fresh water, reseal without deflating, give the bag a firm shake to rinse off residual detergent, and then remove and hang the clothes to dry. 
How can I use the stealth pack as a camp shower? 
When hung from a tree and clipped upside down using one of the shoulder straps, the Scrubba stealth pack's XL valve is capable of releasing a slow, steady stream of water. This transforms it into makeshift, outdoor shower that is perfect for overnight treks, camping out in the wilderness, or quickly rinsing off after a trip to the beach. Simply fill the bag with 4-6 litres (1-1.5 gal) of water, roll and clip the opening, and twist open the valve to wash off the sweat of a long day. You can even use the valve to adjust the water flow as you shower.  
How can I use the stealth pack as a compression bag? 
Although the stealth pack makes for an ideal piece of carry-on baggage, we understand that everyone travels differently and that some travellers may prefer a different type of carry-on/day bag. To ensure that the stealth pack remains beneficial for these people, we have included a compression feature that enables you to downsize your luggage in order to avoid a bulky, disorganised suitcase. The Scrubba stealth pack's XL twist-style valve enables the bag to compress down for maximum storage and portability, allowing you to always implement the most efficient packing strategy. Simply load the stealth pack with gear, roll and clip the top, release the air via the valve, and tighten the straps around the bag to cinch everything in place and ensure it remains as compressed as possible throughout your journey. Then insert your compressed bag into a larger suitcase or backpack to benefit from smaller, lighter luggage. This method is also great for keeping gear neat and organised throughout your travels, preventing you from losing sight of that one, pesky sock!
Should I use the stealth pack as a compression bag or as carry-on luggage?
The choice is yours! If you already have a favourite carry-on bag or struggle to find efficient methods for packing your suitcase, the compression feature could suit you. However, if you plan on using the Scrubba stealth pack as your day bag throughout your trip, and only require a basic backpack for your flight, using the stealth pack as a carry-on is likely your best option. As the stealth pack fits most laptop sizes and offers 21L of capacity, it is a handy piece of gear to take along on your flight, but the best feature is its adaptability, so you can variously use it as a carry-on bag, day bag, compression bag, or even as a packing cell or laundry bag, depending on what suits your needs at any given time. 
What are the dimensions of the Scrubba stealth pack?
The stealth pack has a maximum capacity of 21L and measures 54cm x 32cm (21 x 13') when laid flat.  However, as the washing method requires you to seal the bag and rub the clothes against the washboard from the outside, the optimal working volume for the washing process is around 2-8L (0.5-2 GAL).  The markings on the front of the pack make it easy to always add the right volumes. 
Is the stealth pack waterproof?
The Scrubba stealth pack is made from the same durable, waterproof material as our Scrubba wash bag and W packs, using the same manufacturing method. In this regard, the pack provides great protection from rain, snow, and the like. However, we would not recommend submerging the pack entirely, as water can escape through the seal from time to time. In this regard, the stealth pack is weatherproof and water-resistant, but is not totally waterproof and should therefore not be fully submerged if it is loaded with contents that cannot be exposed to water. 
What is the stealth pack made from? 
The stealth pack is made from a durable 40 denier nylon fabric with a polyurethane coating to ensure maximum style, comfort, and durability. 
How long does a load take to wash in the Scrubba stealth pack?
For a machine quality wash, we recommend using a few drops of washing detergent and then rubbing the clothes against the washboard for 2-3 minutes. For stubborn stains, the clothing may be rubbed for longer and/or allowed to soak in the stealth pack prior to rubbing. If soaking clothing in the stealth pack, ensure it is stored upright (e.g. seal facing upwards) to prevent water wicking through the seal.
Are the straps adjustable and removable?
Yes. The straps can be fully adjusted according to your own preference, and can be removed as needed, giving you the flexibility to travel in a way that suits you. 
How much luggage will fit in the stealth pack?
The stealth pack is a 21L backpack that is capable of holding most of the gear you would typically need for flights or basic day trips. It can accommodate most laptop sizes and has plenty of room left over for necessities including passports and wallets. The gear loops afford additional storage space, enabling small items like raincoats or drink bottles to be attached to the outside of the pack, freeing up space within. 
How much clothing can be washed in the Scrubba stealth pack at once? 
The Scrubba stealth pack can accommodate plenty of gear when used as a backpack, but washing efficiency may be compromised if too much clothing is added during the washing process, so we recommend limiting the amount of items you wash together. With 40% larger capacity than the Scrubba wash bag, the stealth pack can typically wash about 3 t-shirts, a couple of pairs of socks, and a couple of pairs of underwear at once. Bulkier items, like jeans and jumpers/sweaters, should be washed separately for the best results. The recommended working volume is 2-8L (0.5-2 GAL), and the fill level markings on the bag's exterior will help you to determine the appropriate water levels in relation to different sized loads. 
Can I use hot water in the Scrubba stealth pack?
Due to the waterproof lining of the bag, we recommend that water no hotter than 50°C (122°F) be used. Simply put, if it is too hot to hold your hands in, the water is too hot for the Scrubba stealth pack.
How can I dry the Scrubba stealth pack after use? To expedite the drying process and achieve the best level of hygiene, we recommend removing the straps and turning the Scrubba stealth pack inside out after use.  When inverted, you can make good use of the clips to hang the bag to dry.
What cleaning liquid should I use in the Scrubba stealth pack?
We've found the use of liquid detergents to be more efficient, as they, unlike solid detergents (powders, leaves etc.), do not require additional time to dissolve. Using a liquid also enables active suds immediately, reducing the overall washing time. For ultra-lightweight travellers, a small dollop of 3-in-1 bodywash-shampoo-shave liquid may be used, as we have found that this typically works well in refreshing clothes.You can test for quantities of different cleaning products in the stealth pack by checking the amount of suds visible through the clear section of the bag. If you still have suds after 30 seconds of rubbing, you can probably reduce the amount of detergent for the next load. Optimising the amount is not only better for the environment, but will also minimise the amount of rinsing required. Avoid the use of detergents containing harsh chemicals, bleach, or ammonia, as these ingredients will reduce the Scrubba stealth pack's longevity.
How long will the Scrubba stealth pack last and how do I care for it?
The Scrubba stealth pack has been built to last, but you can take some small steps to ensure maximum longevity. These include avoiding contact with sharp objects that could puncture the fabric during the washing process, and avoiding washing with strong bleaches, on abrasive surfaces, and at high temperatures.
How do I dry my clothes after using the Scrubba stealth pack?
After rinsing the clothing, gently squeeze the excess water from your garments. You can then either hang the clothes to dry as normal or, to expedite the drying process, lay the wet garments on a clean, dry towel, before rolling up the towel to encase the clothes. Press down on the rolled-up towel to encourage water absorption, then hang the damp clothes to dry.

update3

3 DAYS LEFT BEFORE OUR JOURNEY !!

Snapchat : eul0gy 

live news during our trip !

Thanks for the support so far !

________________________________________


Hi there , my name is Ludovic Fremondiere, I'm 24 and I'm from France.

Having a camera  all the time with me is important , I like to capture the moment and share it everywhere I go.

My photo Gallery :     My Flickr

(Picture above: just woke up as the sun rises over the mountains)


I will travel  with 2 close friends to Iceland at the end of June for one week.
I definitely want to make the most out of this week.


After a few years of photography I want to test myself and see if my work can interest people so I'm here to take it to the next level.


The trip is already booked, we got a flight and a car (4x4) in Keflavik.
Departure the 28/06/2015 !




The goal is simple here , I really want to see if  my photography can motivate a lot of people to donate and receive a piece of art of your choice.
 Believe in me for taking great photography of the Iceland's nature.


Places we will go to  :



This is mostly the main destinations of our journey. Probably more to come !



So don't forget to check out my Flickr Page and then it's up to you !
If you believe in what i can bring you.

I will also make a movie about my trip , with a lot of cool timelapses.

Here you can check my latest video ,made especially for my girlfriend.

                                                                  ---> HER <---

(  All  the photography will be print at a special premium shop called  " Impresssion Panoramique "  )

(note : All photography will be uploaded the week after i come back from Iceland then I'll send an email to everyone to know what you want)
(note*: you'll be able to chose among all my photographies on Flickr )



Stuff i use :

_Nikon D7000 ( tripod Benro /ballhead Benro and Nikon remote)
_Tamron 10-24mm ( Polarized filter and ND1000 )
_Canon s120 ( extra batteries )
_Go pro hero 4 silver 
_Iphone 6 + Gorilla pod + Joby mount 
_Anker External battery 25600mAh


Where the money will go to :


• Transform your donation into a piece of art for each one of you ! 



Support me and get the t-shirt of the project !

 
 


Final Word :

Support me discovering the beauty of iceland as I see it through my journey.

Become a part of my project " One Week In Iceland".





Thank you.




Edit 30/05/15 : Thanks for the first donations !
Edit 2 14/06/2015 :   2 Weeks left !



___________________




Départ dans 3 jours !

Snapchat : eul0gy

Suivez nous durant notre voyage :)



Version Française

Bonjour , je m'apelle Ludovic Frémondière et j'ai 24 ans.


Avoir un appareil photo tout le temps sur moi est très important , j'aime saisir l'instant et le partager où que j'aille.

Ma Galerie Photo :    Mon Flickr




Je vais voyager en Islande à la fin du mois de Juin avec 2 amis proches, pour une semaine.
J'ai vraiment envie d'en profiter le plus possible.

Après plusieurs années de photographies, je veux me tester et voir si ce que je fais peux intéresser du monde.
Alors je passe à la vitesse supérieure.

Le voyage est déjà réservé , les billets d'avion pris et une voiture (4X4) nous attendra à Keflavik.
Départ le 28/06/2015





Le but est simple, je veux réellement voir si mes photos peuvent plaire et justifier une donation quelconque.
J'espère que vous serez nombreux à croire en moi.


Destinations en Islande :



Voilà la plupart des lieux où nous allons nous attarder ! Il y en aura probablement d'autres.



Alors n'oubliez pas de passer par ma galerie photo  ->Flickr Page<-  et après c'est vous qui décidez !

Je réaliserais un film durant le  voyage.

Vous pouvez aller voir ma dernière vidéo que j'ai réalisé sur ma petite amie !

    ICI   :                                                         ---> HER <---


(La majeure partie des photographies seront imprimées par une société pro' -> " Impresssion Panoramique")

(note : Toutes les photos seront disponibles la semaine du retour de mon voyage sur ma galerie Flickr )
(Note*: Vous pourrez choisir parmis toutes les photos sur mon Flickr, Récentes ou anciennes )


Matériel :


_Nikon D7000 ( tripod Benro /ballhead Benro and Nikon remote)
_Tamron 10-24mm ( Polarized filter and ND1000  )
_Canon s120 ( +extra batteries )
_Go pro hero 4 silver
_Iphone 6 + Gorilla pod + Joby mount 
_Anker External battery 25600mAh

Et l'argent dans tout ça ?

• Il servira à transformer vos donations en photographies papier de qualité supérieur / t shirt et autres cadeaux pour vous ou vos amis !





Soutenez moi et obtenez le T-shirt du projet !

 


Mots de la Fin :


Soutenez moi et découvrez la beauté de l'islande à travers mes yeux.

Devenez un membre du projet " One week in Iceland"





Merci.

Edit 30/05/15 : Merci aux premiers Donateurs !
Edit2 14/06/15 :  Plus que 2 semaines avant le grand départ !

story:
The Need

At Ponderosa Lodge, it's our goal to bring students one-step closer to Jesus. To do this, we use every tool at our disposal: counselor, games, forum time, and even recreation. We strive to create special experienes that can only be had while at camp, so this year we're hoping to purchase some new rec equipment that will add to the fun of camp for all the students who come:

  • 9-Square is great game that we've seen played at other camps and would love to offer our students. It's like 4-square, but with 9, and in the air!
  • Spikeball is a perfect afternoon activity for the field or the beach and is good for hours of entertainment.
  • The new foam dodgeballs we hope to purchase will be much safer than traditional rubber dodgeballs, and we know camp is much more fun when we're being safe!

The Cost

To offer all of these new rec options it will cost $1150.

  • 9-Square game: $800
  • 2 Spikeball sets: $200
  • 3 foam dodge ball sets (18 balls): $150

The Impact

Do you remember the fun of camp? Playing games with your cabin in the afternoon on the forum lawn or on beach day? Please consider partnering with us to provide this experience for this summer's campers. We know that they will be blessed!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have the e-mail address of anyone who used to work at camp or who might be willing to help, please forward this page to them. Also, please pray for the campers that are coming this summer, that God would work in them in powerful ways!

Spikeball is a perfect afternoon activity for the field or the beach and is good for hours of entertainment.

story:
What is Alternative Spring Break?

ASB is an entirely student-led organization at Ryerson University that fundraises to send students abroad to work on International development projects. Active since 2006, ASB has sent dozens of Ryerson students abroad to help better the lives of those less fortunate and to grow both personally and professionally by gaining a better understanding of global issues. 

ASB believes that these trips can foster positive change both in our own community and abroad. Changing the world in small steps by encouraging students to change themselves.

Who is Team Uganda?

This May, 20 students will embark on ASB’s tenth project abroad, to Villa Maria, Uganda. In partnership with a local NGO, ASB will assist in rebuilding a medical clinic, help at the local orphanage, and participate in several other community projects.

What does ASB need?

ASB projects are volunteer-based, and, as a result, fundraising is a vital component of sustainable development projects abroad, as well as of the ASB organization. 

Our goal for this campaign is $1020. Ten. Twenty.

Ten represents this as our tenth project abroad and twenty represents the twenty team members who will participate!

How will you benefit?

Emily and Caitlin are two of the twenty team members and are both film students at Ryerson University. To assist in both promoting and capturing ASB's journey, they will create a film while abroad. Your generous support DOES NOT go towards the making of the film. The money will assist the team in travelling to Uganda, as well as provide support for future ASB teams to volunteer with different projects.

Donating to this campaign allows you the unique opportunity to be a part of the making of the film that will encapsulate Team Uganda's journey!

Other Ways You Can Help

In the future, please visit our Tumblr page: http://asbryerson.tumblr.com and feel free to donate through PayPal.

story: Grove City Quidditch is in its third year of existence and going strong. Each year our club competes in our local conference and our region across several states. The highlight and goal of any quidditch season is to play at the National Championship. To do so we must play games both at home and away, and attend our Regionals in Virginia. We are fundraising for expenses of travel and play.

The highlight and goal of any quidditch season is to play at the National Championship. To do so we must play games both at home and away, and attend our Regionals in Virginia. We are fundraising for expenses of travel and play.

story:
We all want easy access to hydration anywhere anytime, yet no one likes to carry around a bulky water bottle that fits nowhere and only adds unnecessary weight. Plastic bottled water is convenient but does so much permanent damage to our planet. 

So we created que Bottle, the only collapsible bottle that can travel with you and looks absolutely awesome. Unique spiral design shrinks que bottle to half of its size without sacrificing its stylish appeal.

Featured on:

 

       

 

Made of 100% BPA-free food-grade silicone, que Bottle is 100% plastic-free, making it safe for people and the planet. It’s lightweight and compact, taste and odor free, stain and bacteria resistant, dishwasher safe, and safe to use for both hot (up to 140F) and cold beverages. Plus, we are offering two size: high-capacity 20 fl oz for everyday use and 12 fl oz bottle for travelers and kids. Collapsed que bottle can be used as a small-sized bottle, making it even more versatile.

The Silicone Material

Why did we choose to use silicone to make que Bottle?

The que Bottle is tested for its high and pure grade silicone quality because we understand that the container that holds your water should be safe. Unlike metal or plastic containers, silicone WILL NOT change the taste of your water. It's the water bottle that has the best qualities of glass and metal, with the added benefit of being flexible, light, and shatter resistant.

 

The Functions

Collapsible: shrinks to half its size to fit anywhere

 

 

Wide mouth:  fits ice cubes

 

Safe for hot beverages: up to 140°F (60°C). Safe to use for hot coffee, tea, and cleaning with boiling water.

 

Easy to clean: dishwasher safe 

 

Durable: Collapse and expand over and over again

 

Leakproof: airtight secure seals. Leakproof que Bottle makes sure your bag stays dry

Shockproof: shock resistant. No damages caused if dropped by accident.

100% food-grade silicone: FDA/LFGB approved

 

18/8 stainless steel cap: top kitchenware grade stainless steel

 

100% plastic-free: NO plastic material used for que bottle, 100% GREEN!

 

                         

 

 

 

 

The new travel essential, the bottle that travels with you everywhere.

Never without a bottle again!

It's more than just a water bottle, beautifully crafted que Bottle is also a fashion accessory!

Help save the environment in the most stylish way possible!

 

 

Hi, we are Jean and Kevin, the creators of que Bottle. We like to travel all over the world and it deeply upsets us that we see a lot of used and abandoned plastic bottles everywhere we go.

We realized that the reason people were still buying highly marked-up plastic bottled water at public places was for the sake of convenience. There simply isn't a good alternative travel bottle available. Current water bottles are either bulky, making them impossible to carry around, or dull-looking and cheap-made foldable flasks.

So we wanted to make something that’s functional but also looks great. We came up with the initial design and worked day and night for 12 months to bring it to fruition.

 

FAQ

How do I pick the color and size when I order?

We will be sending out a survey to ask your about the color and size after the campaign ends.

Can I put hot liquid in the bottle?

Yes, silicone is safe for hot liquid up to 350F + . But we do not recommend using it for hot liquid temperature higher than 140F.

What are que Bottle’s dimensions and weight?

The dimensions for the 20 fl oz size bottle is: 4.8’’ x 2.8’’x 2.8’’ collapsed and 8.4’’x2.8’’x2.8’’ expanded. It weighs about 6 oz.

The dimensions for the 12 fl oz size bottle is: 4.0’’ x 2.6’’x 2.6’’ collapsed and 6.8’’x2.6’’x2.6’’ expanded. It weighs about 5 oz.

What is the capacity of the bottles?

We currently offer two sizes: 12 fl oz (355 ml) expanded, 5 fl oz (150ml) collapsed and 20oz (600 ml) expanded, 8 fl oz (235 ml) collapsed.

Can I put it in the freezer?

The que Bottle is made from silicone, which is a material rated for very low and very high temperatures. That said, water expands when frozen, and we recommend you not fill the bottle completely when you place your bottle in the freezer.

What is BPA?

BPA is a harmful toxin that is found in certain plastics and epoxy resins used by some disposable and reusable water bottle manufacturers. Those bottles actually leach BPA from the bottle into your water.For all the facts on BPA click here: http://www.fda.gov/NewsEvents/PublicHealthFocus...) 
To make sure you can drink water with no concerns of BPA, get an que Bottle!

What is que Bottle made of? Are they safe?

The que bottle is 100% safe to use. The body of the bottle is made of FDA/LFGB approved food grade silicone, which is non-toxic and BPA free. The cap is made of 18/8 kitchen grade stainless steel.

How do I clean que Bottle?

que Bottle is dishwasher safe, so you can easily clean it using a dishwasher. You can also clean it using boiling water.

Does it keep hot and cold for a long time?

que Bottles are not designed to keep the liquid cold or hot for a very long time, but it does slow down the change in temperature.

Is there any damage to the bottle if I collapse it too many times?

No, there won’t be any damage caused by frequent collapsing and expanding because silicone is an extremely flexible material. Although we haven’t done any test to get the exact number of times, we get a pretty good feel that it’s going to be in the million range.

Why is it called que Bottle?

que Bottles were so named because there are cute and collapse into a cube size.

Is the bottle hygienic?

Silicone as a material does not have any open pores that can harbor bacteria. On top of that, you can also wash your bottle in the dishwasher. It's completely safe!

I want to order a large quantity, do I get a discount?

Yes, we do order wholesale pricing. Please shoot us an email at hi@quebottle.com to request wholesale information.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jon. my wife and I play softball for the local park district, coach my 14 year old sons traveling little league baseball team, as well as Father of an 11 year old avid soccer player.  Living in the midwest we are often cursed with rain out games. Last year my sons baseball team had to make-up multiple games due to flooding of the fields from rain.  In one occurance, the team drove 30 miles only to find out that the fields had too many puddles to play. It was sunny that day but the sun was not enough.  It was then that my son asked me if there was a way to get rid of the water. After researching this question, I had found that their was not any solution to this problem. I could not help but think, with all of the golf courses, softball fields, baseball fields, soccer fields etc.... why nobody has come up with a machine to solve this issue. Well, now there is.  With all of your help, we as parents, don't have to see the disappointment in our children's eyes on gameday.  Not to mention, our disappointment in having to reschedule our tee times.

  This machine can be used to dry out the ground after it rains, allowing people to proceed with their ball game, tournament, picnic, wedding, or any other event as normal. This unique product can comprise a machine with a hard-plastic frame wrapped around with a skirt made of vinyl or rubber material. The front, bottom side of the machine can have grates that are used to stop large objects from getting sucked up. These grates can be plumbed together on the topside. The water vacuum can be on top of a plumbing structure. The vacuum can have four mounts to hold it in place. Mounted on either inside of the water vacuum can be a water pump. A long hose can be attached to the water pump to transfer the unwanted water elsewhere. In the middle of the machine can be a battery or a generator to power the vacuum and the pumps. The vacuum and pump can work simultaneously. An air pump can be mounted behind the battery in the rear topside of the machine. This pump can force air through a plumbed hole against the ground, allowing the machine to hover. There can be a collapsible pneumatic wheel located on each corner of the machine to allow it to move when the hovercraft is not needed. There can be a handle connected to the frame, allowing the operator to push, pull and steer. The controls for the air, vacuum, and pump can be mounted to the handle to be easily accessed by the operator. The exact specifications, materials used, and method of use of this machine may vary upon manufacturing. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

I have a provisional patent for this product as well as a fully functional prototype. I am now out of money. I need your help to aquire a full 20 year utility patent before my time runs out.  With your help I can get not only the utility patent but enough to start marketing to various manufacturers.

story:
Our Mission

Build a business that will improve the lives of our clients.


Whole Body Cryotherapy

Routine Whole Body Cryotherapy sessions have been shown to increase your athletic recovery & performance, the wellness of your body, the management of your pain, and keep you looking young and beautiful.

Whole Body Cryotherapy is a hyper-cooling process designed to reduce musculoskeletal pain and inflammation by lowering a person's skin temperature to approximately 30˚ F.  This is achieved by surrounding the body with extremely cold air at temperatures averaging -240˚ F in a CryoChamber for up to 3 minutes.

Many compare the sensation to standing in front of an open freezer on a hot day – chilly but tolerable.


Fitness, Beauty and Health

CryoSalon will bring the Fitness, Beauty and Health benefits of Whole Body Cryotherapy to Overland Park, Kansas for those who demand the most of their body and mind.  For more information: CryoSalon.com


Our Indiegogo Goals

#1 Awareness

  • Please help us spread the word:  share this Indiegogo campaign with your family, friends, associates... everyone! =)
  • Follow Twitter @CryoSalon
  • Like Facebook
  • Follow Instagram

#2 Additional Services 

  • We would like to raise additional funds to add services to better serve our customers.


How Funds Raised Will Be Used

$5,000 Level

  • NormaTec Recovery System

$10,000 Level

  • Second NormaTec Recovery System

$20,000 Level

  • Upgraded Luxurious Amenities

$50,000 Level

  • Local Cryotherapy Equipment and Services

$100,000 Level
  • Second Whole Body Cryotherapy Chamber


Perks:  Pre-Open Sale

Save money now.  Several of our Whole Body Cryotherapy (WBC) perks offered are at a Pre-Opening sale prices.  Normal pricing once we open can be found on our website.

Anyone who supports us with purchasing the One Month WBC Transcend Member Perk for $199, will have the option of locking in this low monthly rate for life.


Projected Opening

We should be open by late summer or early fall 2015.


Thank You for Your Support

Frank Tarantino & John Sirna

story:
ROLLOGO ESCAPE S is the world’s first smart luggage equipped with patented power-generating wheels. Be free from the wall — your every step is equivalent to a 1A wall adaptor charging your devices on the go.

Handcrafted with world class materials, designed for ultimate usability and function, and paired with an intuitive security tracking app, ESCAPE S is an award-winning, extremely durable, water-resistant, high-end luxury suitcase built for seamless travel.

Never worry about dead batteries, stolen luggage, or security checks again! Charge all your devices and recharge your power bank by simply walking. Keep track of your luggage via our app. Keep all your belongings safely and securely organized and within reach. ROLLOGO ESCAPE S has got you covered on every front!

Two USB ports charge all your devices with a powerful 3.4A flow. The strong amperage means ESCAPE S can deliver energy faster and allows you to power-charge your enabled devices extremely fast.

At walking speed, ESCAPE S’s patented wheel technology generates electricity equivalent to a 1A Wall Adapter.

Never worry about dead batteries or an uncharged power bank ever again! You’ll be recharging ESCAPE S built-in detachable power bank by simply walking between terminals!

Our 8000mAH Smart Power Bank, BOND, has a long-lasting 10 hour charge life and can be detached to provide flexible charging.

BOND is bluetooth enabled - allowing it to connect with your phone so you can keep track of its battery status as well as the location of your ESCAPE S.

Plus, BOND complies with CE, FCC, and TSA standards and is safe for flights - so don’t worry about checking it in or bringing it on carry-on.

The ROLLOGO App features an intuitive dashboard. View your battery status of BOND (smart power bank) and keep track of the signal strength between your phone and luggage.

Bad guys have no chance with ESCAPE S. If you want to take a nap on a train or between transit, simply turn on the Movement Notifier. With the feature on, the ROLLOGO App will immediately alert you if your luggage ever moves - letting you rest worry-free.

Lost your luggage? No problem!

With the ROLLOGO app you can use the Last Location Log to see when you and your ESCAPE S was last connected.

Get the latest and most updated exchange rates on the ROLLOGO App whenever you visit a new country and always be prepared.

A powerful, lightweight and high-strength wave spring suspension system protects ESCAPE S’s wheels from hard drops and also makes going through rough terrains smoother.

No more broken wheels - pull smoothly without worry.

ESCAPE is made from the world’s thinnest modified cross-section nanofibers. This makes it extremely durable and liquid and stain resistant. Keep all your belongings dry and protected.

 

No tears, no scratches, no worries. Check out our stain and water test to prove it!

Plus, the cross-section nanofibers give ESCAPE S a beautiful mottled effect that gives it a futuristic modern look. We’re using the most innovative technology to give you ultimate protection, water resistance, and fashion-forward design.

Our one-of-a-kind internal frame maintains structure and integrity without sacrificing space or comfort.

Soft on the outside and tough on inside, ESCAPE S is the sturdiest soft-case carry-ons available anywhere.

ESCAPE features a special top compartment that gives you quick secure access to all your essentials in an instant. Quickly find and grab your passport, boarding pass, even your sunglasses when you need it and easily stow it away when you’re done with them.

See and take exactly what you need without fumbling. Plus, it makes pulling out your liquids extremely fluid - letting you breeze past airport security without hassle.


Our unique flat top design makes ESCAPE S a perfect working surface during your layover. Comfortably and safely rest your laptop, coffee cup, or even your lunch as you wait for your next flight.

When you’re ready to go, the flat top makes a perfect surface to secure your handbag or shopping bag (after all your duty-free shopping) to free up your hands.

A magnetic front pocket gives you secure easy access to your belongings without unlocking the main compartment. Easily reach your books, magazines and files via the magnetic door without opening up your entire suitcase. 

With the built-in 3-digit combination lock, all your belongings will be safely secured in ESCAPE for worry-free travel.

The lock is 100% TSA compliant - so no need to fret over broken locks or issues with security.

ESCAPE S’s dual handle system lets you easily carry it over curbs or up/down stairs with little strain.

A multi-level telescopic handle lets you comfortably and quickly get rolling without hassle, while bottom-molded handle makes overhead stowage easy and effortless.

ESCAPE S’s interior can feature multiple compartments for accessories, clothes, electronics to keep all your belongings organized and easy to find.

Each compartment can be fully modular and be removed and customized to suit your specific needs. Plus, compression straps in the compartments keep everything in place and prevent any items from shifting!

ESCAPE S’s laptop compartment is designed to protect and organize your digital devices like your laptop, tablets and chargers, while making them quickly accessible when you need them. Easily take out your laptop for security checks, while keeping it securely stowed and safely hidden when you’re on the go.

The compartment also decreases the hassle of searching and pulling out your laptop during a flight. Get immediate access to your devices without any digging around.

Keep your toiletries organized, separated and easy to access with ESCAPE S’s add-on toiletries bag. A stowaway swivel hook allows you to hang it anywhere.

Keep your suit or dress protected and wrinkle-free with the add-on attachable garment case. The garment case easily and firmly secures to ESCAPE S. It’s made of the same soft durable material and robust structure as the suitcase making it both comfortable and firm - no more wrinkles, no more troubles.

Add an extra layer of protection from water and dust with a foldable custom cover made with water-resistant fabric!

ESCAPE S is handcrafted by skilled artisans that bring together conventional and innovative workmanship. It involves 100+ revised designs, 1000+ procedures, 100+ quality checkpoints and takes several weeks of work to complete each individual piece.

Rollogo delivers mobility with pure elegance and sophistication. From our mottled effect material to our modern structural design, we kept aesthetics in mind with every decision.
story_txt:
ROLLOGO ESCAPE S is the world’s first smart luggage equipped with patented power-generating wheels. Be free from the wall — your every step is equivalent to a 1A wall adaptor charging your devices on the go.Handcrafted with world class materials, designed for ultimate usability and function, and paired with an intuitive security tracking app, ESCAPE S is an award-winning, extremely durable, water-resistant, high-end luxury suitcase built for seamless travel.Never worry about dead batteries, stolen luggage, or security checks again! Charge all your devices and recharge your power bank by simply walking. Keep track of your luggage via our app. Keep all your belongings safely and securely organized and within reach. ROLLOGO ESCAPE S has got you covered on every front!Two USB ports charge all your devices with a powerful 3.4A flow. The strong amperage means ESCAPE S can deliver energy faster and allows you to power-charge your enabled devices extremely fast.At walking speed, ESCAPE S’s patented wheel technology generates electricity equivalent to a 1A Wall Adapter.Never worry about dead batteries or an uncharged power bank ever again! You’ll be recharging ESCAPE S built-in detachable power bank by simply walking between terminals!Our 8000mAH Smart Power Bank, BOND, has a long-lasting 10 hour charge life and can be detached to provide flexible charging.BOND is bluetooth enabled - allowing it to connect with your phone so you can keep track of its battery status as well as the location of your ESCAPE S.Plus, BOND complies with CE, FCC, and TSA standards and is safe for flights - so don’t worry about checking it in or bringing it on carry-on.The ROLLOGO App features an intuitive dashboard. View your battery status of BOND (smart power bank) and keep track of the signal strength between your phone and luggage.Bad guys have no chance with ESCAPE S. If you want to take a nap on a train or between transit, simply turn on the Movement Notifier. With the feature on, the ROLLOGO App will immediately alert you if your luggage ever moves - letting you rest worry-free.Lost your luggage? No problem!With the ROLLOGO app you can use the Last Location Log to see when you and your ESCAPE S was last connected.Get the latest and most updated exchange rates on the ROLLOGO App whenever you visit a new country and always be prepared.A powerful, lightweight and high-strength wave spring suspension system protects ESCAPE S’s wheels from hard drops and also makes going through rough terrains smoother.No more broken wheels - pull smoothly without worry.ESCAPE is made from the world’s thinnest modified cross-section nanofibers. This makes it extremely durable and liquid and stain resistant. Keep all your belongings dry and protected.


 

No tears, no scratches, no worries. Check out our stain and water test to prove it!

Plus, the cross-section nanofibers give ESCAPE S a beautiful mottled effect that gives it a futuristic modern look. We’re using the most innovative technology to give you ultimate protection, water resistance, and fashion-forward design.

Our one-of-a-kind internal frame maintains structure and integrity without sacrificing space or comfort.

Soft on the outside and tough on inside, ESCAPE S is the sturdiest soft-case carry-ons available anywhere.


ESCAPE features a special top compartment that gives you quick secure access to all your essentials in an instant. Quickly find and grab your passport, boarding pass, even your sunglasses when you need it and easily stow it away when you’re done with them.

See and take exactly what you need without fumbling. Plus, it makes pulling out your liquids extremely fluid - letting you breeze past airport security without hassle.

Our unique flat top design makes ESCAPE S a perfect working surface during your layover. Comfortably and safely rest your laptop, coffee cup, or even your lunch as you wait for your next flight.

When you’re ready to go, the flat top makes a perfect surface to secure your handbag or shopping bag (after all your duty-free shopping) to free up your hands.

A magnetic front pocket gives you secure easy access to your belongings without unlocking the main compartment. Easily reach your books, magazines and files via the magnetic door without opening up your entire suitcase. 


With the built-in 3-digit combination lock, all your belongings will be safely secured in ESCAPE for worry-free travel.

The lock is 100% TSA compliant - so no need to fret over broken locks or issues with security.


ESCAPE S’s dual handle system lets you easily carry it over curbs or up/down stairs with little strain.

A multi-level telescopic handle lets you comfortably and quickly get rolling without hassle, while bottom-molded handle makes overhead stowage easy and effortless.


ESCAPE S’s interior can feature multiple compartments for accessories, clothes, electronics to keep all your belongings organized and easy to find.
Each compartment can be fully modular and be removed and customized to suit your specific needs. Plus, compression straps in the compartments keep everything in place and prevent any items from shifting!



ESCAPE S’s laptop compartment is designed to protect and organize your digital devices like your laptop, tablets and chargers, while making them quickly accessible when you need them. Easily take out your laptop for security checks, while keeping it securely stowed and safely hidden when you’re on the go.

The compartment also decreases the hassle of searching and pulling out your laptop during a flight. Get immediate access to your devices without any digging around.

Keep your toiletries organized, separated and easy to access with ESCAPE S’s add-on toiletries bag. A stowaway swivel hook allows you to hang it anywhere.


Keep your suit or dress protected and wrinkle-free with the add-on attachable garment case. The garment case easily and firmly secures to ESCAPE S. It’s made of the same soft durable material and robust structure as the suitcase making it both comfortable and firm - no more wrinkles, no more troubles.



Add an extra layer of protection from water and dust with a foldable custom cover made with water-resistant fabric!


ESCAPE S is handcrafted by skilled artisans that bring together conventional and innovative workmanship. It involves 100+ revised designs, 1000+ procedures, 100+ quality checkpoints and takes several weeks of work to complete each individual piece.




Rollogo delivers mobility with pure elegance and sophistication. From our mottled effect material to our modern structural design, we kept aesthetics in mind with every decision.

story:
Greetings from Ohio and Nashville!

Last September our family made a big move, and began commuting from Nashville to Cincinnati so our youngest daughter could follow a dream and train at one of the top gyms in the U.S. , Cincinnati Gymnastics.   
This year I would like to continue the tradition of our once a year campaign and offer my photography skills again. I am excited that I can offer this perk  to you and your family .
A little about Grace
Grace is the youngest of our three girls. She  turned 11 this summer and started gymnastics 3 years ago in Nashville, after periods of climbing the furniture and dancing around the living room. At the time she was taking a tumbling  class and her teacher, my friend Graham a former college gymnast, told us to get her to a gym!  We utilized our local resources but after a couple years realized that Grace's love for the sport, her long term goals, and  physical abilities led us to research other options and Cincinnati Gymnastics was a perfect fit. It was a big transition for our family but we've made it work, day by day and week by week and our Indiegogo campaign in 2013 was one of the main reasons everything went so smoothly.  I thank you guys so much for donating as we reached our goal! It allowed us the funds to travel, meet fees and helped with tuition.  Grace and I were talking just last night about how far we've come since that first night in the LiveInn Hotel almost a year ago.
She has learned so much from her year in Cincinnati and continues to gain confidence, physical strength, and thrives on the energy she gets from this sport. When we adopted Grace six years ago with her sister, she was a little stick of a girl with rickety legs and a size seven month toddler shoe.. she still has little feet, but alot has changed! I took some video at the end of the summer after some practices for you to see a bit of training. She continues to soak it up like a sponge and loves her coaches.

The Fundraising
We would like to raise funds to help cover  Grace's competition/parent club fees with the balance going to tuition for the year and gas as well as traveling to and from meets. My husband and I each take one trip up a week. We have been incredibly lucky to have been given the opportunity to work part time on a horse farm in the area in exchange for residence in a great old farmhouse. It's a beautiful place for Grace to spend the week and for us to be together as a family when we're all together. 
I am offering  four sessions as perks, holiday card,  the mini session, the full family session and the gold medal, stylized concept shoot. Example videos below.These will come with digital images, and some with prints.  As a photographer, I don't typically include digitals unless purchased singly, so this a great perk if you are a client of mine in either city! Hoping to introduce my work to families in Cincinnati this year now that we're more settled. 
Last summer, I did not anticipate that I would be living in two cities with three girls in three different school environments, but it has really been an adventure, and so many great things have unfolded, giving opportunities to not only Grace but all of us.  Thank you so much everyone! Please share if you can.

story:
BeeLine is a handlebar-mounted device that helps you find your way on a bike. It strips back navigation to the bare basics, turning convention completely on its head and resurfacing your natural instinct to find the way.


"BeeLine brings easy GPS navigation to your bike" - Engadget
"Innovative BeeLine GPS navigation system launches on Kickstarter" - Cycling Weekly
"Urban routefinder BeeLine will add navigation to your bike for peanuts" - Bike Radar
"This Compass Is Made for Geographically Challenged Cyclists" - Wired
"BeeLine is a digital compass for your bike" - Trusted Reviews
"BeeLine GPS Device Aims To Make Bicycle Navigation Easier" - Tech Times
"This slick little smart compass tells you which direction to cycle" - Stuff
"BeeLine: Smart, Intentionally "Fuzzy" Navigation for Bikes" - Core77
"Innovative BeeLine GPS navigation system launches on Kickstarter" - NewsLocker
"BeeLine Gadget Lets You Multitask and Enjoy Simple Navigation" - Trendhunter


Cycling has always been a great way to get around the city, but it came with challenges. Getting lost could make you frustrated, late and even unsafe. Finding your way often meant regularly stopping to check maps or following prescribed instructions that don’t work so well in a chaotic urban environment. Not to mention they spoiled the fun. Then came BeeLine…

At the core of BeeLine is the stripped back concept of fuzzy navigation. In the city, being told which turns to take is a hindrance, not a help, so BeeLine simply points you in the general direction to your destination and tells you the distance to go – no instructions. Imagine a compass that knows where you want to go and points there instead of north.  

This makes riding fun again. You become more engaged in your journey and discover all kinds of hidden gems you would never find on the major (and often longer) routes. As you can never take a wrong turn, riding becomes completely stress free. 

It’s also safer. By being free to take turns that feel safe, when they feel safe and never being pushed into certain junctions or routes that you don’t feel comfortable. Checking how you’re doing just takes a quick glance leaving you free to focus on the road and your environment, not looking for street names or working out which is the right turn.

For the occasions where you have to go via a specific point, e.g. a bridge over a river, we’ve built in the option to add intermediate way points to your journey to ensure you never get stuck.

To set BeeLine up, simply snap the device onto your bike, select a destination in the free app and off you go. You can even save frequently used destinations for a one tap service.

BeeLine is as happy off the bike as on it. When not in use, the innovative design protects the screen so it can be thrown in your pocket or bag without worrying about damaging the screen. It also comes with a beautiful aluminium buckle so you you can attach it to your keys when not in use.

BeeLine has been designed in collaboration with Map Project Office, one of London’s top industrial design agencies. As well as thinking hard about the electronics and the software, we’ve spent a huge amount of time on the way BeeLine looks and feels. We hope you love it as much as we do!

To keep things fresh, BeeLine is available in a range of colours. Cool grey or something with a bit more flare? What will you go for?


Bikes come in as many shapes and sizes as their riders. So we’ve made sure BeeLine fits onto any bike using its flexible strap, and the display can be rotated to work whether attached to the handlebar or stem. With its elegant design, BeeLine is as at home on a battered run-around or a hire bike as it is on a treasured vintage fixie or a lightweight racer.  

You and your bike take the rough with the smooth, so BeeLine does too. BeeLine’s backlit e-paper screen is visible under any conditions. It's weather proof to take on the elements and shock proof so you can put it through the wringer.

In a time when charging devices every day is the norm, BeeLine breaks the mould. With an ultra low power screen and componentry and software optimized for efficiency, it keeps on going. BeeLine will last for 1-3 months of use between charges! (Based on 20-60 minutes of use every day)


Despite all of the above, BeeLine is incredibly affordable. By harnessing the power of your phone, we’ve been able to cut down the cost of the device so we can sell it at a price comparable with a bike light or lock, not a GPS navigation system. All without compromising on quality or looks. On top of that we’ve cut the reward prices to as low as we can possibly afford on Kickstarter. We’re not crowdfunding to make a big margin, we’re here to build a huge community of early adopters who will help us decide what BeeLine will do next…


At its core, BeeLine is about finding your way and exploring. However, it's been designed with versatility in mind at every level. This is why BeeLine uses a fully flexible screen that we can adapt to do much more.

When you don’t need navigation, BeeLine can show you your speed and distance travelled, or simply act as a clock. But this is just the tip of the iceberg…

That versatile little screen is capable of so much more, and this is where you come in. By backing us you’ll become part of our BeeLine owners’ community, which we’ll turn to to help decide future features. Join us and tell us what you want BeeLine to do next! (We don’t really like turn-by-turn navigation, but if the community tells us that’s what you want, we’ll make it).


The more we raise on Kickstarter the faster and better we can get working on those features. So once you’ve backed us, please click the links below to share this page and help boost the campaign!

     

By backing us you'll become one of the first to own a BeeLine device. These are the pledge levels that are up for grabs – act fast to get one of the ridiculously low priced Eager Bees!

As well as what you see here we’ll throw in a few extras:

  • Join us for a bike ride. We’ll invite all backers to join us for a long ride sometime in spring, starting in London. We’d love to meet as many of you as we can!
  • Personalised engraving. Add £10 (per BeeLine) to your order and we’ll engrave it with a personalized message of your choice. 
  • Shipping refunds. No one likes the sting of shipping charges so if you can make it to us in central London to pick it up in person, we’ll refund the shipping in full!

 At the core of BeeLine are two good friends and keen cyclists, Mark and Tom. We kept getting lost on our bikes and one day said enough was enough – BeeLine was Born.

By no means can we claim full credit for where we are today, however! We’ve had an enormous amount of help from kind friends in the form of industrial designers, engineers, innovation consultants, film producers and countless others along the way. To those guys - we can't thank you enough for everything you’ve done!  

We’re on Indiegogo to get us from prototype to manufacture. We have already identified suppliers and manufacturers, but a successful crowdfunding campaign will fund the refinement of the software and firmware, and manufacture of the first batch of BeeLine devices.

It will also give us a huge community of supportive early adopters (you!) who can help us shape and develop further functionality before we even manufacture the first devices. Our challenge to you is to help us make BeeLine the very best it can be. Are you up for it?

As keen cyclists, we've worked ourselves to the bone to get this product to the point it is today because we're passionate about it and we think it should exist.

We have put a lot of work into designing and building the first prototypes, and given ourselves the best protection we can by filing patent applications, but as a hardware project we are also aware that there will be challenges of manufacturing, production, shipping worldwide and more. Our promise is that we'll rise to meet all these challenges and more with the same enthusiasm and dedication we've had so far.

We've given a conservative estimate for our delivery dates, and are committed to keeping you informed of our progress both during and following our campaign. Be assured that we are all working all the hours we can to ensure your product arrives on time and in great condition!

We are excited to get BeeLine to you and for you to start enjoying it!

Thank you, 

Mark and Tom

 Look good and stay safe with reflective logos on the BeeLine t-shirts

 Just a handful of the great people involved in making BeeLine a reality

 Mark (left) and Tom (right) trying to hold it together on set for the Kickstarter video

story:
Pebble bottle is fast and simple. We wanted to maximize the flavor, scent, and smoothness of coffee and cold brew with Pebble bottle. By extracting the coffee in a sealed container, the flavor and scent remain encapsulated in Pebble bottle so that you can enjoy your cold brew to the fullest extent whenever you want.

We've made it easy to use and easy to clean so that you can easily fall in love with Pebble bottle. We designed Pebble bottle with the goal of allowing cold brew fanatics to brew and drink anywhere.

The Pebble bottle is a 3 in 1 flask that can be used to brew coffee and tea, make fruit infused water, all in an insulated container. Let the Pebble bottle adapt to your needs.
 

 

① Simple Brewing (Hot or Cold Brew and Loose Leaf Tea)

 

② Vacuum Insulation

 

③ Overall Design

 

④ Hidden Compartment

 

⑤ Double Micron Filter

 

 

 

 

  • Coffee brewing recommendations (1:5 water/coffee ratio)
  • Zero contact with air starting from the brewing process to the moment you begin drinking allows your coffee or tea to retain its flavor over a long period of time
  • Keep everything clean before, during and after the extraction

 

 

 


The use of high-quality filters reduces the remaining fine coffee powder for a clean and refreshing taste!

 

Introducing the real "Cold" Brew coffee which is extracted right into our thermal vacuum bottle which allows your coffee to remain at the perfect temperature all day long.

 

A 1:5 coffee to water ratio will produce a strong brew of about 350 - 410 ml. If you want to make a larger patch, simply adjust the coffee to water ratio to 1:3 and dilute it by adding additional water when you serve. This allows you to make up to 7 cups of coffee with a single brew!

 

1. Put the ground coffee in the filter and add Water in the bottle.

2. Put it in the fridge for 10-12 Hours.

3. Remove the filter from the Pebble Bottle.

4. Enjoy your Coffee.

 

 

 

 

The Pebble bottle is also perfect for tea extraction. You can enjoy refreshing tea flavor by not getting any tea sediment during the tea extraction.

Tea Brewing

Fruits Infusion

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

    

 

Domestic Shipping :

We will be manufacturing and shipping from South Korea. Backers with a shipping address in South Korea will not have to pay additional tax, duties, etc.

International Shipping:

We ship worldwide! Backers that have a shipping address outside of South Korea may have to pay tax, duties, VAT, etc. As it is different for each country, we are unable to provide specific information on any potential import taxes or duties. We encourage you to check out your country's customs office for additional information.

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

This is our second Indigogo campaign. With the lessons we learned from our first successful campaign, we will be making this project even better and more efficient so that our backers can enjoy their rewards as soon as possible!

We are confident that we will be able to deliver by the promised date since the design portion of our product has already been completed. Our last step is to go into mass manufacturing. We believe that our time margin allows for any unforeseen problems.

It is impossible to reduce the risk amount to 0%, but we will continue to work hard to overcome any obstacles we may encounter during this journey. If you have any concerns or issues, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@hughinc.com

Thank you!
story_txt:
Pebble bottle is fast and simple. We wanted to maximize the flavor, scent, and smoothness of coffee and cold brew with Pebble bottle. By extracting the coffee in a sealed container, the flavor and scent remain encapsulated in Pebble bottle so that you can enjoy your cold brew to the fullest extent whenever you want.We've made it easy to use and easy to clean so that you can easily fall in love with Pebble bottle. We designed Pebble bottle with the goal of allowing cold brew fanatics to brew and drink anywhere.The Pebble bottle is a 3 in 1 flask that can be used to brew coffee and tea, make fruit infused water, all in an insulated container. Let the Pebble bottle adapt to your needs.  ① Simple Brewing (Hot or Cold Brew and Loose Leaf Tea) ② Vacuum Insulation ③ Overall Design ④ Hidden Compartment ⑤ Double Micron Filter    
Coffee brewing recommendations (1:5 water/coffee ratio)
Zero contact with air starting from the brewing process to the moment you begin drinking allows your coffee or tea to retain its flavor over a long period of time
Keep everything clean before, during and after the extraction
   The use of high-quality filters reduces the remaining fine coffee powder for a clean and refreshing taste! Introducing the real "Cold" Brew coffee which is extracted right into our thermal vacuum bottle which allows your coffee to remain at the perfect temperature all day long. A 1:5 coffee to water ratio will produce a strong brew of about 350 - 410 ml. If you want to make a larger patch, simply adjust the coffee to water ratio to 1:3 and dilute it by adding additional water when you serve. This allows you to make up to 7 cups of coffee with a single brew! 1. Put the ground coffee in the filter and add Water in the bottle.2. Put it in the fridge for 10-12 Hours.3. Remove the filter from the Pebble Bottle.4. Enjoy your Coffee.    The Pebble bottle is also perfect for tea extraction. You can enjoy refreshing tea flavor by not getting any tea sediment during the tea extraction.Tea BrewingFruits Infusion                                 Domestic Shipping :We will be manufacturing and shipping from South Korea. Backers with a shipping address in South Korea will not have to pay additional tax, duties, etc.International Shipping: We ship worldwide! Backers that have a shipping address outside of South Korea may have to pay tax, duties, VAT, etc. As it is different for each country, we are unable to provide specific information on any potential import taxes or duties. We encourage you to check out your country's customs office for additional information.        
Risks and challenges
This is our second Indigogo campaign. With the lessons we learned from our first successful campaign, we will be making this project even better and more efficient so that our backers can enjoy their rewards as soon as possible!
We are confident that we will be able to deliver by the promised date since the design portion of our product has already been completed. Our last step is to go into mass manufacturing. We believe that our time margin allows for any unforeseen problems.
It is impossible to reduce the risk amount to 0%, but we will continue to work hard to overcome any obstacles we may encounter during this journey. If you have any concerns or issues, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@hughinc.com
Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

  • I'm 14 and a Freshman at Jenks High School.
  • This will be my first mission trip AND the first youth trip without either one of my parents!
  • I am ready and willing to bring the gospel to the people of Belize!

What I Need

  • The total cost for the trip is $1500.00.  I am requesting $750.00 here because I and hoping to raise the rest in other ways.  If this brings in more than the $750.00 it will go directly into my personal account at the church for the mission trip and/or other mission trips.

The Impact

  • We are working with a minister in Belize and have been in the process of planting a church there to reach people for Christ.
  • As a church, we have been ministering to the people of Belize for 8 years.  I am excited to finally be a part of that!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    I understand that not everyone can contribute financially.  I request that you:

    • Pass this on to others in hopes that they may be able to help and
    • PRAY, PRAY, PRAY!
    Thank you and God bless you!

story:
Mandibular Movement Simulator

Aim of this invention is to mechanically reproduce the jaw movements on a maximum range of precision. Thanks to a mechanical structure simulating the real jaw movement of any patient, it is possible to construct a dental prosthesis of a very high quality, and in a short time because it will be absolutely limited the number of tests applied on the patient as you will have always with you the jaw movement of the patient.

The function

The movement simulator is composed by a metallic structure created for moving the plaster cast of the patient's jaw. This structure strictly coincides with the reference point  taken in the jaw, with 6 axis of motion x,y,z, so that any rotation for every single axis can replaces the movement.

How to record the mandibular movement

At present that information is made from a axiograph. My goal will obtain it from some cameras.

Replace mandibular  movement.

The movement collected data is transferred on a pc, and the pc will give the movement information to the robot. There are two casts of patient’s  jaw (upper and lower): the upper cast is fix, only the lower one will be moved.

The idea.

One day, in a dental laboratory we got some troubles for the elaboration of a difficult prosthesis in an irritable patient. The best solution would have been to have always with us, at the lab, the mandibular movements of the patient.

Future

I think this robot will create a real revolution of a dental technology, because it will draw a new standard of work for this sector. Labs and patients will have a prosthesis on a very lower price, a shorter time, and a higher quality. I am sure we can open a new goal for the community.

My strong hope is that you can help me to realize this very useful dental tool. It is my dream, but I am also very confident that we can start new goals for this sector.

Many thanks to my friends. I think  I’m very lucky to know these people, they are  excellent technicians and they are ready in any moment to help me for the best technical solutions.

Practical use of my robot

The robot can be replace the real jaw movement of any patient as it gets the perfect reproduction of it.

To create the best prosthesis at all it is fundamental to get that perfect information: the shape of the teeth depends on the movement of your anatomic structure.

Value results

Perfect reproduction of a chewing cycle.

Shorter time for a prosthesis production.

Shorter time for try and fitting prosthesis.

Lower price to realize it.

Enormous advantage for the laboratory as you will have always with you the patient jaw movements.

Easy detection of any possible problem of a patient  jaw movement.

The  “Posselt space” of movement is replace in this robot and permit to have and look:

Centric- Relation

Maximum Intercuspal Position

Postural position

Resting position

Hinge axis movement

Maximun Protrusion

Maximum Opening

Chewing Loop

All data of the jaw movement ‘ll be replaced.

State

Hereby you will find a prototype demonstration. We’ll reach the production standard just with some short upgrade and test. I estimate three months of work are sufficient to start up the industrial production of the robot.

Some solutions are near to be ready like  the wireless control, may be with your founds we are able to put it in the first sell version.

We work also for the second step of this idea, used cameras for record the movement,

We can imagine an upgrade of the robot, that you put the two casts of patient’s  jaw in the maximum intercuspal position and the robot automatic move this cast in the correct space position for start the movement, now you need a arbitrary ear-face-bow instrument for realize, this operation  will be realized by robot only with the cinematic image data record without use tools.

Application

The range of application for this idea is not limited to the dental sector, we have request from veterinary,speech therapist , ear nose and throat specialist, maxillo-facial surgeon.



SOME TECHNICAL INFORMATION





                                          IMAGES RENDERING

story:
Summary

Jammu and Kashmir is battling one of the worst floods in decades. Over 400 people have died; thousands are homeless and living in camps.

As winter started, there is a drastic drop in temperature, which added more burdens on the flood victims. Severe cold weather has resulted in the deaths of many people especially children and the elderly.

Thousands of people in Jammu and Kashmir are in need of your help to survive in this winter.There is an urgent need of blankets. Please make a donation to give a blanket and save a life!


What these funds will be used for?

One blanket costs 5 US$.

The funds will be used to buy 1000 blankets to support 1000 families. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to contribute right now, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help us to spread the word by sharing our campaign on your social media or with your friends.
  • Like our Facebook page and follow what we're doing.
