story:
RipCemetery is an online social community that brings people together to celebrate the life of a loved one.  The goal is to overcome time and space so everyone who is grieving can share their feelings and memories in an intimate and private place.





STRETCH GOALS





IDEA

RipCemetery is an online experience that allows people to celebrate and honor a loved one’s life. The virtual cemetery is a place where participants can pay tribute to their loved ones by sharing memories, photos and videos in a safe and private environment. RipCemetery goes beyond online obituaries to be more interactive, more responsive and a social gathering point for all who want to remember a loved one.

Losing a loved one is never easy and the founders of RipCemetery want to create a space where people can honor a person and keep their memory alive forever. 




HELP US AND HELP YOURSELF


Please help us bring new friends into the RipCemetery community and earn great stuff at the same time!

Starting on February 10, 2015, this is what you can earn:


How it works: Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about us with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! You can even track your own progress by visiting your Indiegogo "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals."



SHARE MEMORIES ONLINE

Through our free website and mobile app, you can post memories, offer a tribute and interact with others. It provides an ongoing online support system that allows people to participate any time, anywhere. 



BUILD A SUPPORT NETWORK

As the first interactive virtual cemetery, RipCemetery offers a grieving outlet with the goal of helping participants remember a loved one, find peace and move forward. It allows people from around the world to come together to celebrate someone they love in a caring and unique space. It’s an opportunity to celebrate an important life and preserve memories with a compassionate and engaged support system.


VISIT YOUR LOVED ONE

A virtual tombstone allows participants to view and virtually visit their loved one’s memorial with the help of a geolocation system. You will see the exact location of the site and visit anytime you wish.  In addition, RipCemetery can serve as a central meeting point to remember cremated loved ones. Family and friends can visit the virtual memorial to share a memory, post a photo or give a flower or small gift


CONNECTING PEOPLE AROUND THE WORLD

With your help, our team of developers, engineers and marketing and communication experts will have the financial support to build and launch the platform on a global scale bringing more people together and creating a more meaningful product. 


WE NEED YOUR HELP 

We believe RipCemetery has the opportunity to reach a global audience and provide an outlet that helps people grieve, remember and move forward after losing a loved one.  In order for our project to be successful, the software must be available on multiple platforms, including Apple products, Android, PC, etc.

Funds will be used to:

- Create and maintain expert development teams dedicated to the various platforms that will support the product

- Purchase equipment and build an  infrastructure that allows for seamless and user-friendly operation (eg: dedicated servers, high-speed network connections, etc.);

- Buy best-in-class equipment to develop and continually update the application across platforms.

- Conceptualize and create graphic products (floral and other gifts) to be used within the app;

- Generate buzz and interest about the product through an ongoing comprehensive public relations campaign, which will target media outlets around the world. 

DESCRIPTION

RipCemetery will be the first virtual community where people can share their memories of their loved ones in a simple and private manner. In addition to a traditional memorial service, the online network brings family and friends together to share stories through personal messages and photos. Participants can post to the site anytime and can check back often to read messages from family and friends.   


FAMILY MEMORIAL


MEMORIES AND MESSAGES


PHOTOS AND VIDEO


FOLLOW


VIRTUAL GUEST BOOK


ILOVE


SIMPLE AND USER-FRIENDLY


PERSONAL AND PRIVATE




MOVING FORWARD

We understand there will be challenges, but feel user-adoption will be quick. RipCemetery is an extention of the traditional memorial service and provides users with another outlet as they mourn the loss of a special person.

The goal is to create an online community that is truly universal. We feel we will attract a large, diverse audience because the application is not based on religion, location and so on.

We need your support to develop, grow and market RipCemetery. This platform will allow users to build strong support networks to help them remember and honor a loved one. It will become an important part of the grieving process. 




PRESS




FAQs

1. How do I activate my account?

The RipCemetery will email you an activation link with step-by-step instructions.  


2. Can I access the platform anywhere in the world?

Yes, the RipCemetery is an international  platform and services are any time, anywhere.  


3. What if a person accidentally creates a page for the wrong person?

Simply send us a message and we will remove the page.


4. What languages is RipCemetery compatible with?

Our goal is to reach a worldwide audience. The application will be available in any language.


5. Can I upgrade my contribution?

Sure! Simply click contribute now, pay the difference and send us a note with your desired contribution package.


6. Can graphics be used more than once?

Yes, once a graphic is purchased it remains in your inventory and can be used any time you need it.


7. Can I honor pets through RipCemetery?

Yes, you will have the option to create pages for pets and share special memories of them


8. What's the Memory Wall?

The Memory Wall is a v-wall where all users can leave commemorative messages to their beloved family members and friends. Once the messages are accepted by the tomb admin, they will be included in this section and will be there forever.


9. What's the biography function?

It's a section containing the history and the most significant moments of the loved ones lives. The biography function allows for biographical inscriptions on each tombstone. 


10. What's the photo & video function?

This function allows all users to share photos and videos on their loved ones tombstones. Thanks to this feature, each user can add multimedia contents and chose who to share such contents with.


11.  What's GEO-LOCATION?

Thanks to the GEO-LOCATION function, the tomb admins can register the exact physical location of the grave, allowing all other users to localize it easily using any smartphone navigation app.


12. What's After Message function? 

The After Message function is a unique feature allowing any user to upload audio/video files or simply to leave written messages targeting other users. Such messages will be made available only after the sender's demise.


13.  How do charity initiatives work?

One of the most distinctive features of Rip Cemetery is that it will always devolve part of its profits for charity and humanitarian purposes. This way, when a user purchases an item or service on Rip Cemetery, a share will be devolved to one or more non-profit organizations chosen by the tomb admin among a plethora of proposed institutions.


14. How can I contact RipCemetery

You can find us on Indiegogo or mail info@ripcemetery.com

story:
The Big Idea

So as the go to guy for tech support from friends and family like many in my situations you got all kinds of questions. One of the most frequent questions though becomes "I want to get a new machine be it a desktop or a laptop, but what should I do with the old machine?" Inevitably that turns into "would you like my old machine?"

So this in turn got me thinking what can I do with all of this stuff? Sure you can recycle the old machines, but I kept thinking there has to be a better way. Why not re-purpose the machines for people or places in need like low income people, children, struggling college students ect..!

  • Take in old machines that are not being used or needed
  • Provide a service if needed to help people data migrate from their old device
  • Let them know I'll securely wipe their device so a worry free experience
  • Fix up and lean up the old machines and get them ready to give to people and places in need!

Not only will it help people get rid of their old machines in a meaningful way it could help stop the currently growing problem of the digital divide by providing more people with technology access through their own computer!


Places I have seen this work

Now this idea has been put in to action in other major cities around the world. In particular Nonprofit Technology Resources or NTR in Philadelphia is a non profit I would like to eventually model myself after. You can check out their offerings over at NTRWEB.ORG and I even contacted them on some advice to get things rolling.

Friends have said they have seen the profound change an organization such as NTR has done in Philadelphia, and I plan to do the same thing in Augusta, GA.


What I Need

In general other than just getting people to donate old devices the main thing would be just a general fund to pull from in case I get low on certain parts that I can't re-purpose from multiple machines to create a working one. That plus just general working tools and my investment to getting the computers to the right people and places.

$1000 is a nice amount of money to start with though obviously the bigger the fund the faster I should be able to get devices out there vs waiting for other used machines with the working parts needed.

  • Parts and tools to get the operation of the ground
  • Costs for software and licenses that could be needed
  • Also money helps with the time, organization, gas, driving ect... that will be involved to pull this off.


The Impact

With so much current reliance on computers just to get through in our daily lives helping others get access can be huge. It gives people and places the means to stay at pace with the modern age.

Step up to the world and donate to my cause and together we can help stem the tide and provide access for as many people as possible!


Risks & Challenges

One of the main challenges beyond just finding people and places is obviously the current reliance on Internet connectivity to get things done. Thankfully there are a myriad of different places that will allow you free WiFi access even if it isn't the fastest.

The other obvious hurdle is making sure you have an OS for all the computers to use. Thankfully in the modern age there are very user friendly Linux Distros that can be used if OSX or Windows isn't available, and most people mainly use the web as their tool. In this regard all the platforms have access to things like Chrome and Firefox for free so people can still have a meaningful experience no matter what!

Finally I'll personally be willing to help people get antiquated with their new devices as much as possible and get them set so they can confidently use their new computer for their needs with no hassle!


Other Ways You Can Help

The key linchpin in all of this is if you personally know me to get in contact and donate your old devices.

Also spreading the word about the campaign through word of mouth and social media can really help take the project to the next level! The more eyeballs that see this campaign the greater chance of success it will have!
story_txt:
The Big Idea
So as the go to guy for tech support from friends and family like many in my situations you got all kinds of questions. One of the most frequent questions though becomes "I want to get a new machine be it a desktop or a laptop, but what should I do with the old machine?" Inevitably that turns into "would you like my old machine?"
So this in turn got me thinking what can I do with all of this stuff? Sure you can recycle the old machines, but I kept thinking there has to be a better way. Why not re-purpose the machines for people or places in need like low income people, children, struggling college students ect..!

Take in old machines that are not being used or needed 
 Provide a service if needed to help people data migrate from their old device
 Let them know I'll securely wipe their device so a worry free experience

Fix up and lean up the old machines and get them ready to give to people and places in need!
 
Not only will it help people get rid of their old machines in a meaningful way it could help stop the currently growing problem of the digital divide by providing more people with technology access through their own computer!

Places I have seen this work
Now this idea has been put in to action in other major cities around the world. In particular Nonprofit Technology Resources or NTR in Philadelphia is a non profit I would like to eventually model myself after. You can check out their offerings over at NTRWEB.ORG and I even contacted them on some advice to get things rolling.
Friends have said they have seen the profound change an organization such as NTR has done in Philadelphia, and I plan to do the same thing in Augusta, GA.

waiting for other used machines with the working parts needed.

story:
FEMININE WEAPON is an IDENTITY, a LIFESTYLE, and a MOVEMENT that fosters empowerment and inspires women to become their best selves. Since its inception, Feminine Weapon has developed a flourishing online and offline community. We plan to expand our reach further, creating a global meeting place for women that connects and shares the stories of individuals creating positive change in themselves, their communities, and around the world.  

In July of 2012 we began producing events to enrich the lives of women through spirituality, connection, health and relationships. In 2013 we co-produced a World Sexual Health Day Celebration, Women Rock NYC and launched FeminineWeapon.com on the Eden Network. 

In 2014 we declared January 30th as Feminine Weapon Day, a day designated to Honor Your Conscious Light + Beautiful Self. To celebrate, we hosted a concert and photography exhibit at The Cutting Room in New York.

Feminine Weapon Day: January 30, 2014

Feminine Weapon Photography Series



Next, with your contribution we will expand into a product line that will express the Feminine Weapon ethos in a chic, artistic, and uplifting fashion.


Now I know what you're thinking, "What is a Feminine Weapon?"

Feminine Weapon is a selfless woman who uses her influence to positively change people and world around her. She's one who continues to seek greater knowledge, is always learning, and growing into a better version of herself. This task is never ending and her desire to receive is for the sake of sharing. 

She's a complete woman: charismatic, intelligent, honest, and ambitious, yet provocative and caring. When Feminine Weapon is channeled, dreams are within reach and darkness fades. 


Meet the Team

Christina Weber, Founder and Chief Visionary Christina Weber is the founder of and original Feminine Weapon. Ten years ago Christina made her way to New York from Maryland, seeking to begin her professional life in the land of endless opportunity. She successfully climbed the ladder working in sales, marketing and business development for established brands and start-ups. But she soon realized that the generous paycheck and accolades weren’t satisfying her inner calling. She found that calling in Feminine Weapon, and gave it all up to pursue this movement.


Manuela Rana, Photographer and Creative DirectorManuela Rana is Feminine Weapon’s creative director. She hails from Italy where she worked as a fashion photographer. Since arriving in New York she’s worked alongside the best in the industry, including Antoine Verglas of Vogue and Victoria’s Secret fame. Her work can be seen on the Feminine Weapon website where she captured the inner light and unique beauty of each woman featured in the Feminine Weapon Day Interview Series.


A.E. Fairfield, Content Director and WriterA.E. Fairfield (Ashley) is the content director and writer for Feminine Weapon. Originally from Nebraska, she now calls herself a New Yorker. She released her first novel, The Polaris Effect, last year to glowing reviews. She’s excited to be writing for Feminine Weapon and was especially inspired by the 25 fascinating women she had the opportunity to profile for the Feminine Weapon Day interview series.


What Do We Need and What Will We Do With Your Contribution?

We’re developing Feminine Weapon into a lifestyle brand with an e-commerce platform and our own brand of goods. The money raised from this campaign will cover the production process and operating costs during this early phases of development. You're literally giving us a kick start. 

Last year, Christina worked with consultant Dana Fried to develop a strategy to launch an apparel brand. Although it was in reference to another venture, the education was the same, and the outcome was a plan which covered design, manufacturing, marketing, and sales. It was determined the necessary funding for launch would range between $75,000 and $100,000. Through creative cost-cutting and partnerships, we’ve determined it’s possible to launch the FW product line for around $50,000.

With your contribution, we’ll not only be able to produce the first line, but also trademark and retain our creative director, writer, and bookkeeper. Given Christina’s expertise in marketing she’ll be handling the marketing and public relations. 


In return for your generosity, we’re offering the pre-purchase of our product line at a premium, unique experiences, and some personal time with us.


About the Product Line

First we'll recruit an artist to illustrate unique designs with our brand messages and supporting themes (see concepts below). The goal of the designs are to remind women of their inner Feminine Weapon, and inspire others to find theirs. A few of the concepts support initiatives that have spoken to our hearts and we believe are worthy of our help. A portion of our proceeds will go to these projects until they are fully funded. 

Products will be pre-produced for distribution at events, tradeshows, and partnering outlets and also printed on-demand, to avoid waste and keep our business sustainable. We will go out of our way to use only the highest quality materials and processes. When a product is ordered online, we produce it, package it and ship it - worldwide.

The following items will be part of the first product launch:

- Essentials line (tanks, tees, hoodies)

- Wall Art

- Totebags

- Note Cards 

- Jewelry

- Wine Stopper 


Design Concepts

Although we have not finalized any designs for the product line, we have concepts in mind inspired by our journey and community.

FW : Logo themed This simple logo design will draw awareness to the movement and remind you that there is a cape on your back. No fears. You can fly. 


"Aware of Her Life Desires and On a Mission to Fulfill Them"Ain't nothing going to hold back a Femininie Weapon. She's going for the gold just so she can she it with her people. This phase will be artistically laid out and will serve as your motto for life. If you don't know what you want, how can you get where you need to want to be.   


This movement isn't about guns or violence. It's about seeing yourself as a weapon for the thoughts that you have and the energies you create. Inspired by Margot B's expression of Femininie Weapon, we'll work with our illustrator to graphically articulated this message in a cool, unique way through image and design. 


"Arm Yourself With a Feminine Weapon"A few months ago a friend wrote this message on Christina's chalkboard wall and it has yet to wipe away. The Dalai Lama stated, “The World Will Be Saved By the Western Woman” and we agree. When you have a Feminine Weapon by your side, darkness turns to light, inspiration is shared, and change happens more quickly. Let's build a tsunami of women who all protect each other. 


"Peace Park"

Inspired by Activist Humaira Bachal, a panelist at Women in the World, a portion of the proceeds from the "Peace Park" graphic design will help fund the development of a park in one of the most dangerous slums in Pakistan. This park will provide children and parents a safe space to play in Karachi. 


"Ambassador to the Moon" A title given to Samantha Power, US Ambassador to the UN and humanitarian advocate, by her son will be the theme of this design. Balancing the problems of the world while being a good mother to her son, proves that it's possible to push for global change while still providing love and attentions to family and friends. 


Items from our product line may be available for pre-purchase in a perk package, including two other exclusive items:

Feminine Weapon Wine StopperThe Femininie Weapon Wine Stopper was created by Kristin Aytona and given to Christina as a gift for her birthday in 2013. This limited edition piece is available to purchase in one of our perk packages. 


FW Stud EarringsThe Feminine Weapon earring set is currently in production in New York City's jewelry district. The "FW" will go in one ear and the kerambit knife in the other ear. 

Culturally, the kerambit was popular among Indonesian women who would tie the weapon into their hair to be used in self-defense. Still to this day, silat practitioners regard it as a FEMININE WEAPON.


Besides Selling Products and Goods, How Do We Profit as a Business?

Here is the million dollar question and that one we're asked often: how does Feminine Weapon make money?

  1. Selling Feminine Weapon branded goods, starting with what's listed here and then expending into new categories. 
  2. Social Commerce; the consumer and brand experience through the Eden Network. Feminine Weapon plays well with likeminded brands, products, and goods. Brands will be able to share their story and products in an authentic way by engaging through our created and curated content. This development is a new way for marketers to reach audiences in a noninvasive way. 
  3. Our e-Commerce Platform and Affiliate Sales: We'll market and sell products and services that enhance the Feminine Weapon lifestyle.
  4. Brand Collaborations and Licensing: For instance, Everlast boxing gloves for Feminine Weapon and Under Armour athletic wear for Feminine Weapon. (Here you go universe!!)
  5. Seminars, Concerts and Events: Feminine Weapon will continue to produce ticketed experiences that connect, entertain, educate and empower both women and men. Sponsorship and marketing opportunities are offered to brands for helping us to fund these experiences.   

Over the lifetime of this campaign, we'll continue to make modifications and evolve with your feedback and support. All questions, comments and thoughts can be directly sent to us at: 

Christina Weber, Founder & Chief Visionary: cweber@feminineweapon.com

Manuela Rana, Photography & Creative Director: mrana@feminineweapon.com

A.E. Fairfield, Content Director & Writer: afairfield@feminineweapon.com


We're on a mission to awaken the world and prove dreams do come true with hard work and dedication. 

Let's grow Feminine Weapon together!


* Music by Joe Marson, Love Left in Me. Thank you, Joe! :)

story:
We're excited to be back on Indiegogo and introduce the WANDRD Travel Journal. The ultimate tool for planning, enjoying, and remembering all of your adventures – long after your memory has failed you.

 

The Travel Journal wasn't born in one of those middle of the night "light bulb" revelations. It was born over years and years of road tripping, hostel staying, food connoisseur-ing, and globe-trotting. It is literally the culmination of hundreds of flights (and missed flights), nights spent on floors, language barriers, new cultures, delicious food, questionable food, and everything else that comes with decades of international travel experience.

 

 

 

WANDRD was born when two brothers were planning trips to different parts of the world. Spencer was headed to Paris to attend and take pictures at Fashion Week, and Ryan had rented a small camper van in New Zealand for 10 days. Both were looking for the perfect camera bag to take, but after months of research (and many purchased bags) - they decided to make their own.

The PRVKE Pack was launched through crowdfunding in 2015 and over the course of two campaigns raised more than $500,000. Austin (the oldest brother) joined shortly after the first campaign because a) he didn't want to be left out of all the fun and b) to make sure that Spencer and Ryan didn't run the company into the ground.

What started out as a passion project, has turned into a thriving small company. WANDRD products have now been shipped to over 100 different countries and over 20,000 customers across the world. 

 

Let's get this out of the way right here at the beginning. We know most of you are attached to your smartphones and palm pilots. There will certainly be comments of "What?! A paper journal (gasp!) in this day and age!?" But this is a non-digital journal by design. There's just something about having a physical place to store your thoughts and memories. There's also no running out of batteries, losing service, or getting distracted by the millions of notifications trying to take over your life.

Our purpose: To influence you to wander*, cultivating an understanding of people, places, and ideas; by sharing and capturing moments.

*To wander is a state of mind as much as it is a physical action.

We may be a small team, but collectively the WANDRD family has been to over 80 countries and all 7 continents. We are our biggest customers and ultimately create the products that we want but can't find on the market. 

 

Video Song Credits: DJ Quads - Road Trip - No Copyright Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/aka-dj-quads

 

FAQ

What are the Dimensions and Weight of the Journal?

The journal is 5" x 8" x .75" and weighs 1 lb

Warranty: Does it have one?

Yes! We call it our "WANDRD MORE WORRY LESS" policy. The journals come with a limited lifetime warranty. For as long as you own the product, we will provide a warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.

It does not cover general wear and damage or by using the item for other than its intended purpose. 
Crowdfunding is an amazing tool that allows people to get their ideas off the ground. Indiegogo is not a store and our "perks" are the way that we say thank you for supporting us (and trust us, we are VERY grateful). Every dollar received from this campaign will go directly into making The Travel Journal a reality.

Shipping: What do I need to know?

DOMESTIC: 
If you're in the US, we'll be shipping your package out of our Los Angeles fulfillment center using a ground service (USPS priority, FedEx or UPS depending on destination and shipment size). These packages will have tracking information that will work within the US.

INTERNATIONAL: 
Non-US orders will ship from one of our 2 international warehouses located in London, and Hong Kong. In order to save our backers costly duties and taxes, WANDRD is going to be importing all of our products into these countries prior to shipping them to you. This means that your shipments:

1. Won't require taxes or duties in the EU and HK (other countries may have applicable duties/taxes, please check with your customs office for specific details) 
2. Will arrive quicker and have a lower chance of getting held up in customs. 
3. May have tracking, but may not be guarenteed (depending on the particular post service, of which there are too many used to name). Most commonly for EU and Asian backers, Royal Mail International or Hong Kong Post will be used.

Note that we cannot alter the value of your rewards on customs declarations - the value will be declared as the total value of the items contained in the shipment.

Return Policy?

While all of our products are guaranteed for life, we unfortunately do not offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo rewards.

The WANDRD Notebook is the perfect companion to the Travel Journal. Built from the same soft touch cover, smooth 100 GSM paper, and FSC paper. Dotted pages comprise the internals of the notebook giving you all the free space you could ever want and all the freedom you need.
 
You'll be able to add the WANDRD Notebook to your perk after the campaign ends.
 

Our purpose: To influence you to wander*, cultivating an understanding of people, places, and ideas; by sharing and capturing moments.*To wander is a state of mind as much as it is a physical action.We may be a small team, but collectively the WANDRD family has been to over 80 countries and all 7 continents. We are our biggest customers and ultimately create the products that we want but can't find on the market.    Video Song Credits: DJ Quads - Road Trip - No Copyright Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/aka-dj-quads FAQWhat are the Dimensions and Weight of the Journal?The journal is 5" x 8" x .75" and weighs 1 lbWarranty: Does it have one?Yes! We call it our "WANDRD MORE WORRY LESS" policy. The journals come with a limited lifetime warranty. For as long as you own the product, we will provide a warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.It does not cover general wear and damage or by using the item for other than its intended purpose. Crowdfunding is an amazing tool that allows people to get their ideas off the ground. Indiegogo is not a store and our "perks" are the way that we say thank you for supporting us (and trust us, we are VERY grateful). Every dollar received from this campaign will go directly into making The Travel Journal a reality.Shipping: What do I need to know?DOMESTIC: If you're in the US, we'll be shipping your package out of our Los Angeles fulfillment center using a ground service (USPS priority, FedEx or UPS depending on destination and shipment size). These packages will have tracking information that will work within the US.INTERNATIONAL: Non-US orders will ship from one of our 2 international warehouses located in London, and Hong Kong. In order to save our backers costly duties and taxes, WANDRD is going to be importing all of our products into these countries prior to shipping them to you. This means that your shipments:1. Won't require taxes or duties in the EU and HK (other countries may have applicable duties/taxes, please check with your customs office for specific details) 2. Will arrive quicker and have a lower chance of getting held up in customs. 3. May have tracking, but may not be guarenteed (depending on the particular post service, of which there are too many used to name). Most commonly for EU and Asian backers, Royal Mail International or Hong Kong Post will be used.Note that we cannot alter the value of your rewards on customs declarations - the value will be declared as the total value of the items contained in the shipment.Return Policy?While all of our products are guaranteed for life, we unfortunately do not offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo rewards.

story:
Summary:

"Thousands of tired, nerve-shaken, over-civilized people are beginning to find out that going to the mountains is going home; that wildness is a necessity; and that mountain parks and reservations are useful not only as fountains of timber and irrigating rivers, but as fountains of life." -John Muir 

Two artists, Elvia and Chrissie set out on an adventure of discovery along the vast and winding highways of the American West. Searching for a larger more complex identity interwoven into our landscape. Fueled by the desire to foster a more thoughtful and intimate relationship with Earth. This journey will be a photographic study of the intrinsic relationship between the human spirit and nature. 

The Earth calls to us every day. It is our responsibility to respond to the surrounding environment. For us, this is only the beginning of a larger exploration of what it means to be a human interconnected in the web of life. Through documentation, imagination, and observation, can we begin to make sense of ourselves and the world that we inhabit. 

For the month long journey throughout the west, our Subaru will provide shelter and guide us over 6,645 miles through a multitude of majestic landscapes, and 14 National Parks. 


Project Details:

Earth Camp is a community of artists, and explorers based in Seattle, WA. We are a growing cooperative of nature enthusiasts seeking to connect people and improve the quality of life through adventure and artistic expression. We believe in the psychological healing powers of creating art, and spending quality time strengthening our connection to the natural world.

For this exploration, our aim is to create a 60-page photography book from the view-point of two women. The book will include brief history on the places we visit, tips for travelers based on our experiences, lists of exercises and games to become more familiar with nature, diary entries, poems, and artistic color photographs from 14 of America's National Parks. The book along with framed photographs, and a performance art video will be exhibited at a collective gallery show entitled "Awakening The Soul" later this year. 

* Because we will be living and driving through the national parks for one month, all proceeds from book sales and the art show will be donated back to the Nature Conservancy or The National Parks system. 


Our Map:

 


-- Destinations--

Washington

Mt. Rainier National Park

Olympic National Park

Oregon

Mt. Hood National Forest

California

Redwood Forest

Yosemite National Park

Inyo National Forest

Joshua Tree

Utah

Zion National Park

Bryce Canyon National Park

Gila National Forest

Canyonlands National Park

Arches National Park 

Timpanogos Cave 

Arizona

Antelope Canyon

The Grand Canyon National Park

New Mexico

White Sands

Carlsbad Caverns National Park

Colorado

Mesa Verde National Park

Idaho

Craters Of The Moon

Wyoming

Yellowstone National Park

Montana

Glacier National Park


Goals for this exploration:

-Discover and share the beauty of America's landscape, as well as the history and the people who inhabit it.

-Expand our understanding of ourselves, and begin to learn how we can live more sustainable lives. 

-Inspire others to explore the environment around them. 

-Promote the psychological healing power of strengthening our connection to the natural world.

-Complete a 60-page photo book that includes writing and artistic photographs from 14 of America's National Parks. 


Where your money is going:

--$2000--

Trip expenses:
Gas, Camping Fees, Food, Parks Passes & Basic Travel Necessities 

--$1000--
 For your perks and our initial book-making materials


What you get by donating:

Supporters who donate $25 or more have the option of selecting images to be printed from Earth Camp: Exploring the West photo collection. In spring, once the journey is over and we have had time to edit the resulting art work, we will email you a digital contact sheet of 10-15 photographs to choose from in order to ensure that you receive the print  of your choice.

By contributing, you are assisting two young artists achieve one of their dreams.

We are happy to give back to you as a way of saying (a huge) thank you. Please check out the perks we are offering on the sidebar of this page! 

We appreciate any and all donations, no matter the amount. If you decide to donate an unlisted amount, we will choose the appropriate "perks" for you. Every dollar counts and helps us get one step closer to achieving our goal.  

*All donors will have their name listed in the back of the finished book. 


Other ways you can get involved!

Building a community of like-minded friends is also important to us! So please spread the word and send us an email if you are interested in getting involved with Earth Camp adventures.

So please spread the word and send us an email if you are interested in getting involved with Earth Camp adventures.

story:
The Golden Passage - A Bike Journey on the Royal Road in Brazil

 New York-based Brazilian photographer Eliseu Cavalcante is working on a documentary photo project which aims to promote the rich history of the Estrada Real, or Royal Road. The Estrada Real refers to any land that was in the process of settlement and economic exploitation during Brazil’s colonial period. The Royal Road was the only authorized way to move people and goods to the international market. Portuguese colonists in Brazil and African slaves began building the road in 1697 shortly after gold, diamonds, and other precious minerals were discovered in the present-day state of Minas Gerais. The road facilitated the movement of these resources to the coast and later, to Europe.

After the great success of his last project Esperança Terena, about a indigenous tribe in Brazil, with exhibitions at the Americas Society and Council of the Americas, Brazilian Consulate in New York and at Espasso's gallery also in New York, he decided to continue promoting the Brazilian culture outside of Brazil.

In order to be close to his subject, Cavalcante decided to carry out this project in a different way; he will ride his bike on  the Caminho Velho (Old Trail) - 441 miles between the city of Ouro Preto, Minas Gerais and Paraty, Rio de Janeiro. During this trip, he will document the landscape, architecture, culture, history and people of the Estrada Real . Cavalcante believes that the beauty of the Estrada Real makes it one of the most interesting places to travel in Brazil. In addition to the magnificent landscape, the history behind the trails is inspiring. Cavalcante will shoot photos of both landscapes and people to show that the precious minerals are not the land’s real riches.


Samples of previous projects

Esperança Terena: I did this project in 2013. The project aims to bring awareness about the issue of indigenous land rights in Brazil. You can see more photos and info here.


Sewage in Rio de Janeiro: This photograph is part of a project that Rachel Glickhouse, my wife, and I did for GlobalPost in Rio de Janeiro about the water quality/sanitation problem in Guanabara Bay. The project led us into Rocinha, Latin America’s largest slum. To see the gallery, please click here.

This photograph was taken during the Occupy Times Square in 2011. For more of this series, click here.


What We Need & What You Get


We need your help to fund this project which is the travel cost itself. We want to be very clear about the costs, so here is the breakdown:

  • Flights - $2122
  • Lodging and meals (for 2.5 weeks) - $2500
  • Extras (taxis, local buses and rentals) - $500
  • Total: $5,400

To thank you for helping us with this project, here are the perks for donations:

_____________________


This video made by ODIN | Visual Storytelling shows a bit about the Estrada Real;

Trip and Project Details

We are planning to do this project at the end of January 2015. It will be a 2.5 or 3 week journey, depending on weather conditions, riding the 441 miles from Ouro Preto (Minas Gerais) to Paraty (Rio de Janeiro).

Of the 441 miles, the route is divided by:10% paved roads, 1.5% rocks (old pavement), 6% trails, and 82.5% unpaved road (dirt).

The main focus is to share with the world the history of the Estrada Real through images and text. 

We will be shooting portraits and conducting interviews, from the rural areas down to the coast, with the people who are the direct descendants of the  slaves who actually built the road and the people who moved from different states searching for gold and precious minerals. Those portraits will show how people live in 2014, around 300 years after the road started to be built.

Along the original winding road and within the irregular layout following the contours of the landscape lie squares, buildings, residences, fountains, bridges and churches which showcase Baroque architecture. Many of the towns are listed as UNESCO World Heritage sites due to their beauty and cultural significance.

We really need your help to make this beautiful work to come alive!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t donate, you can still help:

·  PLEASE get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.

·  Share it on Facebook, Twitter and social media.

Again, thank you so much for being a part of this!

story:
This App incorporates the best features of social media apps already present in the market. Selecting the option "see you", (see the 2nd image below) you can filter the user profiles interesting for you. Chat either with a single person, or  add participants  to the existing chat,  to create a bigger group with common interests to meet. WeMeetApp is perfect for the places you dont know anyone, The App is really useful as well when you are in your hometown and your friends dont want to do any plan.

*All the following screens are only a layout. They are not designed and decorated.

This screen is which makes unique WeMeetApp and  the main difference with other Social Media Apps. WeMeetApp filters the plan for you and make user experience much more confortable and easier than other Apps.

Sign in very simple and fast by login with Facebook.

WeMeetApp will have a very intuitive and easy menus to offer the users the best posible experience.

 

This App will revolutionize the way we socialize. We will be able to break cultural barriers and make plans everywhere with interesting people. The App will allow users to have all kind of new and amazing experiences in their lives and take to another level our friendship circles due to the facility that offers to connect with people with your same interests.

 

 

*Also we will donate 8% of future net profits to charity for child cancer investigation.

 

We need the money to be sure we have the best developers and designers to make an applicattion that works without bugs and perfectly fluent to give users the best posible experience with the app.

  • 82% of the money will be destinated to developers and designers team,to create a high quality App which offers users the best experience posible.
  • 16%  of the amount is for organize and make a solid infrastructure that allow us to carry out an efficient promotion of our product, and make us posible to offer it all over the world.
  • 2% are for the costs of maintenance and formalities needed to publish it.

We are three friends, two from Spain and the third one from Poland. We love travelling and making new projects. In addition we have notable experience working at the innovation field. We combined such points and here is the result!

 

  

  • Is this a dating App?

- Definitely not, there won't even be a gender filter. This app is for connecting people who want to do the same plans as you.  Also group plans are available.

  • What's the difference between this app and others?

- The main difference is to make a plan from the very beginning  what allows users save time. Another great featured is to have a chance to invite additional people and organize a plan together as a group. 

  • If I do a group will I lose the conversation of the person i was talking to?​​

- No, if you create a group with another person, the chat of both of you will prevail and a new group chat will be created.

  • How can we follow your process?​

- We will send you weekly e-mails of the phase our product is. In addition you can follow us in our Social Medias and find out all our steps.

  • How much will cost the App?

​- The App will be totally free with all its functions. Also there will be in the future a premium function which grant some special privileges.

  • What features will incorporate the premium function?

​- It is not definite but we've been thinking the posibility that everyone who has the premium version will be able to search people in a place where they aren't in that moment jet, have unlimited "see you"... We are open for your suggestions.

story:
Hey whitewater world! We’ve launched a really useful mobile app for the paddlers around the globe.

Read it in Español, Français, Deutsch.

Now it takes around 1 minute to choose a paddling section and to get all the necessary details about the section.

  

 

The app is already functioning with paddling areas continuously being updated. Try it now for Android and iOS devices.

Whitewater.guide is an international solution for the whole whitewater community and it’s always in your hand. And now we need the help of you to introduce the new features and content.

The new features will turn the app into an everyday tool for any whitewater enthusiast. If we reach the goal of this campaign we promise to introduce these features

Logbook will allow you to remember the runs and leave notes. It’s an important tool to track your own progress and structure the memories. People use it a lot in fitness, climbing and many other outdoor activities. So why not kayaking? We are going to change this with your help.

User content means everybody will be able to add runs into the app. We will maintain moderation system so no junk will be admitted. We believe that it’s one of the important steps on the way to the best global whitewater app.

 

Having a beer or doing a shuttle after a great run you’ll be able to add important notes for your buddies and the whole community. Water level updates, new trees, avalanches and other beta. Let’s help each other!

If we reach the goal of the campaign we will introduce these features until May, 2020.

If we the crowdfunding campaign is successful we will fill in the following regions

Norway. Full information on the Norwegian rivers based on the famous book Whitewater Guide for Norway by Jens Klatt and Olaf Obsommer. We will also update this info and add more rivers brought by Mariann Saether and other contributors.

Quebec. At least 50 best sections by Andrew Oxley and others. We might add Ontario as well. We already have access to all Canadian water level gauges.

 

Italy. At least 70 best sections in the Northern Italy and Ticino.

Austria. At least 80 best sections in Austria, Southern Germany and East Switzerland. By Stefan Schornsteiner, Andi Andi and Mike Krutyansky.

Briancon area in France.

Pyrenees. At least 100 sections. By Quim Fontané Masó, Alex Gale, Whitewater Pyrenees guidebook and Mike Krutyansky.

 

 New Zealand. At least 50 best sections. By Seb Judd and rivers.org.nz

 

 Chile. Information based on the "Whitewater Chile" guidebook.

 

Together with the contributors we also have plans to add Sweden, different parts of the UK, parts of the US, BC and Ontario in Canada, Ukraine, Peru, Uganda and Zambia.

We do understand the importance of having the US regions in the app but we don't have the contributors yet. Are you ready to commit and fill in you region in exchange for an ad or money? We could add another goal and perk to this campaign now! Just drop us a message.

We need a bit of money.

We don’t need money to launch the app because it’s already out there and you can use it for free! Isn’t that a proof of our capability?

But we do ask you for money to add new regions and features. The more money we collect now the more regions and features we’ll be able to introduce. We’ll be able to pay the contributors and the developers.

Konstantin the developer works a lot in his spare time. This work has to be paid. We need resources to develop new features and maintain the app.

That’s how we’ll use the funds

The diagram is an estimation. Our expenses and the platform fees vary depending on the amount of different perks purchased.

We also need contributors. Do you want to describe rivers in your region? Are you planning to publish a guidebook but you need resources? Contact us NOW and we might add your idea to the stretch goals of this campaign. In future we are going to open-source the app. If you want to help with development and design right now, feel free to contact.

If we get more money

 

In return for your contributions, we’ll offer you some paid content in the app. It’s way cheaper now than later! Only now it's possible to get a pack like "all Europe" and "all the world". You can also influence on the amount of information we will add to the app. 

Click on the descriptions of the perks in another section of this page!

If we don’t offer a region that you need it doesn’t mean you shouldn’t contribute! If we reach the goal of this campaign any user will be able to add new section with full descriptions. One day your region will be covered by a group of enthusiasts!

Look at the first cheapest perk 

For €5 you will help the whole community to get a better tool for whitewater trips.

If we receive more than 100 €5 purchases we will add user ratings for sections and 1 more random FREE region to the app. Vote for you region!

If we receive more than 200 €5 purchases we will add useful static information on top of the mentioned above. First aid and rescue manuals, various how-to's.

Apart from that we will publicly thank you on a special page in the app and share it in social media.

Get a Vanoi AkSu paddle if you want to hold something in your hands! We offer a 10% discount on the paddle, free shipping within Europe and free premium of the whole app. It's a high quality carbon prepreg one. The paddle is a 2-piece one with a plastic connection unit. The money from this purchase will go towards the app.

Update June, 26

From now on we also offer premium access to the full mobile app based guidebook to the White Nile (Uganda) and Zambezi (Zambia). The information is kindly provided by LiLi. Check out their whitewater trip.

 

The purchases are valid for the lifetime. After the campaign is over you will receive a promo code(s) to activate them on a special page and get the access to the specific premium content of the app.

It’s kind of ok that an old-school hardcore guidebook costs $15-$40. We offer a new way more efficient approach. The app is free and so are many of the regions. For some regions we charge $5-$15 to pay the authors for their hours and days spent filling in the content. For this money you get much more than an old-school guidebook had to offer.

Note that the basic river info is available for free for everyone even in the premium regions. You pay for the detailed descriptions, offline and copy buttons for the coordinates of the put-ins and the take-outs.

 

 

Konstantin Kuznetcov is a professional software developer with 10+ years of experience. He is a whitewater kayaker.

Mike Krutyansky is a kayaker with 15+ years of experience. He has organised numerous whitewater trips and expeditions to dozens of destinations around the globe. Mike has introduced the whitewater guidebooks for Galicia and Portugal, Kyrgyzstan and Tajikistan in the whitewater.guide app. Mike is travelling around the globe for paddling almost non-stop. He has an experience of managing other outdoor online projects. Mike is in charge of content, marketing and communication.

Right now there are more than 20 people from around the globe contributing to the app.

We donate 1% of all the money collected with this campaign to the Free Rivers Fund. These guys successfully protect the rivers from dams around the globe and especially in Europe. 

Another 1% goes to the Ecuadorian Rivers Institute. They are fighting for the rio Piatua right now.

AkSu is a young Italian brand bringing high quality pre-preg carbon paddles to the market. We offer a great deal on the Vanoi paddles and the content of the app.

The Pictures are by Irina Maximova, RTP project, Emily Ward, Motohurma. Video shots from RTP project, Sven Laemmler, Enduro__girl, ww_school.ru, Suslov S. and the whitewater.guide app team. Music: Geographer - Sky Scraper

Check out our media and updates on  Facebook and  Instagram.
story_txt:
Hey whitewater world! We’ve launched a really useful mobile app for the paddlers around the globe.Read it in Español, Français, Deutsch.Now it takes around 1 minute to choose a paddling section and to get all the necessary details about the section.   The app is already functioning with paddling areas continuously being updated. Try it now for Android and iOS devices.Whitewater.guide is an international solution for the whole whitewater community and it’s always in your hand. And now we need the help of you to introduce the new features and content.The new features will turn the app into an everyday tool for any whitewater enthusiast. If we reach the goal of this campaign we promise to introduce these featuresLogbook will allow you to remember the runs and leave notes. It’s an important tool to track your own progress and structure the memories. People use it a lot in fitness, climbing and many other outdoor activities. So why not kayaking? We are going to change this with your help.User content means everybody will be able to add runs into the app. We will maintain moderation system so no junk will be admitted. We believe that it’s one of the important steps on the way to the best global whitewater app. Having a beer or doing a shuttle after a great run you’ll be able to add important notes for your buddies and the whole community. Water level updates, new trees, avalanches and other beta. Let’s help each other!If we reach the goal of the campaign we will introduce these features until May, 2020.If we the crowdfunding campaign is successful we will fill in the following regions Norway. Full information on the Norwegian rivers based on the famous book Whitewater Guide for Norway by Jens Klatt and Olaf Obsommer. We will also update this info and add more rivers brought by Mariann Saether and other contributors.Quebec. At least 50 best sections by Andrew Oxley and others. We might add Ontario as well. We already have access to all Canadian water level gauges. Italy. At least 70 best sections in the Northern Italy and Ticino.Austria. At least 80 best sections in Austria, Southern Germany and East Switzerland. By Stefan Schornsteiner, Andi Andi and Mike Krutyansky.Briancon area in France.Pyrenees. At least 100 sections. By Quim Fontané Masó, Alex Gale, Whitewater Pyrenees guidebook and Mike Krutyansky.  New Zealand. At least 50 best sections. By Seb Judd and rivers.org.nz  Chile. Information based on the "Whitewater Chile" guidebook. Together with the contributors we also have plans to add Sweden, different parts of the UK, parts of the US, BC and Ontario in Canada, Ukraine, Peru, Uganda and Zambia.We do understand the importance of having the US regions in the app but we don't have the contributors yet. Are you ready to commit and fill in you region in exchange for an ad or money? We could add another goal and perk to this campaign now! Just drop us a message.We need a bit of money.We don’t need money to launch the app because it’s already out there and you can use it for free! Isn’t that a proof of our capability?But we do ask you for money to add new regions and features. The more money we collect now the more regions and features we’ll be able to introduce. We’ll be able to pay the contributors and the developers.Konstantin the developer works a lot in his spare time. This work has to be paid. We need resources to develop new features and maintain the app.That’s how we’ll use the fundsThe diagram is an estimation. Our expenses and the platform fees vary depending on the amount of different perks purchased.We also need contributors. Do you want to describe rivers in your region? Are you planning to publish a guidebook but you need resources? Contact us NOW and we might add your idea to the stretch goals of this campaign. In future we are going to open-source the app. If you want to help with development and design right now, feel free to contact.If we get more money In return for your contributions, we’ll offer you some paid content in the app. It’s way cheaper now than later! Only now it's possible to get a pack like "all Europe" and "all the world". You can also influence on the amount of information we will add to the app. Click on the descriptions of the perks in another section of this page!If we don’t offer a region that you need it doesn’t mean you shouldn’t contribute! If we reach the goal of this campaign any user will be able to add new section with full descriptions. story:
A Light When You Need It Most. Our design is made of beautiful machined and anodized aluminum and is smallest, lightest, more durable, and more comfortable than ever before. There's an also Magnetic Base for hands-free use option.

Magnetic Base. Hands-free Use

Extending the light’s functionality, the magnet can be attached to metal surfaces for hands-free.

Waterproof

Sometimes travelling can be full of unexpected 'wet-surprises', like heading to the beach or getting caught in a tropical downpour, or someone splashing you into the pool.

Carproof

An Everyday Carry

YSMART is small enough to carry wherever you go. WOW! Your sports bag, your jacket, and even attach to your keys, Perfect match for any indoor or outdoor activities. It’s interesting that your buddy finds out you’re carrying such a mini but functional cool stuff.

YSMART will feature a quick 90-degree rotation that is spring-locked for secure on/off operation. The YSMART will not unlatch even under the most vigorous conditions.

Who We Are

Now For the Nitty-gritty

Wow, you've really made your way down the page. Maybe that's because you're looking for more details. Well, lucky for you we didn't spare a single one.

story:
Introducing H-Pillow: The Dream-Worthy Travel Pillow

Travel is about more than just the destination, it’s about the journey. And a stiff neck or sore joints is never the optimal start to a journey.

Don't you just hate sitting down for a long flight or train ride and trying everything you can think of to get comfortable with no luck? We've all been there.

For the first bulk of your flight, you try different positions and attempt to get comfortable. Laying forward, resting your head against the window, leaning on a friend, and the options go on and on. But the neck falls, your head droops, and it's anything but ideal. It's that moment – the one when you wake up from your neck dangling down– when you wish there was a better solution. One that makes sleeping for long periods of time while seated both comfortable and pleasant. 

Well... lucky for you, there is!

Ergonomic & lightweight design

We experienced the same exact frustrations as you and took it upon ourselves to fix the problem. We did some research and found the key elements that contribute to the ultimate travel pillow. Then we took those elements and put them into a single pillow, the H-Pillow: 

​

A good travel pillow is about more than supporting the neck and head.  

H-Pillow offers:

  • Incredibly breathable material - no more waking up sweaty or hot around your neck. The H-Pillow is made out of breathable material that doesn't overheat the longer you use it. So you can use it for 5 minutes or 5 hours and feel no difference in temperature. 

  • Absorption to withstand constant motion - don't you just hate it when the flight turbulence or sudden car stops disturb your sleep? Thanks to the H-Pillow's memory foam cushion, motion is absorbed so you have a peaceful rest with little disturbances. 

  • Ergonomic & lightweight design - the H-Pillow is extremely compact and lightweight, because we know, the last thing you fee like bringing with you is more stuff. The H-Pillow can also be folded and packed away into a small bag for your convenience.  

  • Great neck & head support - as the most important aspect of a good travel pillow, we of course took neck and head support seriously when designing the H-Pillow. The pillow offers excellent support to leave you feeling rejuvenated.

Simply put. It's the most comfortable pillow, ever!

With thousands of H-Pillows already produced & in stock, you will receive yours in no time!

 
Since it has a revolutionary "H" shape, the H-pillow can be used in many different ways. You can lean forward and rest your head on the pillow and your hands under it (without them getting squished), or you can use it when sitting up against a seat. No more falling and drooping heads – the struggle for restful sleep is over! 
Take the H-Pillow with you everywhere you go. It folds up into a compact pouch that's lightweight and small enough to comfortably carry no matter if you're in the park, on a flight, at home, or on a long train ride. 
 
 
 
The H-Pillow also comes with a removable and washable cover. So if it gets dropped or dirty, just slip of the cover, throw it in the wash, and you have yourself a fresh new pillow! 
 

Perks

 

Timeline

We're happy to bring you the H-Pillow – the ultimate in comfort, design, and durability. With its innovative H-shape, not only is your neck and head supported, but your back is kept upright too. No back pain, no stiff neck, no sweating, and no sleepless journeys. 

What do you get? 

The most restful and enjoyable travel!

 

FAQ:

How do you fold the pillow?

  1. Put the H-Pillow on a flat surface
  2. Pull in one corner of the pillow towards the center
  3. Pull in the side closest to it on top of it
  4. Gently slide the folded sides right into the carry-bag
  5. Follow the same steps with the 2nd side of the H-Pillow
  6. Once fully in the bag, pull the string to tighten the bag

Can the H-Pillow be washed?

Sure can. Just take off the covering, throw it into the wash, and slip it back over your H-Pillow when you’re done. It’s that simple!

What about shipping?

Orders will ship as soon as the campaign finishes, and you will receive your H-Pillow shortly after!

How long will it take to get to me?

15-25 days once it has left our warehouse.

Do you ship worldwide?

Yes, we want everyone everywhere to be able to use the H-Pillow.

Can I choose a specific color for my pillow?

As of now we are offering two different colors. You can choose to get your H-Pillow in red or grey.


 

Does the H-Pillow come with a warranty?

Yes, it does come with a 100% warranty.

How do I contact you?

Feel free to reach out with questions or comments: support@hpillow.com

story:
Mass Maelstrom is a skater owned and operated Men’s Roller Derby Association League established in 2010.

Mass Maelstrom is currently ranked 8th in the Men's Roller Derby Association and as a result, Mass Maelstrom has been invited to Gateway to the Best, 2012 MRDA Championships!

The top eight teams have earned an invitation to compete October 20 and 21 in Ballwin, Missouri to determine who the 2012 Champion will be.

We have been working hard on and off the track to improve as a team, moving from unranked in 2011 to 8th in the country in 2012.

In August, we earned second place at the Mohawk Valley Cup in Rome, New York, hosted by the Quadfathers. We are excited to travel to Saint Louis to take on the top Men's Roller Derby Association teams in what is sure to be an exciting weekend.

Travel expenses to get to Saint Louis are high, and our vikings need all the help we can get! Please donate and/or share our page and help us get the word out!

If you won't be in St. Louis for chanpionships, be sure to watch us on the live internet broadcast throughout the course of the event.

The top eight teams have earned an invitation to compete October 20 and 21 in Ballwin, Missouri to determine who the 2012 Champion will be.
We have been working hard on and off the track to improve as a team, moving from unranked in 2011 to 8th in the country in 2012.
In August, we earned second place at the Mohawk Valley Cup in Rome, New York, hosted by the Quadfathers. We are excited to travel to Saint Louis to take on the top Men's Roller Derby Association teams in what is sure to be an exciting weekend.
Travel expenses to get to Saint Louis are high, and our vikings need all the help we can get! Please donate and/or share our page and help us get the word out!
If you won't be in St. Louis for chanpionships, be sure to watch us on the live internet broadcast throughout the course of the event.

story:
A 66-block and 110-block tool on your keychain? Too good to be true!

If you're like me, you often find yourself having to deal with phone or data wiring unexpectedly, without your toolkit handy.

Wouldn't it be nice if your toolkit fit on a keychain? 

This Keychain Punchdown Tool is the first step towards that. Slip it into your pocket next to your favorite multi-tool and you'll never have to wedge your screwdriver into a 66-block again, nor lug around a huge toolkit everywhere!

Complete your keychain kit with the fine SuperLooper and Leatherman Squirt (I'm not affiliated with them in any way.)

The Keychain Punchdown uses the same twist-lock bits and locking mechanism that your favorite full-size tool uses, but replaces the bulky handle with a minimalist aluminum handle. The keychain D-ring rotates out of the way to let you hold the rounded back of the tool in your palm and punch wires into 110- and 66-blocks to your heart's content.

In fact, my experience with the prototype shows that with a sharp bit this tool can actually provide better handling and require less energy; the typical spring-loaded mechanisms are frequently overkill and under-precise. With this tool, you simply press the cutting side into the panel and feel the satisfying snap of the wire, no grunting or loud noises! When the bit eventually it gets dull, industry-standard replacement blades are readily available at your favorite store or online.

Make your coworkers jealous! Be quick on the draw with this tool and future keychain telecom tools forthcoming.

Your support to make this happen (and feedback to improve the state of our industry) is super awesome and appreciated!

Q&A:

Will the sharp bit poke me in the leg?
Not likely! I've been carrying the above-pictured prototype in my pocket for months; in fact it's in my pocket now and I don't notice it next to my keychain Leatherman. The bit is sharp, but then again keys aren't exactly cuddly themselves. In any case I've had no discomfort.

The tool should have a cap!
Good suggestion! However, this will add to production cost and caps tend to get lost anyway (see: thumb drive caps.) Plus, I'm a big fan of simplicity and I haven't wished for a cap since putting this thing in my pocket months ago...

story:
We are back! 

Hey Indiegogo! In 2019 we launched our very first product, the BN001 - Searchable hiking pants. The launch was a success and our project was funded in less than 24 hours. Now we are back for our 2nd round here on Indiegogo, launching our further development based on the BN001, the BN002 - Zip Off pants. 

We're Beyond Nordic. An outdoor brand developed by hiking fanatics Patrik Tankred and Johannes Franzén, two outdoor enthusiasts with thousands of wildlife hours in their resume. We thought the industry of hiking pants was outdated, and felt the market needed something more! Better fit, cleaner design, and updated features! We collected all our favorite specs and props from famous outdoor brands around the globe, added the features we'd been missing, adapted the design to fit in today's demands and Voila, Beyond Nordic! We will make our absolute best to answer all your questions and we will also gladly take your feedback for future product development.

Hope to see you as a backer of our awesome project!

/Patrik & Johannes 

BN002 - Searchable Zip-Off pants? Tell me all about it!

The BN002 is a re-development of our previous model, the BN001. The idea of the BN002 actually came to live thank's to backers right on this platform, asking for a zip-off version of the BN001. Basically what we offer is a top of the line quality hiking pant, searchable with the RECCO system in case of emergencies, and with the availability to zip the lower part off, making the pants into a pair of awesome hiking shorts. The pants are packed with useful features and gadgets, and the high durability fabric will lasts for years. Let's start with having a look at our collection below..

 

See what our previous backers have to say!

 

WHEN TO USE?

  • Hiking
  • Dogwalking
  •  Carpenting or other craftsmans tasks 
  • MTB
  • Hunting
  • Fishing
  • Traveling
  • Always?

 

FEATURES PLEASE

The BN002 - Zip Off pants are packed with useful features and solutions that will make your dayhike, or weeklong adventure into a pleasant ride. The smart hiking pants allows you to focus 100% on your adventure, rather than worrying about your gear. 

 

WHAT IS RECCO? 

Safety first, right? Feeling safe when visiting remote places allows you to focus on the adventure, rather than worrying about anything else. This is why we have equipped this pants with an integrated RECCO® reflector.

The RECCO detector emits a radar signal, like a beam from a flashlight. When hit by the signal the reflector bounces a signal back to the detector. The RECCO reflectors require no power and no activation to function. The RECCO system is global, used by more than 800 ski resorts, SAR teams and helicopter bases around the world

Check out the promo video from RECCO on the link below:

 

Materials

In outdoor clothing, there is a few key factors that you  need to consider when choosing materials for your garment. You want the product to be durable, yet not too stiff and thick. Water recistancy is important, as well as the opportunity to move freely and be flexible when you are out there. Our pants are produced in 2 different sort of fabric. Soft Touch Nylon as well as a micro fabric in 4-way stretch. The fabric is fluorocarbon free DWR* treated for extra water repellency, and exposed parts of the pants is also re-inforced with dual as well as triple layers for extra durability.

*More about DWR

All our fabrics are treated with Durable Water Repellent (DWR). The treatment is free from fluorocarbon, which makes it sustainable. Impregnation with DWR means that a very thin layer of coating is applied on top of the fabric, preventing water from being absorbed by the fabric fibers and instead making the water rinse off.

 

OUR OFFER

Pre-launching this product on Indiegogo, enables us to offer you a kick-ass offer, far from the listed price that we will apply later on when the product is launched in our e-commerce. Check out our full offers in the different perks presented.

 

Some more testimonials from our previous campaign

 

Design & Tech Files

We truly believe in functionality, and this is probably the reason why it took us almost 18 months of constant updating, changing and adding new features to our design. Countless shipments and re-modeling of sample pants have taken place before we finally found our perfect match. Below you can see the final Tech file for the BN001, now updated with the Zip-Off system.

 

LET´S TALK SIZES

Have a look in our sizing table below, make sure you do your measurements thoroughly, this sizing table is final, and will not change during or after the campaign. Are you a previous customer/backer to our outdoor pants? Please re-check the table and your measurements since it has been updated for this release. Check out the full size chart HERE

What improvements and updates has been made on the gear since your previous campaign with the BN001?

On this new version, we have made some significant improvements in the fabric material, and we also made the sizing more generous (based on reviews from previous backers and customers). But most importantly, we have designed the pants with a zip-off function, meaning you get 2 garments in 1. Check out the full list below for all the new stuff and improvements made:

- Zip Off function. With an easy zip you can transform your pants into an awesome pair of hiking shorts.

- Size table improvement. We want everyone to be able to enjoy our pants. Based on feedback and input from customers and backers from around the world that bought  our previous pants model, we have now made our sizing table more generous, without loosing the tailored fit! See our new sizing table above. Note that this is the final table, and no changes will occur during the campaign or after.

- Increased width of belt loops from 35 to 45 mm.

- Updated zipper system on the vent zips and pocket zips.

- Increased size of the thigh-pockets, wider opening of pockets

- New stretch fabric with even more stretch, super comfy!

- Improved Soft Max Nylon fabric, more durable, more dirt and fur hair repelant.

 

WHEN IS THE DELIVERY?

Delivery for our Indiegogo In-demand campaign are set to start in November and end in December. This means you will be getting your trousers before Christmas in most cases. 

 

PRICING

Our goal is to produce a pair of pants with all the benefits you get when buying a great quality outdoor pants at your local outdoor shop, but for a fraction of the price you pay there. By cutting out all the dealers, distributors, agents and stores and selling DIRECT to you, our customer, we can actually do just that. The priced offered here at Kickstarter is a Kickstarter/runway price ONLY. When our campaign is over, the price will be increased with appx 40-50% in our own E-commerce. But, that will still be a very competitive price compared to the rest of the outdoor industry!

Feel free to compare us to the rest of the market, we dare to promise that you won't find the same quality at the same price anywhere else

FUNDING GOAL AND IDEA

This is our 2nd runway for launching a product for Beyond Nordic outdoor. We believe strongly that there is room out there for a fresh and rethinking outdoor brand. With a successful launched campaign we can continue our work on developing our collection and add more designs into our line of production. We offer a highly discounted introduction price, in a way to raise more funds for developing of the brand and new products.

SOCIAL MEDIA

Our goal is to build up at great community where we can connect and discuss future development, best hikes, weather and whatever with all our backers and future customers. Follow us on Social Media to stay up-to-date on all news, discounts and what´s in the loop!

Visit our INSTAGRAM or FACEBOOK now to check it out!  

 

And some more customer reviews! 

 

Other ways you can contribute

Not ready or possible to buy a pair of pants, but still like what we do? Please help spread the words about Beyond Nordic and our campaign, by using the Indiegogo sharing tools! All the help we can get is much appreciated!

Thank you for showing interest in Beyond Nordic - Future Of Scandinavian Outdoor

//Patrik & Johannes

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
story_txt:
We are back! Hey Indiegogo! In 2019 we launched our very first product, the BN001 - Searchable hiking pants. The launch was a success and our project was funded in less than 24 hours. Now we are back for our 2nd round here on Indiegogo, launching our further development based on the BN001, the BN002 - Zip Off pants.  We're Beyond Nordic. An outdoor brand developed by hiking fanatics Patrik Tankred and Johannes Franzén, two outdoor enthusiasts with thousands of wildlife hours in their resume. We thought the industry of hiking pants was outdated, and felt the market needed something more! Better fit, cleaner design, and updated features! We collected all our favorite specs and props from famous outdoor brands around the globe, added the features we'd been missing, adapted the design to fit in today's demands and Voila, Beyond Nordic! We will make our absolute best to answer all your questions and we will also gladly take your feedback for future product development.Hope to see you as a backer of our awesome project!/Patrik & Johannes BN002 - Searchable Zip-Off pants? Tell me all about it!The BN002 is a re-development of our previous model, the BN001. The idea of the BN002 actually came to live thank's to backers right on this platform, asking for a zip-off version of the BN001. Basically what we offer is a top of the line quality hiking pant, searchable with the RECCO system in case of emergencies, and with the availability to zip the lower part off, making the pants into a pair of awesome hiking shorts. The pants are packed with useful features and gadgets, and the high durability fabric will lasts for years. Let's start with having a look at our collection below.. See what our previous backers have to say! WHEN TO USE?
Hiking
Dogwalking
 Carpenting or other craftsmans tasks 
MTB
Hunting
Fishing
Traveling
Always?
 FEATURES PLEASEThe BN002 - Zip Off pants are packed with useful features and solutions that will make your dayhike, or weeklong adventure into a pleasant ride. The smart hiking pants allows you to focus 100% on your adventure, rather than worrying about your gear.  WHAT IS RECCO? Safety first, right? Feeling safe when visiting remote places allows you to focus on the adventure, rather than worrying about anything else. This is why we have equipped this pants with an integrated RECCO® reflector.The RECCO detector emits a radar signal, like a beam from a flashlight. When hit by the signal the reflector bounces a signal back to the detector. The RECCO reflectors require no power and no activation to function. The RECCO system is global, used by more than 800 ski resorts, SAR teams and helicopter bases around the worldCheck out the promo video from RECCO on the link below: MaterialsIn outdoor clothing, there is a few key factors that you  need to consider when choosing materials for your garment.
