story:
Designed specially to help you in case of emergency or any other unpredictable situation.

We’ve developed the Meddsy kit based on knowledge and experience of professional travelers, doctors, soldiers, rescuers, and survival experts.

 

STRETCH GOALS

 

 

 

70 ITEMS TO COVER ALL MAJOR EMERGENCIES

When it comes to survival gear, first aid kits are one of the most overlooked preparedness items out there. We know, they aren’t as fun to talk about as survival knives, bug out bags, and firearms; but when it comes to practical emergency preparedness items, the reality of the situation is that your medical kit is probably going to get more use that any other items in your survival stash.

 

FEATURED IN

 

 

STRUCTURE

 

 

 

 

FIRST AID MEDICINES INSIDE

 

Ibuprofen tablets, extra-strength non-aspirin tablets, aspirin tablets, insect sting relief pads, antibiotic ointment packs, alcohol cleaning pads, bzk antiseptic towelettes, antiseptic treatment application, first aid cream packs, burn relief pack, plastic bandages, fabric bandages, patch bandages, instant cold compress, emergency blanket, moleskin squares, butterfly wound closures, finger splints, first aid tape rolls, trauma pad, sterile eye pad, gauze dressing pads, roller gauze, adhesive tape, thermometer (one time use), nitrile gloves, scissors, tweezers, cotton-tipped applicators, durable clear-pocket softpack.

 

 

ITEMS PICKED BY OUR TEAM AND BASED ON THE PROFESSIONAL EXPERTISE

 

digital thermometer, water filter travel straw, dental instant pain relief and temporarily repairs lost fillings kits, elastic kinesiology therapeutic tape, splint, cold and flu medicines, intestinal absorbent, colitis and diarrhea/intestinal infection treatment, allergy relief tablets, acid reducer tablets, advanced clotting sponge, respiratory stimulant, syringes, sewing kit, particulate respirator, safety eyewear, survival water bags, quick release tourniquet, hand and toes warmers, acupressure wrist bandage, CPR mask, duct tape, pathogenic microorganisms fighter, condoms.

Special for Indiegogo backers – vietnamese Golden Star balm

 

 

PLEDGES

 

SIZES AND MATERIALS

The Meddsy case is made with eco-friendly, hypoallergenic, recycled, durable materials that are scratch resistant, waterproof, and anti-shock.

 

MEDDSY CREATION

 

 

TIMELINE

 

 

TEAM

 

 

WHY ARE WE CROWDFUNDING

RISKS & CHALLENGES

 

 

 

FAQ:


How much does Meddsy weigh?
Meddsy Expert pack weigh is 3,5 kg (about 7,7 pounds)

Battery Information?
There are LiPol batteries with low self-discharge inside the core. Overall capacity is 13000 mah.
Output voltage:
2x USB - 5v---2A
CC/CV output - 12v/15v/19v
Car start terminal - 12v

Is Meddsy Slash-proof?
Sure, Meddsy has slash-proof surface.

Can I take Meddsy on an airplane?
You can take Meddsy kit on the airplane but be sure that you have all prescription on you custom medicines and they are not prohibited in the destination country. 

What comes in the box?
MEDDSY Basic: Meddsy case, multi section organizer, 2x pill containers, 2x pocket boxes, rescue container(includes: whistle, compass, multi-tool, fire starter, wire saw, pocket tool), power core with adapters, lightweight pouch, visual communication tool, visual checklist for disasters, first aid guide.
MEDDSY Advanced: Basic + first aid medicines according to Red Cross recommendations: ibuprofen tablets, extra-strength non-aspirin tablets, aspirin tablets, insect sting relief pads, antibiotic ointment packs, alcohol cleaning pads, bzk antiseptic towelettes, antiseptic treatment application, first aid cream packs, burn relief pack, plastic bandages, fabric bandages, patch bandages, instant cold compress, emergency blanket, moleskin squares, butterfly wound closures, finger splints, first aid tape rolls, trauma pad, sterile eye pad, gauze dressing pads, roller gauze, adhesive tape, thermometer (one time use), nitrile gloves, scissors, tweezers, cotton-tipped applicators, durable clear-pocket softpack.
MEDDSY Expert: Advanced + ammonia inhalant, digital thermometer, water filter travel straw, dental instant pain relief and temporarily repairs lost fillings kits, elastic kinesiology therapeutic tape, splint, cold and flu medicines, intestinal absorbent, colitis and diarrhea/intestinal infection treatment, allergy relief tablets, acid reducer tablets, advanced clotting sponge, syringes, sewing kit, particulate respirator, safety eyewear, survival water bags, quick release tourniquet, hand and toes warmers, acupressure wrist bandage, CPR mask, duct tape, pathogenic microorganisms fighter, condoms + special for Indiegogo backers - Vietnamese Golden Star balm

What makes Meddsy better than other kits in the market?
There are no similar solutions. Meddsy covers more major emergency situations than other first aid kits.

Does Meddsy come with international warranty?
Yes, all Meddsy kits will come with an international 365 day warranty.

Is Meddsy waterproof?
Yes, Meddsy kit is waterproof, dust and sand resistant, with the rating of IP67.

When is Meddsy expected to ship?
Meddsy is expected to start shipping in Summer 2017.
 
How will my order be shipped?
We will be shipping with the most suitable premium courier which will vary between countries. All shipments will have tracking numbers which will be emailed to you once the delivery has been shipped.

What if I back your campaign and then move? Can I change my address?
Sure! To change your shipping address, simply visit the link below.
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
Customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped outside of the China may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; Meddsy has no control over these charges.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?
Contact for all inquiries info@meddsy.com

Where can I find your media kit?
You can find it here: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B6QzjwNf1qC-U...

Is that all?
Definitely NOT. This is just the start!

story:
The Udee backpack has something for everyone. The versatile and user-friendly design is equipped with 19 features perfect for frequent travelers, outdoor enthusiasts, and working remotely. The designers of Udee integrated functions that make it adaptable to any situation.. Some functions include a portable cooler, a USB port for charging your electronic devices, and an earphone pocket that allows you to keep your earphones in your backpack while listening to music. Udee also has an anti-theft feature, so you can rest assured knowing your belongings are safe. Check out more of Udee’s amazing features!

 NOTE: we will cover the custom tax for shipping!

Udee was carefully designed to be easily portable, while easily storing all of your belongings. There are up to nine functional compartments inside, that store everything from your laptop to your passport, so everything has its spot! With Udee, you can be organized and adaptable, even on the go!

Click here to read full review from Forbes!

Click here to read the full review from RICK LIMPERT

 

 

When you travel with fragile belongings, like cameras, lenses and laptops, you need to make sure they are protected on the go. Most backpacks aren’t equipped with protective panels, because they are expensive and difficult to design. Udee changed that with its 360 protection system, that can protect not only your cameras and lenses, but any fragile items, without fear of damage. It is not a pure photography bag, it is everyday using bag equipped with well designed protective panels.

Udee backpack improves weight distribution with careful design features, including an S-shaped belt, X-shaped back support structure, and PE material. The improved weight distribution allows you to store more belongings without worry about your back and shoulders.

Udee also comes equipped with anti-theft features. A high-quality coded lock can secure Udee and give you peace of mind that your belongings are protected.

 

When you’re on the go, you probably have a carry many different belongings. Some belongings need to be easily accessible, and some need to be protected. Udee can take care of that and more, with its different storage zones.

story:
Polska wersja na samym dole!

I'm sorry for bad quality of the film.

ENGLISH VERSION!  Norwegian below.

Hello,

My name is Tomasz Kubacki and I have been living with my family in Stavanger, Norway for 5 years. I love sports, especially football and running. I've always dreamed of running a marathon! My dream will soon come true and I’m going take on this challenge by taking part in the highly prestigious Orlen Warsaw Marathon on April 23!

For more information, visit: https://www.orlenmarathon.pl

Another passion of mine is traveling. Two years ago in March we went on a trip to Asia and Cambodia was one of the destinations. We stayed in a small cozy hotel in Siem Reap. We decided to rent a tuk tuk along with the driver (tuk tuk is a small motorbike with a trailer to carry people) for the whole day so that he could show us around. It cost only about $10 for the entire day, which we paid at the hotel’s front desk. We quickly got along with Bunhak, as that was the our driver’s name. After the day full of sightseeing in the Angkor Wat temples, we asked him to drive us to a restaurant to get some local food. Buhnak admitted he had to take us to a place that would tip him for bringing in customers. We didn’t mind and we even invited him to dinner. We ended up paying around $50 for 5 people I could see how shocked he was when we were paying the bill as he would probably be able to live on that money for quite some time. This is when another idea came to our mind, fueled perhaps by the curiosity to learn about other cultures. We asked him if he would like to have his mom, or wife, prepare a meal for us the following day, and we would pay them $50 for the treat. We knew this could mean that for a few days to come they wouldn’t need to worry about making ends meet. Bunhak, right away, thought it was a great idea. The very same evening we booked a one-day ride at the hotel, stressing that we would like to get the same driver. Thus, we were sure to have a great adventure to look forward to the following day. The tuk tuk was waiting for us the next morning, parked in front of the hotel. We first went to see the sites we still had left, and after that we went to Bunhak's place. He explained that he lived outside the city and the road would lead through villages, providing a view slightly different than there in the city. We were thrilled because we were hungry for an adventure. After about an hour's journey, with the last few minutes crossed through the jungle, we arrived in a small village consisting of no more than six small houses. We realized that was where he lived. We were greeted by so many children one could easily think there were at least 15 houses there, It turned out that even the neighbors were involved in welcoming us. The experience was truly fantastic, festive. The food itself was spectacular and words can’t do justice to the enthusiasm we were received with by the locals. Bunhak told us a bit more about himself. We learned that after his father died he was the only one to support his family and the only one with a job. He has to provide for his two sisters, his mother, his wife, his baby and another one on the way. Our offer, therefore, came him really in handy financially, while, to us, it was simply an incredible experience. We asked him about his work. He revealed that his motorbike was leased and he was paying the owner a lot of money to use it. We can only guess how much he earns on the whole deal since we were paying about $10 for the entire day, and then there’s gasoline and rental fees. Fortunately, the majority of tourists will throw in something extra.

It was already when Bunhak was telling us about the terms of his cooperation with the hotel that I decided in my mind that someday I would get money to buy him his own tuk tuk and I would go back to Cambodia and give it to him filled with joy!

When I began training for the marathon, I ran a longer distance of about 20km once a week. I had more than two hours to think. It finally dawned on me during one of the sessions: perhaps I could do something more than just run this race. A tuk tuk for Bunhak almost immediately came to my mind. And that’s how the project that went to become my #1 dream was born and nothing can stop me from making it come true! If they throw me out the door, I will come back through the window!

I decided to find companies that would agree to donate for the tuk tuk for Bunhak provided that I finish the marathon. If I find them, all I have to do is get in shape so that I can run that tuk tuk out for my friend. I’m so motivated that even if I fall on the ground, I will crawl to the finish line! 

I love to film and edit travel videos, and I’ve gotten into it rather seriously. I very much want to make a film out of this trip to Cambodia! It would be a sort of amateur documentary, where one of the themes would be a day in the life of a tuk tuk driver like Buhnak in Cambodia. Buhnak would act in this film, and he would unexpectedly receive the vehicle in one of the last scenes. Unexpectedly since he’s not going to have any idea. I got in touch with his sister and she promised to keep the project secret. The only thing Buhnak knows is that we will visit Cambodia to shoot the film and he will be driving us around during our stay.

To go to Cambodia and make the film, we are registering the project on one of the crowdfunding websites. There, all those who sympathize with the idea can support it financially and thus bring us closer to our goal. The whole project is far from cheap which is why we’re counting on your generosity! Together we can do more! Tuk tuk aside, we have to raise money for: plane tickets, accommodation, visas, local transportation, equipment, translators, remuneration for the local residents for helping us making the film and for the protagonists.

I will go on this trip together with a film editor. You will receive an up-to-date account of each day of our stay there so that you too can experience the event.

I will seek support for the project both in the place where I currently live, that is Norway, as well as in my home country, Poland. That is also why the film will be released in Polish with English subtitles as the vast majority of Norwegians speak very good English. By doing so, we will be able to reach the audience not only in Poland and Norway, but also in every other country where people some English is spoken.

If you like our idea and you have some money to spare for our project, please go to the website where our fund is active and make a donation. If you run a business and you wish to join the fun, drop us a line and agree to support the project if I finish the marathon. The logo of each company that decides to help us will be included in the end credits of the video. Anybody who brings us closer to our goal can expect some form of unique gratitude from us. Stay tuned and let us make our dreams come true.

If all goes well, and I will not rest until it doesn’t, we’re planning to hit the road in late May or early June. The footage will be edited as professionally as we possibly can once we’re back home. In the meantime, every day of our trip will come with a quality report.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at any time - we won’t leave you hanging!

 

Kindest regards,

Run For Happiness crew!

 

 

 

NORWEGIAN VERSION!

 

Hei

 

Jeg heter Tomasz Kubacki og sammen med familien min bor jeg i Stavanger. Jeg elsker sport! Fotball og løping er de viktigste som jeg brukte mye tid på. Jeg har alltid drømt om det å løpe marathon og snart skal jeg oppfylle drømmen min. Den 23 april skal jeg løpe i veldig stor og viktig løp – Orlen Warsaw Maraton.

 

Mer informasjon skal du finne her: https://www.orlenmarathon.pl/

 

Den andre interessen min er å reise. I mars to år siden har jeg vært på en reise rundt Asia. Et av målene var Kambodsja. Der bodde vi i en liten hotell i byen Siem Reap. Vi har bestemt oss å leie «tuk tuk» sammen med en sjåfør (tuk tuk – det er en liten motorsykker med vogn for å sjøre folk) for hele dagen for at han skulle vise oss rundt. Det kostet bare 10 dollar for hele dagen og vi betalte i hotellet. Vi har rask fått kontakt med Bunhak – sjåføren. Etter hele dagen der vi besøkte hellige plasser Angkor Wat, ba vi ham å kjøre oss til noen lokale steder som restauranter. Buhnak innrømte at han må kjøre oss til en restaurant der han skal få noe ekstra for det at han kom med kunder. Vi hadde ingenting imot det og vi har invitert han til middag. For 5 personer betalte vi noe rundt 50 dollar, og da vi betalte regningen så jeg at han var sjokkert fordi det var veldig store penger for ham. Da kom jeg på en ide, og var nysgjerrig å bli kjent med andre kulturer. Jeg spurte ham om det skulle være problem vis hans mor eller kona skulle lage middag for oss neste dag og vi skulle betale 50 dollar. Vi viste at da skal de ikke bry seg om det at de skal ikke ha penger til de neste dagene. Bunhak hadde ingenting imot og sa at det var veldig bra ide. Samme dag reserverte vi heldags tur og sa at vi ville ha samme sjåfør. Neste dag ventet tuk tuk på oss. Vi dro først å besøke de plassene som vi ikke hadde tid å se dagen før og så dro vi til Bunhak. Han forklarte oss at han bor utenfor byen og at veien går gjennom landsbygder og at vi skal ha annerledes utsikt enn den i byen. Vi var veldig glad for det fordi vi forventet et eventyr. Cirka en time senere, og de siste minuttene gjennom jungelen så vi en liten landsby, der til sammen var det ca. 6 små hus. Da vi kom på plass, kom alle barna rundt. Det var så mange av dem om det skulle være 15 hus. På plass merkte vi at til og med var naboene involverte å lage mat til oss. Det var virkelig fantastisk. Maten var deilig og folk var veldig glad. Det går ikke ann å beskrive denne følelsen. Vi fikk vite att etter farens død, tjener Bunhak som den eneste i familien. Han må ta vare på to søstre, mora, kona, barnet og et til barn som skulle snart fødes. Så vår tilbud var veldig god for dem og for oss var det en veldig bra erfaring. Vi har spurt ham om hans erfaring. Han sa til oss at motorsykkelen er leid og at han må betale store penger for leie. Vi kan bare tenke oss hvor mye han tjener siden vi betalte ham bare 10 dollar for hele dagen, tenk på bensin og leie.  Heldigvis skjer det at noen turister gir han mer.

 

Da Bunhak fortalte oss hvordan er hans samarbeid med hotellet, bestemte jeg i mine tanker at en dag skal jeg skaffe penger for helt ny Tuk Tuk for ham og komme tilbake til Kambodsja, for å gi den til ham.

Da jeg begynte å trene til løpet, en gang i uken løpet jeg lengre distanse, ca. 20 kilometer. Jeg hadde over to uker å tenke. Under en av treningene mine kom jeg på en ide. Kanskje kunne jeg gjøre noe ekstra under dette løpet???? Men en gang kom jeg på TUK TUK for Bunhak. Så ble det lagt en prosjekt som er mitt drøm nr 1 og ingen skal stoppe meg.

 

Jeg har bestemt å finne et firma som skal investere i å kjøpe ny TUK TUK når jeg skal fullføre løpet. Så er det bare å bli fysisk klar for å fullføre løpet. Jeg er så motivert at jeg skal gjøre alt for         å slutte løpet.

 

Jeg elsker å lage filmer fra reisene mine og sette de sammen. Jeg vil gjerne lage en film fra Kambodsja. Det skulle være en amatør film der en av episodene skulle være en dag av TUK TUK sjåførs liv. Bunhak kunne spille i denne filmen og en av scenen skulle være den studen der jeg skulle gi ny motorsykkel til ham. Det skulle være overraskelse fordi han vet jo ingenting om det. Jeg har tatt kontakt med søstera hans og hun holder alt i hemmelighet og det eneste han vet er at vi skal komme igen til Kambodsja for å lage en film og han skal være vår sjåfør. For å reise der og lage film, er vi på en crowdfund side. Der kan alle støtte oss. Det er veldig stor kostnad til oss for å realisere ideen så vi håper at mange folk skal være villige til å hjelpe oss. Vi må skaffe penger for å kjøpe TUK TUK og kjøpe flybilletter, boende, transport, utstyr, tolk og pengene for lokale folk som skal hjelpe oss.

 

Til Kambodsja skal jeg reise sammen med film redaktør. Dere skal få korte filmer fra hver dag vi skal være der.

 

Om støtten skal jeg be både der jeg bor – i Norge men også i Polen. Derfor skal filmen være på polsk med engelske tekster. På denne måten skulle mer folk se filmen, der man snakker engelsk.

 

Om du liker idean vårt og har lyst å støtte oss, du kan gjerne gå inn på indiegogo.com der vi smaler pengene. Hvis du driver et firma og du vil bli med, skrov til oss og si at hvis jeg løper maraton, skal du støtte oss. Hver person som skal delta kan forvente en belønning. Logoen til firmaet ditt skal også være synnlig i slutten av filmen.

 

Om alt skal gå bra og jeg skal gjøre alt for at det skal gå bra, skal vi begynne reisen vår i mai/juni. Hele filmen skal vi sette sammen når vi kommer tilbake, men hver dag skal vi legge ut en kort film.

 

Har du spørsmål? Spør!

 

Hilser! Run for Happiness crew!

 

Success!!!

 

Polska Wersja!

Nazywam się Tomasz Kubacki, od 5 lat wspólnie z rodziną mieszkam w Stavanger (Norwegia). Kocham sport! Piłka nożna i bieganie to dziedziny, na które poświęciłem najwięcej czasu. Zawsze marzyłem o tym, aby przebiec maraton! Niebawem moje marzenie się spełni i podejmę się tego wyzwania, gdyż 23 kwietnia wezmę udział w bardzo prestiżowym Orlen Warsaw Marathon!

Więcej informacji znajdziesz tutaj: https://www.orlenmarathon.pl

Moją drugą pasją są podróże. W marcu przed dwoma laty byliśmy na wyprawie po Azji. Jednym z celów była Kambodża. Tam zakwaterowaliśmy się w małym, kameralnym hotelu w mieście Siem Reap. Postanowiliśmy wynająć tuk tuka wraz z kierowcą (mały motor z podłączoną przyczepą w celu przewozu osób) na cały dzień, aby pokazał nam okolicę. Był to koszt zaledwie ok. 10 dolarów za cały dzień, które to płaciliśmy w hotelowej recepcji. Szybko znaleźliśmy wspólny język z Bunhakiem, bo tak nazywał się kierowca. Po dniu pełnym zwiedzania świątyń Angkor wat, poprosiliśmy go, aby zawiózł nas do jakiejś restauracji, aby zjeść coś lokalnego. Buhnak przyznał, że musi nas zawieźć do knajpy, z której otrzyma jakąś dolę za to, że załatwił klientów. Nie mieliśmy nic przeciwko. Zaprosiliśmy go również na obiad. Za 5 osób zapłaciliśmy coś około 50 dolarów i kiedy płaciliśmy, widziałem, że to był dla niego szok, albowiem za te pieniądze musiał pewnie wyżyć kawał czasu. I tu pojawił się kolejny pomysł, a zarazem dała znać o sobie ciekawość innych kultur. Zapytaliśmy go czy nie zechciałby, aby to jego Mama, bądź żona przygotowała dla nas posiłek dnia następnego, a my zapłacimy im te 50 dolarów. Wiedzieliśmy bowiem, że to może znaczyć, że przez kolejne dni nie będą musieli się martwić, co mają do garnka wsadzić. Bunhak bez namysłu uznał to za świetny pomysł. Jeszcze tego samego dnia wieczorem, zarezerwowaliśmy kurs całodniowy w hotelu i zaznaczyliśmy, że zależy nam na tym samym kierowcy i już mogliśmy mieć pewność, że czeka nas jutro świetna przygoda. Następnego dnia rano tuk tuk czekał już zaparkowany przed hotelem. Ruszyliśmy najpierw zwiedzić te miejsca, które nam pozostały, a zaraz po tym udaliśmy się w podróż do domu Bunhaka. Wytłumaczył nam, że mieszka poza miastem, a droga będzie prowadziła przez wioski i będzie to nieco inny widok niż tu w mieście. Nas to zachwyciło, albowiem byliśmy rządni przygody. Po około godzinnej podróży, a ostatnie kilka minut dżunglą, gdzie w jej głębi usytuowana była mała wioska składająca się z około 6 małych domków, dotarliśmy na miejsce. Dzieci przyszło do nas jednak tyle, jakby tych domów stało tam 15. Na miejscu okazało się, że nawet sąsiedzi byli zaangażowani w przygotowanie dla nas gościny. Było na prawdę fantastycznie, odświętnie. Jedzenie pierwsza klasa, entuzjazm z jakim przyjęli nas mieszkańcy był nie do opisania. Tam Bunhak opowiedział nam nieco więcej o sobie. Dowiedzieliśmy się, że po śmierci ojca, to on utrzymuje rodzinę i jako jedyny ma pracę. Ma na utrzymaniu dwie siostry, mamę, żonę, dziecko i kolejne w drodze. Także nasza propozycja była dla nich olbrzymią pomocą, a dla nas niesamowitym doświadczeniem. Zapytaliśmy go jeszcze o jego pracę. Zdradził nam, że motor jest w leasingu i płaci właścicielowi spore pieniądze za możliwość jego użytkowania. Możemy tylko się domyślać ile on zarabia na całym interesie skoro my płaciliśmy około 10 dolarów za cały dzień, a gdzie tu paliwo i wynajem tego pojazdu. Na szczęście znaczna część turystów dorzuci coś ekstra.

Już w momencie, gdy Bunhak opowiadał nam na jakiej zasadzie jest jego współpraca z hotelem, już wtedy postanowiłem sobie w myślach, że kiedyś zdobędę pieniądze na własnego tuk tuka dla niego i wrócę tu do Kambodży, żeby z olbrzymią radością mu go wręczyć!

Kiedy zacząłem trenować do maratonu, raz w tygodniu biegałem dłuższy dystans, około 20km. Miałem ponad 2 godziny na przemyślenia. W trakcie jednego z treningów załapało. Pomyślałem sobie: a może by tak zrobić coś ekstra do tego biegu??? Dosłownie w mgnieniu oka przyszedł mi na myśl tuk tuk dla Bunhaka. W ten sposób powstał projekt, który stał się moim marzeniem numer 1 i nic mnie powstrzyma, by je zrealizować! Jak mnie wyproszą drzwiami, wejdę oknem!

Postanowiłem znaleźć firmy, a także osoby prywatne, które w sytuacji, gdy uda mi się ukończyć maraton, zgodzą się weprzeć zakup tuk tuka dla Bunhaka. Później pozostaje mi tak się przygotować fizycznie, aby wybiegać ten motor dla naszego przyjaciela. Jestem tak zmotywowany, że nawet w sytuacji kiedy padnę, będę się czołgał ku mecie! 

Uwielbiam kręcić filmy z podróży i montować je w całość. Niezwykle silnie zaczęło mnie to wkręcać. Bardzo mocno chcę nakręcić film z tego wyjazdu do Kambodży! Byłby to swego rodzaju amatorski film dokumentalny, gdzie jednym z wątków byłby dzień z życia takiego kierowcy Tuk tuka w Kambodży. Buhnak miałby zagrać w tym filmie i tam w jednej z ostatnich scen miałoby nastąpić niespodziewane wręczenie pojazdu dla niego. Niespodziewane, ponieważ on nie ma o niczym pojęcia. Nawiązałem kontakt z jego siostrą i ona utrzymuje projekt w tajemnicy, a jedyne o czym Buhnak wie, to fakt, że przybędziemy do Kambodży w celu nakręcenia filmu, a on będzie naszym kierowcą podczas pobytu.

W celu wyjazdu do Kambodży i realizacji filmu,a także pozyskania środków na ten pojazd, rejestrujemy projekt na platformie crowdfundingowej. Tu wszyscy chętni, którym pomysł przypadł do gustu mogą wesprzeć pomysł finansowo, a tym samym przybliżyć nas do celu. Koszt realizacji całego projektu jest jak dla nas kosmiczny, dlatego liczmy na Waszą przychylność! Razem możemy więcej! Prócz zakupu tuk tuka musimy zgromadzić środki na:

Bilety lotnicze, zakwaterowanie, wizy, transport na miejscu, sprzęt, tłumaczy, wynagrodzenie za pomoc lokalnych mieszkańców w realizacji filmu i dla jego bohaterów.

Prócz mnie w wyprawie weźmie udział montażysta filmowy, a jeśli zbierzemy nieco ponad 100% potrzebnej kwoty, to dołączy do nas fotograf, aby film był możliwie najlepszy. Otrzymacie relację na bieżąco z każdego dnia wyjazdu, tak abyście i Wy mogli żyć tym wydarzeniem. 

O wsparcie projektu będę obiegał się zarówno tu, gdzie obecnie mieszkam, w Norwegii, jak i w mojej ojczyźnie Polsce. Dlatego film ukaże się w języku polskim z angielskimi napisami, gdyż zdecydowana większość Norwegów mówi świetnie w tym języku. W ten sposób dotrzemy do widowni nie tylko w Polsce i Norwegii, ale i każdego innego kraju, gdzie język angielski jest znany.

Jeśli podoba się Tobie nasz pomysł i masz kilka złotówek, którymi z chęcią wsparłbyś ten projekt, to będzie nam niezwykle miło jeśli to uczynisz! Pamiętaj, że karma wraca! 

Zaplanowaliśmy, że zabierzemy ze sobą jeden bagaż ekstra z zabawkami dla kambodżańskich dzieci, prześlemy zdjęcia radosnych buziek dzieci, które je otrzymają. I Ty możesz mieć udział w uszczęśliwieniu ich. Za wszelką okazaną pomoc z góry dziękujemy i wszystkich kolejno skromnie nagrodzimy za ten wspaniały gest! Śledź nas na Facebooku!

W razie jakichkolwiek pytań pisz do nas o każdej porze, odpowiemy!

Serdecznie pozdrawiamy! Run For Happiness crew!

Zajrzyj proszę na nasz profil na facebooku: RUN FOR HAPPINESS!

Buhnak would act in this film, and he would unexpectedly receive the vehicle in one of the last scenes. Unexpectedly since he’s not going to have any idea. I got in touch with his sister and she promised to keep the project secret. The only thing Buhnak knows is that we will visit Cambodia to shoot the film and he will be driving us around during our stay.To go to Cambodia and make the film, we are registering the project on one of the crowdfunding websites. There, all those who sympathize with the idea can support it financially and thus bring us closer to our goal. The whole project is far from cheap which is why we’re counting on your generosity! Together we can do more! Tuk tuk aside, we have to raise money for: plane tickets, accommodation, visas, local transportation, equipment, translators, remuneration for the local residents for helping us making the film and for the protagonists.I will go on this trip together with a film editor. You will receive an up-to-date account of each day of our stay there so that you too can experience the event.I will seek support for the project both in the place where I currently live, that is Norway, as well as in my home country, Poland. That is also why the film will be released in Polish with English subtitles as the vast majority of Norwegians speak very good English. By doing so, we will be able to reach the audience not only in Poland and Norway, but also in every other country where people some English is spoken.If you like our idea and you have some money to spare for our project, please go to the website where our fund is active and make a donation. If you run a business and you wish to join the fun, drop us a line and agree to support the project if I finish the marathon. The logo of each company that decides to help us will be included in the end credits of the video. Anybody who brings us closer to our goal can expect some form of unique gratitude from us. Stay tuned and let us make our dreams come true.If all goes well, and I will not rest until it doesn’t, we’re planning to hit the road in late May or early June. The footage will be edited as professionally as we possibly can once we’re back home. In the meantime, every day of our trip will come with a quality report.If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at any time - we won’t leave you hanging! Kindest regards,Run For Happiness crew!   NORWEGIAN VERSION! Hei Jeg heter Tomasz Kubacki og sammen med familien min bor jeg i Stavanger. Jeg elsker sport! Fotball og løping er de viktigste som jeg brukte mye tid på. Jeg har alltid drømt om det å løpe marathon og snart skal jeg oppfylle drømmen min. Den 23 april skal jeg løpe i veldig stor og viktig løp – Orlen Warsaw Maraton. Mer informasjon skal du finne her: https://www.orlenmarathon.pl/ Den andre interessen min er å reise. I mars to år siden har jeg vært på en reise rundt Asia. Et av målene var Kambodsja. Der bodde vi i en liten hotell i byen Siem Reap. Vi har bestemt oss å leie «tuk tuk» sammen med en sjåfør (tuk tuk – det er en liten motorsykker med vogn for å sjøre folk) for hele dagen for at han skulle vise oss rundt. Det kostet bare 10 dollar for hele dagen og vi betalte i hotellet. Vi har rask fått kontakt med Bunhak – sjåføren. Etter hele dagen der vi besøkte hellige plasser Angkor Wat, ba vi ham å kjøre oss til noen lokale steder som restauranter. Buhnak innrømte at han må kjøre oss til en restaurant der han skal få noe ekstra for det at han kom med kunder. Vi hadde ingenting imot det og vi har invitert han til middag. For 5 personer betalte vi noe rundt 50 dollar, og da vi betalte regningen så jeg at han var sjokkert fordi det var veldig store penger for ham. Da kom jeg på en ide, og var nysgjerrig å bli kjent med andre kulturer. Jeg spurte ham om det skulle være problem vis hans mor eller kona skulle lage middag for oss neste dag og vi skulle betale 50 dollar. Vi viste at da skal de ikke bry seg om det at de skal ikke ha penger til de neste dagene. Bunhak hadde ingenting imot og sa at det var veldig bra ide. Samme dag reserverte vi heldags tur og sa at vi ville ha samme sjåfør. Neste dag ventet tuk tuk på oss. Vi dro først å besøke de plassene som vi ikke hadde tid å se dagen før og så dro vi til Bunhak. Han forklarte oss at han bor utenfor byen og at veien går gjennom landsbygder og at vi skal ha annerledes utsikt enn den i byen. Vi var veldig glad for det fordi vi forventet et eventyr. Cirka en time senere, og de siste minuttene gjennom jungelen så vi en liten landsby, der til sammen var det ca. 6 små hus. Da vi kom på plass, kom alle barna rundt. Det var så mange av dem om det skulle være 15 hus. På plass merkte vi at til og med var naboene involverte å lage mat til oss. Det var virkelig fantastisk. Maten var deilig og folk var veldig glad. Det går ikke ann å beskrive denne følelsen. Vi fikk vite att etter farens død, tjener Bunhak som den eneste i familien. Han må ta vare på to søstre, mora, kona, barnet og et til barn som skulle snart fødes. Så vår tilbud var veldig god for dem og for oss var det en veldig bra erfaring. Vi har spurt ham om hans erfaring. Han sa til oss at motorsykkelen er leid og at han må betale store penger for leie. Vi kan bare tenke oss hvor mye han tjener siden vi betalte ham bare 10 dollar for hele dagen, tenk på bensin og leie.  Heldigvis skjer det at noen turister gir han mer. Da Bunhak fortalte oss hvordan er hans samarbeid med hotellet, bestemte jeg i mine tanker at en dag skal jeg skaffe penger for helt ny Tuk Tuk for ham og komme tilbake til Kambodsja, for å gi den til ham.Da jeg begynte å trene til løpet, en gang i uken løpet jeg lengre distanse, ca. 20 kilometer. Jeg hadde over to uker å tenke. Under en av treningene mine kom jeg på en ide. Kanskje kunne jeg gjøre noe ekstra under dette løpet???? Men en gang kom jeg på TUK TUK for Bunhak. Så ble det lagt en prosjekt som er mitt drøm nr 1 og ingen skal stoppe meg. Jeg har bestemt å finne et firma som skal investere i å kjøpe ny TUK TUK når jeg skal fullføre løpet. Så er det bare å bli fysisk klar for å fullføre løpet. Jeg er så motivert at jeg skal gjøre alt for         å slutte løpet. Jeg elsker å lage filmer fra reisene mine og sette de sammen. Jeg vil gjerne lage en film fra Kambodsja. Det skulle være en amatør film der en av episodene skulle være en dag av TUK TUK sjåførs liv. Bunhak kunne spille i denne filmen og en av scenen skulle være den studen der jeg skulle gi ny motorsykkel til ham. Det skulle være overraskelse fordi han vet jo ingenting om det. Jeg har tatt kontakt med søstera hans og hun holder alt i hemmelighet og det eneste han vet er at vi skal komme igen til Kambodsja for å lage en film og han skal være vår sjåfør. For å reise der og lage film, er vi på en crowdfund side. Der kan alle støtte oss. Det er veldig stor kostnad til oss for å realisere ideen så vi håper at mange folk skal være villige til å hjelpe oss. Vi må skaffe penger for å kjøpe TUK TUK og kjøpe flybilletter, boende, transport, utstyr, tolk og pengene for lokale folk som skal hjelpe oss. Til Kambodsja skal jeg reise sammen med film redaktør. Dere skal få korte filmer fra hver dag vi skal være der. Om støtten skal jeg be både der jeg bor – i Norge men også i Polen. Derfor skal filmen være på polsk med engelske tekster. På denne måten skulle mer folk se filmen, der man snakker engelsk. Om du liker idean vårt og har lyst å støtte oss, du kan gjerne gå inn på indiegogo.com der vi smaler pengene. Hvis du driver et firma og du vil bli med, skrov til oss og si at hvis jeg løper maraton, skal du støtte oss. Hver person som skal delta kan forvente en belønning. Logoen til firmaet ditt skal også være synnlig i slutten av filmen. Om alt skal gå bra og jeg skal gjøre alt for at det skal gå bra, skal vi begynne reisen vår i mai/juni. Hele filmen skal vi sette sammen når vi kommer tilbake, men hver dag skal vi legge ut en kort film. Har du spørsmål? Spør! Hilser! Run for Happiness crew! Success!!! Polska Wersja!Nazywam się Tomasz Kubacki, od 5 lat wspólnie z rodziną mieszkam w Stavanger (Norwegia). Kocham sport! Piłka nożna i bieganie to dziedziny, na które poświęciłem najwięcej czasu. Zawsze marzyłem o tym, aby przebiec maraton! Niebawem moje marzenie się spełni i podejmę się tego wyzwania, gdyż 23 kwietnia wezmę udział w bardzo prestiżowym Orlen Warsaw Marathon!Więcej informacji znajdziesz tutaj: https://www.orlenmarathon.plMoją drugą pasją są podróże. W marcu przed dwoma laty byliśmy na wyprawie po Azji. Jednym z celów była Kambodża. Tam zakwaterowaliśmy się w małym, kameralnym hotelu w mieście Siem Reap. Postanowiliśmy wynająć tuk tuka wraz z kierowcą (mały motor z podłączoną przyczepą w celu przewozu osób) na cały dzień, aby pokazał nam okolicę. Był to koszt zaledwie ok. 10 dolarów za cały dzień, które to płaciliśmy w hotelowej recepcji. Szybko znaleźliśmy wspólny język z Bunhakiem, bo tak nazywał się kierowca. Po dniu pełnym zwiedzania świątyń Angkor wat, poprosiliśmy go, aby zawiózł nas do jakiejś restauracji, aby zjeść coś lokalnego. Buhnak przyznał, że musi nas zawieźć do knajpy, z której otrzyma jakąś dolę za to, że załatwił klientów. Nie mieliśmy nic przeciwko. Zaprosiliśmy go również na obiad. Za 5 osób zapłaciliśmy coś około 50 dolarów i kiedy płaciliśmy, widziałem, że to był dla niego szok, albowiem za te pieniądze musiał pewnie wyżyć kawał czasu. I tu pojawił się kolejny pomysł, a zarazem dała znać o sobie ciekawość innych kultur. Zapytaliśmy go czy nie zechciałby, aby to jego Mama, bądź żona przygotowała dla nas posiłek dnia następnego, a my zapłacimy im te 50 dolarów. Wiedzieliśmy bowiem, że to może znaczyć, że przez kolejne dni nie będą musieli się martwić, co mają do garnka wsadzić. Bunhak bez namysłu uznał to za świetny pomysł. Jeszcze tego samego dnia wieczorem, zarezerwowaliśmy kurs całodniowy w hotelu i zaznaczyliśmy, że zależy nam na tym samym kierowcy i już mogliśmy mieć pewność, że czeka nas jutro świetna przygoda. Następnego dnia rano tuk tuk czekał już zaparkowany przed hotelem. Ruszyliśmy najpierw zwiedzić te miejsca, które nam pozostały, a zaraz po tym udaliśmy się w podróż do domu Bunhaka. Wytłumaczył nam, że mieszka poza miastem, a droga będzie prowadziła przez wioski i będzie to nieco inny widok niż tu w mieście. Nas to zachwyciło, albowiem byliśmy rządni przygody. Po około godzinnej podróży, a ostatnie kilka minut dżunglą, gdzie w jej głębi usytuowana była mała wioska składająca się z około 6 małych domków, dotarliśmy na miejsce. Dzieci przyszło do nas jednak tyle, jakby tych domów stało tam 15. Na miejscu okazało się, że nawet sąsiedzi byli zaangażowani w przygotowanie dla nas gościny. Było na prawdę fantastycznie, odświętnie. Jedzenie pierwsza klasa, entuzjazm z jakim przyjęli nas mieszkańcy był nie do opisania. Tam Bunhak opowiedział nam nieco więcej o sobie. Dowiedzieliśmy się, że po śmierci ojca, to on utrzymuje rodzinę i jako jedyny ma pracę. Ma na utrzymaniu dwie siostry, mamę, żonę, dziecko i kolejne w drodze. Także nasza propozycja była dla nich olbrzymią pomocą, a dla nas niesamowitym doświadczeniem. Zapytaliśmy go jeszcze o jego pracę. Zdradził nam, że motor jest w leasingu i płaci właścicielowi spore pieniądze za możliwość jego użytkowania. Możemy tylko się domyślać ile on zarabia na całym interesie skoro my płaciliśmy około 10 dolarów za cały dzień, a gdzie tu paliwo i wynajem tego pojazdu. Na szczęście znaczna część turystów dorzuci coś ekstra.Już w momencie, gdy Bunhak opowiadał nam na jakiej zasadzie jest jego współpraca z hotelem, już wtedy postanowiłem sobie w myślach, że kiedyś zdobędę pieniądze na własnego tuk tuka dla niego i wrócę tu do Kambodży, żeby z olbrzymią radością mu go wręczyć!Kiedy zacząłem trenować do maratonu, raz w tygodniu biegałem dłuższy dystans, około 20km. Miałem ponad 2 godziny na przemyślenia. W trakcie jednego z treningów załapało. Pomyślałem sobie: a może by tak zrobić coś ekstra do tego biegu??? Dosłownie w mgnieniu oka przyszedł mi na myśl tuk tuk dla Bunhaka. W ten sposób powstał projekt, który stał się moim marzeniem numer 1 i nic mnie powstrzyma, by je zrealizować! Jak mnie wyproszą drzwiami, wejdę oknem!Postanowiłem znaleźć firmy, a także osoby prywatne, które w sytuacji, gdy uda mi się ukończyć maraton, zgodzą się weprzeć zakup tuk tuka dla Bunhaka. Później pozostaje mi tak się przygotować fizycznie, aby wybiegać ten motor dla naszego przyjaciela. Jestem tak zmotywowany, że nawet w sytuacji kiedy padnę, będę się czołgał ku mecie! Uwielbiam kręcić filmy z podróży i montować je w całość. Niezwykle silnie zaczęło mnie to wkręcać. Bardzo mocno chcę nakręcić film z tego wyjazdu do Kambodży! Byłby to swego rodzaju amatorski film dokumentalny, gdzie jednym z wątków byłby dzień z życia takiego kierowcy Tuk tuka w Kambodży. Buhnak miałby zagrać w tym filmie i tam w jednej z ostatnich scen miałoby nastąpić niespodziewane wręczenie pojazdu dla niego. Niespodziewane, ponieważ on nie ma o niczym pojęcia. Nawiązałem kontakt z jego siostrą i ona utrzymuje projekt w tajemnicy, a jedyne o czym Buhnak wie, to fakt, że przybędziemy do Kambodży w celu nakręcenia filmu, a on będzie naszym kierowcą podczas pobytu.W celu wyjazdu do Kambodży i realizacji filmu,a także pozyskania środków na ten pojazd, rejestrujemy projekt na platformie crowdfundingowej. Tu wszyscy chętni, którym pomysł przypadł do gustu mogą wesprzeć pomysł finansowo, a tym samym przybliżyć nas do celu. Koszt realizacji całego projektu jest jak dla nas kosmiczny, dlatego liczmy na Waszą przychylność! Razem możemy więcej! Prócz zakupu tuk tuka musimy zgromadzić środki na:Bilety lotnicze, zakwaterowanie, wizy, transport na miejscu, sprzęt, tłumaczy, wynagrodzenie za pomoc lokalnych mieszkańców w realizacji filmu i dla jego bohaterów.Prócz mnie w wyprawie weźmie udział montażysta filmowy, a jeśli zbierzemy nieco ponad 100% potrzebnej kwoty, to dołączy do nas fotograf, aby film był możliwie najlepszy. Otrzymacie relację na bieżąco z każdego dnia wyjazdu, tak abyście i Wy mogli żyć tym wydarzeniem. O wsparcie projektu będę obiegał się zarówno tu, gdzie obecnie mieszkam, w Norwegii, jak i w mojej ojczyźnie Polsce. Dlatego film ukaże się w języku polskim z angielskimi napisami, gdyż zdecydowana większość Norwegów mówi świetnie w tym języku. W ten sposób dotrzemy do widowni nie tylko w Polsce i Norwegii, ale i każdego innego kraju, gdzie język angielski jest znany.Jeśli podoba się Tobie nasz pomysł i masz kilka złotówek, którymi z chęcią wsparłbyś ten projekt, to będzie nam niezwykle miło jeśli to uczynisz! Pamiętaj, że karma wraca! Zaplanowaliśmy, że zabierzemy ze sobą jeden bagaż ekstra z zabawkami dla kambodżańskich dzieci, prześlemy zdjęcia radosnych buziek dzieci, które je otrzymają. I Ty możesz mieć udział w uszczęśliwieniu ich. Za wszelką okazaną pomoc z góry dziękujemy i wszystkich kolejno skromnie nagrodzimy za ten wspaniały gest! Śledź nas na Facebooku!W razie jakichkolwiek pytań pisz do nas o każdej porze, odpowiemy!Serdecznie pozdrawiamy! Run For Happiness crew!Zajrzyj proszę na nasz profil na facebooku: RUN FOR HAPPINESS!

story:
Feel the comfort and practicality
that you couldn't get before

A modern person needs just a laptop bag to go to work or for a walk. But what if you need to carry much more things? 

That's when modular backpacks come in handy. But wait. Think for a second. What if you left additional modules at home? How will you be able to increase the carrying capacity of your backpack if you needed unexpectedly during the day? 

PleatPack is сreated to solve this problem.
 
 

Explore The Unique Expandable System:
The First of its Kind

No more bulky bags. No more lack of space in your backpack. An awesome, slim laptop daily companion can easily contain everything that fits into your huge daypack.

The 20.7-liter main compartment acts like an accordion. It expands by just one pull allowing you to store all your purchases or gym clothes. 

 
 

PleatPack featured in:

 

 

 

Perfect for Urban Professionals and Commuters

The drop-resistant laptop compartment is slim but spacious enough to store your urban essentials like chargers, cables, and adapters.

 
 

Tripod carrier 

Some items do not fit in backpacks. No more worry about these things.

 

The Excellent Travel Daypack

"PleatPack is perfect for switching seamlessly between traveling within airports, day hikes, beach sports, souvenir-shopping, and city-touring" - Ivan Hong.

 
 

Thin Yet Unbelievably Spacious!

No one likes constantly hooking up additional parts to their backpack. So we made it simple. It's just one move, just one second from a thin backpack to a huge one.

 

The Era of Thefts in The Past:
Theft Protection From All Sides

Hidden zippers on the back and the special security front panel won’t allow thieves to get inside your PleatPack.

How does it work? When you close the top flap over the protective panel, the backpack remains tightly closed thanks to the magnets sewn into the front panel as well as in the cover. This prevents thieves from opening the compartment and stealing your belongings without you noticing.

 

Water-repellent materials

Water-repellent 600D fabric will protect your belongings from rain
 

Hidden Anti-Theft Pocket

The large top pocket is perfect for your phone, wallet, keys or other valuables that need both security and quick access

 

Extendable Bottle Pockets

Do you need easy access to a bottle of water or an umbrella? We need it too.
PleatPack's extendable bottle pockets have that covered. 

 

Comfy Handle

Since you will often want to use the top handle of the backpack, we took the time to make it comfortable
 

The Perfect Pockets Organization

For urban commuters and short travels
 

Stay Charged!

Quick access to an external USB port. Simply connect your powerbank and charge your mobile devices on the go
 

Comfortable Chest Pockets

There is always some small stuff you need during the day. PleatPack gives you a quick access to your travel or credit cards, keys, cash or headphones

 

Make Your Travel Even Greater!

It's a must-have feature if you travel with a suitcase. Naturally, PleatPack has it

 

Comfortable Shape and Soft of The Shoulder Straps

They make carrying easier and more comfortable

 

 

Sometimes you need a sternum strap,
sometimes you don't

To keep PleatPack looking good either way, we've hidden the strap
 

YKK Zippers & Italian Plastic Hardware

The most high-quality materials in the world. For your secure, hassle-free and comfortable use. Forget about broken zippers
 

No More Dangling Straps!

We hate ugly dangling straps. There will be no more of them. Stay stylish!
 

Strap To Attach Your Glasses

Sometimes you need to take off your glasses. We made this simple strap so that you never have to think of where to put your glasses

 

Mud-Resistant Base

Now you can put your backpack wherever you want. Don't worry about dirty or wet floors

 

 

Magnetic Closure

The simpler - the better. Magnetic closure provides quick and easy access to the ideal organization and volume for the modern urban lifestyle

 

Breathable Back with Air Channels

There are 3 paddings with 3D mesh between your back and the backpack. It allows the air to circulate and avoids sweating

Discover New Places like Never Before

As soon as you get to the place, take out all your personal stuff and leave only the tech accessories that you need. Enjoy discovering the area with a slim backpack.

 

 

Shipping information

The shipping cost will be charged off when your PleatPack is ready to be shipped to you. When we know exactly where you want us to deliver your PleatPack as well as the final weight of the package, we'll be able to calculate the actual cost of the shipment. This guarantees that you won't pay more than the delivery into your country really costs. 

Estimated shipping date for new orders - December 2019. You will be able to use your credit card or PayPal to pay for the shipment. 

Shipping will cost (roughly): 
US, Canada, Europe: $29.
Latin America: $40.
Asia: $40.
Rest of World: $40. 

  If you need more information, please contact us at hello@pleatpack.com

Our own production

Thanks to your support, the backers of our campaign, we were able to create our own production! All backpacks will be created here. See our updates for more info.

 

New Magnetic Buckle

Thanks to you, we have made great strides (Funded over 1600%!). Thanks to this result, we can replace our standard plastic buckle with a Modern Magnetic Buckle! Thus, your experience of use will be more enjoyable and convenient! See how it works:

 

See how the laser cuts out all the details for your PleatPacks!

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

Our team

 

 

 

 

 

 

IMPORTANT: 
1) The answer to the question: "What about the built-in lock? Can I pay a few extra dollars for the built-in lock?"

  • Our priority goal is to make the backpack as good as it’s possible.

    The inbuilt lock — is an additional and quite expensive accessory to the backpack, but not its main part. Having studied the experience of many company founders on Kickstarter and Indiegogo, we found out that many of them made a big mistake — started offering lots of add-ons, and that led to manufacturing complications. As a result, many of the companies failed to meet the challenges and backers were left with poor quality products or with nothing at all. We don't want to make the same mistake.

    We’ll try to do our best, so every backer could get it for free. But if we fail to show the campaign to enough people this proposal can be the solution. During the campaign, we’ll keep you informed about this question.

2) Due to the nature of crowdfunding, we cannot offer refunds to backers once the contribution is placed. In the crowdfunding community, the items that you receive after making a contribution are referred to as "rewards" because they are not purchases in the traditional sense.

Once the contribution is placed, your pledges are immediately turned into a hard production order, this because we do not want to let anybody down on the delivery time. Therefore we cannot offer refunds.

However, if you experience any quality problems, we are here to help in multiple ways! You can send us a mail at hello@pleatpack.com or send us a private message here on Indiegogo. We will be here to help solve your problem!

3) Please note that the final product may be slightly different from the one presented. All basic functions and appearance remain the same.
story_txt:
Feel the comfort and practicalitythat you couldn't get beforeA modern person needs just a laptop bag to go to work or for a walk. But what if you need to carry much more things? That's when modular backpacks come in handy. But wait. Think for a second. What if you left additional modules at home? How will you be able to increase the carrying capacity of your backpack if you needed unexpectedly during the day? 

PleatPack is сreated to solve this problem.  Explore The Unique Expandable System:The First of its KindNo more bulky bags. No more lack of space in your backpack. An awesome, slim laptop daily companion can easily contain everything that fits into your huge daypack.The 20.7-liter main compartment acts like an accordion. It expands by just one pull allowing you to store all your purchases or gym clothes.   PleatPack featured in:   Perfect for Urban Professionals and CommutersThe drop-resistant laptop compartment is slim but spacious enough to store your urban essentials like chargers, cables, and adapters.  Tripod carrier Some items do not fit in backpacks. No more worry about these things. The Excellent Travel Daypack"PleatPack is perfect for switching seamlessly between traveling within airports, day hikes, beach sports, souvenir-shopping, and city-touring" - Ivan Hong.  Thin Yet Unbelievably Spacious!No one likes constantly hooking up additional parts to their backpack. So we made it simple. It's just one move, just one second from a thin backpack to a huge one.  The Era of Thefts in The Past:Theft Protection From All Sides
Hidden zippers on the back and the special security front panel won’t allow thieves to get inside your PleatPack.How does it work? When you close the top flap over the protective panel, the backpack remains tightly closed thanks to the magnets sewn into the front panel as well as in the cover. This prevents thieves from opening the compartment and stealing your belongings without you noticing. Water-repellent materialsWater-repellent 600D fabric will protect your belongings from rain Hidden Anti-Theft PocketThe large top pocket is perfect for your phone, wallet, keys or other valuables that need both security and quick access Extendable Bottle PocketsDo you need easy access to a bottle of water or an umbrella? We need it too.PleatPack's extendable bottle pockets have that covered.  Comfy HandleSince you will often want to use the top handle of the backpack, we took the time to make it comfortable The Perfect Pockets OrganizationFor urban commuters and short travels Stay Charged!Quick access to an external USB port. Simply connect your powerbank and charge your mobile devices on the go Comfortable Chest PocketsThere is always some small stuff you need during the day. PleatPack gives you a quick access to your travel or credit cards, keys, cash or headphones Make Your Travel Even Greater!It's a must-have feature if you travel with a suitcase. Naturally, PleatPack has it Comfortable Shape and Soft of The Shoulder StrapsThey make carrying easier and more comfortable  Sometimes you need a sternum strap,sometimes you don'tTo keep PleatPack looking good either way, we've hidden the strap YKK Zippers & Italian Plastic HardwareThe most high-quality materials in the world. For your secure, hassle-free and comfortable use. Forget about broken zippers No More Dangling Straps!We hate ugly dangling straps. There will be no more of them. Stay stylish! Strap To Attach Your GlassesSometimes you need to take off your glasses. We made this simple strap so that you never have to think of where to put your glasses Mud-Resistant BaseNow you can put your backpack wherever you want. Don't worry about dirty or wet floors  Magnetic ClosureThe simpler - the better. Magnetic closure provides quick and easy access to the ideal organization and volume for the modern urban lifestyle Breathable Back with Air ChannelsThere are 3 paddings with 3D mesh between your back and the backpack. It allows the air to circulate and avoids sweatingDiscover New Places like Never BeforeAs soon as you get to the place, take out all your personal stuff and leave only the tech accessories that you need. Enjoy discovering the area with a slim backpack.  Shipping informationThe shipping cost will be charged off when your PleatPack is ready to be shipped to you. When we know exactly where you want us to deliver your PleatPack as well as the final weight of the package, we'll be able to calculate the actual cost of the shipment. This guarantees that you won't pay more than the delivery into your country really costs. Estimated shipping date for new orders - December 2019. You will be able to use your credit card or PayPal to pay for the shipment. Shipping will cost (roughly): US, Canada, Europe: $29.Latin America: $40.Asia: $40.Rest of World: $40.   If you need more information, please contact us at hello@pleatpack.comOur own productionThanks to your support, the backers of our campaign, we were able to create our own production! All backpacks will be created here. See our updates for more info. New Magnetic BuckleThanks to you, we have made great strides (Funded over 1600%!). Thanks to this result, we can replace our standard plastic buckle with a Modern Magnetic Buckle! Thus, your experience of use will be more enjoyable and convenient! See how it works: See how the laser cuts out all the details for your PleatPacks! 

 
 

 
 
  Our team       IMPORTANT: 1) The answer to the question: "What about the built-in lock? Can I pay a few extra dollars for the built-in lock?"Our priority goal is to make the backpack as good as it’s possible.The inbuilt lock — is an additional and quite expensive accessory to the backpack, but not its main part. Having studied the experience of many company founders on Kickstarter and Indiegogo, we found out that many of them made a big mistake — started offering lots of add-ons, and that led to manufacturing complications. As a result, many of the companies failed to meet the challenges and backers were left with poor quality products or with nothing at all. We don't want to make the same mistake.We’ll try to do our best, so every backer could get it for free. But if we fail to show the campaign to enough people this proposal can be the solution. During the campaign, we’ll keep you informed about this question.2) Due to the nature of crowdfunding, we cannot offer refunds to backers once the contribution is placed. In the crowdfunding community, the items that you receive after making a contribution are referred to as "rewards" because they are not purchases in the traditional sense.Once the contribution is placed, your pledges are immediately turned into a hard production order, this because we do not want to let anybody down on the delivery time. Therefore we cannot offer refunds.However, if you experience any quality problems, we are here to help in multiple ways! You can send us a mail at hello@pleatpack.com or send us a private message here on Indiegogo. We will be here to help solve your problem!3) Please note that the final product may be slightly different from the one presented. All basic functions and appearance remain the same.

story:
Great gear? Epic adventures? Sign me up!

We've made it our mission to find the very best travel gear for you. We've spent many days, evenings and weekends finding great gear, talking with suppliers, and building our website.

And now, we've made it to the final hour. We're preparing for our launch on October 10... this is where YOU come in!


OK but first, what is myfirstbackpack.co?

We're equipping a community of adventurers, explorers and nomads with the very best travel gear. We make finding and purchasing gear for your next adventure easy. In order to find the best gear for you, we ask the following questions (via our online purchasing process):


This helps us select gear that suits your adventure, and recommend suitable gear bundles.

What packs are we offering?

Check out some of the travel packs we've got on offer below.
Mont Astro + Day Pack


KEY FEATURES
  • Mont is an Australian company and works with WRAP certified factories wherever possible 
  • Includes 22L Astro Day pack and 20L Travel Pod (great for keeping washing and other items separate)
  • Clam shell opening offers absolute access to all areas of the main compartment for easy packing or customs security checks
  • Fully adjustable Moto-Active HarnessTM in 3 sizes to ensure a perfect fit
  • Internal compression straps and zip pockets to secure your gear and sleeping bag
  • Main compartment zips have lockable YKK sliders and a security lock attachment point making your gear safe
  • Tough fabric combination of 210 denier Duramax Nylon, 840 denier Oxford Nylon and a 1680 denier ballistic Nylon base
  • Retractable luggage tag to record your details in case of lost luggage!

Deuter Quantum Series + Day Pack

KEY FEATURES
  • Integrated transport cover with name tag provides protection on flights and doubles up as a rain cover
  • Includes a sleek, quickly buckled on or off 18L daypack
  • Vari-Quick back system adjustment makes it easy to get the fit right for you
  • Load bearing aluminium frame and anatomically formed hip belt makes carrying heavy loads comfortable
  • Dual-access main compartment: through the lid or via the U-shaped zip at the front
  • Separate bottom compartment to keep dirty washing or shoes away from your clean gear
  • Three grab handles for lugging on and off transport or checking in at the airport

Gregory Stout and Amber series + Day Pack

KEY FEATURES

  • Removable ultra-light daypack which doubles as a hydration reservoir sleeve
  • Removable raincover stows easily in its own designated pocket
  • Top-loading design with front U-zip panel for easy access to gear 
  • Removable lid with dual zip pockets and underside security zip
  • Dual front vertical-zip accessory pockets
  • Shove-It expanding front stuff pocket for on-the-go storage of larger items
  • Dual side water-bottle/accessory drop-in pockets
  • Side and bottom compression straps
  • TrailFlex wishbone suspension and TrailFit adjustable hip belt

Check out the rest of our pack range here.

We've also put together product combinations into bundles. Some of our bundles come in 'plus' versions too, which provide even more value, depending how much gear you're after. 

Check out our bundles we're launching with below:


Can I buy individual products too?

Of course! If our bundles don't suit you, you can purchase individual products from our site. And to ensure you're still getting a great deal if you decide not to purchase a bundle, we'll give you 15% off items purchased on the same order as any travel pack (this excludes our bundles as these are already exceptional value!)

You can check out our launch range here including bundles and individual products.


What brands do we stock?

We're only offering only tried and tested travel and adventure brands. This ensures you're getting great quality gear with backed by international testimonials.

Our pack brands include:

  • Deuter
  • Mont
  • Kelty

Check out some of our other brands we stock:

Check out our full range of products we're stocking for our launch here.


What do we stand for? 

There's a few things you should know about us:

  • Our team is committed to bringing you the VERY BEST GEAR; we don't like poorly made products that need replacing after one trip (OK, unless you're on the road for years!)
  • We're making the process EASY for you; our online question process helps select the right gear for you, and our bundles offer great value. We have big plans to enhance our offering even further as we grow.  
  • We want to do GOOD IN THIS WORLD; that's why we're signing up to the One Percent for the Planet initiative, ship our gear using reusable duffel bags to minimise packaging waste, and actively partner with companies that share similar social and environmental goals to our own. In fact, our very own Resident Nomad (Trent) is heading to Nepal in Jan 2016 to assist with the rebuilding efforts in the earthquake-struck Langtang region.
We have bold ambitions to use our brand and affiliations to promote responsible tourism as we grow. This is an area that will help keep our planet healthy for generations to come. 

What will the money raised be used for?

We are seeking $10,000 in pledges to kick-start our initial round of stock purchases. This will help fulfil our initial orders, get stock moving and allow us to grow. We've already invested a significant amount of our own $$ setting up the company, sourcing products and building our website, so we're committed and ready to make this a success.


Our crowdfunding perks explained ($$ value)

We're offering the following perks to make your pledge worthwhile:

  • Pledge $25 and receive $35 to spend - that's a 25% discount!
  • Pledge $50 and receive $70 to spend - that's a 28% discount!
  • Pledge $70 and receive $100 to spend - that's a 30% discount!
  • Pledge $100 and receive $150 to spend - that's a 33% discount!
The above discounts, accompanied with our existing bundling discounts and free shipping, means you are getting an absolutely fantastic deal on gear!
You will receive a voucher to be redeemed online when we launch on October 10, 2015.
Note: All vouchers are valid for 12 months from the date of issue. If you have any questions about this, please contact us and we'd be more than happy to provide more info.  

Can my voucher be a gift voucher for someone else?


Yes! If you'd like to gift your voucher to a friend, family or loved one, or to some lucky soul you've never even met, we can provide a gift certificate for redemption on our site.


Shipping and returns info - yes, we know this bit is important!

As an online store, we needed a competitive shipping and returns policy. We're proud to offer great rates on shipping and returns (see here for all the details). 

But, since you're going to be our very first customers, you will receive FREE SHIPPING (and free returns, should you require it) on your order. Just a small thank you for supporting us at the beginning of our journey.

Note: We're currently only shipping to Australian addresses only. In the case that shipping costs are uneconomical due to a remote location or other circumstance, we'll be in contact to discuss.


Order processing times

We will be able to supply you from October 10 onwards, but depending on the success of our campaign we may have a very busy first week! 

We'd suggest allowing a week for processing and shipping time, just in case. This means you should expect your gear the week beginning October 19, hopefully earlier if you order immediately.


Handy extras

Every customer will receive their very own 'MFB Traveller Passport' as part of our welcome pack, which includes a suggested packing list and some tips to assist with preparing for your trip! 


Trent, our Resident Nomad, has also been curating a collection of travel wisdom and stories from those who have done it before on our Blog. Check it out for great tips and tricks!


Meet the team

It's nice to put a face to a company. Let us introduce ourselves:


Got questions for us?

We'd be more than happy to answer them. Contact us, or give us a call on (02) 8003 4656 if you'd prefer. 


And finally, every one of our supporters will receive a tasty Clif Bar as a small thank you from us. Yum!


Other important info

As our campaign is running for 30 days, there is a chance that our product pricing may need to be adjusted during or post-campaign. If this pricing change impacts your purchasing expectations, please contact us to discuss.

story:
The Seaview 180° SV2 represents Wildhorn’s commitment to constantly innovate and expand boundaries. The SV2 drastically improves breathability, enhances the viewing area and adds several quality features to create an unmatched snorkeling experience. We heavily focused on airflow to maximize safety. With over a year and a half of design and engineering behind the concept, as well as 8 rounds of prototyping, testing and fine-tuning, the SV2 is primed and ready to launch Wildhorn and the snorkeling adventure experience to the next level.

PLEASE NOTE: The swimmers shown in our video are experts. This is a surface snorkel mask not intended for serious free diving. 

Crowdfunding will help fund final tooling, sizing molds and other design adjustments to ensure that the product is completely dialed in for the best possible experience for our customers. Funds will also help to cover first round production costs to meet the demand for this innovative new product.

MAXIMUM FRESH AIR INTAKE 

Our patent pending Flowtech™ system provides natural breathing through both your nose and mouth. Traditional snorkel masks only allow for one constrained passage way for air through the mouth. Flowtech™ has two chambers and 4 intake valves to allow air to circulate in and out freely. This creates airflow with less resistance and more fresh air circulating through the mask. More fresh airflow and better circulation means less fogging, better visibility and more confident breathing. The benefits of our innovative Flowtech™ system ultimately result in a much more enjoyable and safer snorkeling experience.

 

Commitment to Safety Testing

The SV2 provides unmatched design and performance enhancing the snorkeling experience on every level. Improving the overall usability and performance of your snorkeling mask not only makes your snorkeling experience way more enjoyable, but much safer as well.  

We conducted computational fluid dynamics testing on the SV2 model to measure airflow resistance and CO2 buildup. The results show airflow resistance that is well within EN250 work of breathing standards. Low resistance airflow allows fresh oxygen into the mask at high rates and provides a comfortable breathing experience. This airflow, along with 5 one-way check valves, reduces and keeps CO2 levels well within safe limits. We continue to test using more instrumentation as they become available to us. 

 

We set out to make a product that would revolutionize the snorkeling experience. We have spent the last year and a half meticulously designing, developing, testing and engineering the SV2. After over 18 months of research and dozens of prototypes, we are ready to introduce the SV2 to the world. Below are just a few initial sketches, renderings and prototype samples...

OUR FIRST FULL FACE SNORKEL MASK IS CURRENTLY #1 ON AMAZON.

In just over two years, we’ve established the Wildhorn brand as one of the fastest growing outdoor/adventure companies in the industry and have become a top seller in the outdoor segment on Amazon. Wildhorn Outfitters helped to pioneer the full-face snorkel mask revolution with our original Seaview 180° which quickly became the #1 seller on Amazon in the category with currently over 1,500 5 star reviews.

THE MOST UNIQUE, HIGH PERFORMANCE SNORKELING PRODUCT EVER.

The Seaview 180° SV2 simplifies and improves the snorkeling experience on every level. Our goal with the SV2 was to improve fit, maximize breathability, improve usability and create a unique, stylish form and finish. Our product team boasts 20+ years of design and production experience. We started from the ground up by identifying and understanding all issues related to each problem through studying consumer feedback from our current Seaview model, testing new concepts, snorkeling with prototypes and meticulously modifying and adjusting to make the ultimate snorkeling performance product.

3 AVAILABLE SIZES FOR A PERFECT FIT.

To determine your mask size simply measure from the bridge of your nose to the bottom of your chin.

1. Select a reward tier:

Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page. 

2. Payment:

Enter your payment information. Payment will run through Indiegogo InDemand and funds will be sent to us directly.

3. Size, Color & Shipping Information:

Pick the color and size you would like. Follow the sizing chart above to select the right fit. *Sizing is important so measure carefully.

 

A HEART FELT THANK YOU FROM OUR WILDHORN TEAM FOR HELPING MAKE THE SEAVIEW 180° SV2 PROJECT A REALITY.

The Seaview 180° SV2 is in the final stages of the design process. We're currently testing prototypes and making final adjustments to 3D modeling files to prepare for tooling. Crowdfunding will help fund final tooling, sizing molds and other design adjustments to ensure that the product is completely dialed in for the best possible experience for our customers. Funds will also help to cover first round production costs to meet the demand for this innovative new product.
