Modular design gives excellent functional expandability to PowearIN2.0; it is what you need to help you easily cope with the changing travel environment and climate scenarios. Experience the freedom to mix more than 10 different modules with more than 20 additional features, modular design contributes to becoming the world's most feature-rich travel jacket: PowearIN2.0 - knows you best!
 
   
 
   
 We will delivery your PowearIN Jacket on Oct 2016, enjoy it in autumn!                      
 
 
 
 
 
  
  
   
Waterproof zippers + special flame retardant material + internal anti-thread hook + hidden tube line design + anti drape and weight dispersion design - ingenious design and thoughtful consideration contributes to the THE WORLD'S BEST PORTABLE MOBILE POWER PLACEMENT POCKET.
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 

 
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
Jacket = Sling Bag?! Yes, we did it! 
PowearIN 2.0 is cleverly designed to turn into a beautiful Sling Bag in just a few simple steps, when temperature rises or during outdoor sports, it no longer is an annoying burden to your hand!
 
 
 
 
Have you experienced such embarrassment and inconvenience with portable charging devices?! 
It's time to make portable charging easier and with elegant!
 
  
 
  
 
  
*The side opening pockets in the animation are for demonstration purpose only and will not be available in the actual product design.
* If your phone native support wireless charging, you can just pick our super slim charger, otherwise you should pick both changing phone case and charger to get full function of Wireless Charging.
 
  
 TIPS: Will regular charging shorten the life of batteries?
"If at all possible, avoid frequent full discharges and charge more often between uses. "
--<BU-808: How to Prolong Lithium-based Batteries>
 
 
* You can use the same inductive charging connector that comes with your watch for charging.
Looking for a better travel jacket? Sorry, this is the best.
 
Looking for more functions? Yeah, modules are waiting for you! 
 
 
 

 
 






   

 

  

 
 In order to reduce the load-bearing and sagging feel, we introduced the tactical strap construction into the design of powearin2.0 travel jacket, and designed a unique load-transfer system(LTS). LTS can effectively distribute the load to each supporting point of the human body. The amazing LTS system gives PowearIN outstanding mount scalability and flexibility, it has 3 mount areas and 9 modular mount points, you can freely mount a variety of combinations according to your individual needs. 




  
 
 
 
 
 

Survey of PowearIN Jacket

story:
Gnarly Pak was built to carry boards better. It is the most simple, rugged and comfortable,  skateboard and snowboard carrier ever.

Fully unwind after a long sesh', Eat and drink on the go, better yet keep trekking snow until you find that ideal spot -We've got your back. 

Specifically we've GOT your board -year round from the streets to the sheets of fresh powder. 

LETS GO.



Color options


Easy access


Carry anywhere

Carry Comfortably 


Why IndieGoGo

We’re small but well versed in manufacturing, three generations of sewing has taught us a lot about crafting quality results both in-house and with contracted capacity. The components of each Gnarly Pak are bought in bulk, the more we order  the lower our manufacturing cost are. We’re on IndieGoGo to lower our cost of manufacturing and pass on the savings to Every Backer in need of a Third Arm to carry their skateboard and or snowboard.

The goal is to share our craft and DELIVER a great solution, we want the Gnarly Pak board carrier on the backs and in the minds of doers around the world.

We are ready 

-Grab you board and rally your friends to back the birth of a brand bent on putting straight forward quality goods in the hands of individuals who love to live life Gnarly Pak’d. 

Thank you for backing our campaign, enjoy the Rewards!



Whats next Gnarly Pak?


FAQ

DOES GNARLY PAK FIT EVERY BOARD? CURRENTLY BOARD WIDTHS 7.5” TO 11”. DURING THIS CAMPAIGN, THE G LACE IS AVAILABLE FOR WIDTHS GREATER THAN 9". 

CAN YOU WASH GNARLY PAK? YES, YOU CAN. DAMPEN A CLOTH, ADD MILD DETERGENT AND GENTLY APPLY TO THE SOILED AREA. LET AIR DRY.

WHERE CAN I GET A GNARLY PAK? HERE DURING THIS CAMPAIGN AND AFTER ON WWW.GNARLYPAK.COM. IN ADDITION WE ARE COMING TOGETHER WITH SHOPS ALL OVER THE WORLD TO MAKE THEM MORE AVAILABLE.

WHAT COLORS ARE AVAILABLE? BLACK, CAMOUFLAGE, PURPLE, BLUE.

DOES THE GNARLY PAK FIT ON A LONG BOARD? YES, WE RECOMMEND USING THE G-STRAP ATTACHMENT WITH LONG BOARDS, ELECTRIC SKATEBOARDS AND SNOWBOARDS.

WHAT IS THE HANDLE ON THE SIDE FOR? THE G-HANDLE IS THERE AS AN ALTERNATIVE CARRY OPTION. THERE ARE MULTIPLE WAYS TO COMFORTABLY WEAR AND USE YOUR GNARLY PAK.

WHEN I PUT ITEMS IN THE POCKET WILL THEY BE UNCOMFORTABLE? THE POCKET WAS SPECIALLY DESIGNED ON GNARLY PAK TO FIT IN THE SMALL CURVE OF YOUR BACK MAKING IT A GREAT LOCATION TO ‘FILL THE GAP’ BETWEEN YOUR BACK AND GNARLY PAK. IT WAS DESIGNED SO THAT YOU HAVE A PLACE TO PUT YOUR SMALLER ITEMS THAT YOU NEED TO TAKE WITH YOU I.E. PHONE, KEYS, WALLET, SKATE TOOL, ETC. IF THE POCKET IS OVERLY STUFFED IT WILL ADD WEIGHT AND/ OR BECOME UNCOMFORTABLE WHILE WEARING. FOR ADDITIONAL CUSHION, YOU MAY ALSO CONSIDER USING THE ‘HIDDEN’ POCKET LOCATED BEHIND THE MAIN POCKET. BEWARE THIS POCKET DOES NOT CLOSE ITEMS PLACED IN THIS POCKET MAY FALL OUT WHEN TURNED UPSIDE DOWN.

WHAT IS THE MATERIAL ON THE INSIDE OF GNARLY PAK? IT IS AN ABRASION RESISTANT MATERIAL WITH A DUAL PURPOSE TO MAXIMIZE THE DURABILITY OF THE GNARLY PAK AGAINST GRIP TAPE AND BOARD SLIDING.

DO YOU HAVE A SLING STYLE GNARLY PAK? WE ARE DEVELOPING A SLING STYLE GNARLY PAK THAT PROVIDES ADEQUATE COMFORT AND BOARD STABILITY THE CURRENT GNARLY PAK PROVIDES 3 DIFFERENT CARRY POSITIONS INCLUDING A ‘DUFFLE-LIKE’ MANNER.

DO I HAVE TO USE THE G-STRAP AT THE BOTTOM? YOU DO NOT HAVE TO USE THE G-STRAP HOWEVER WE RECOMMEND USING IT IF YOU ARE RUNNING, RIDING A BIKE OR INVOLVED IN ACTIVITY THAT COULD CAUSE THE BOARD TO ‘BOUNCE’.
story_txt:
Gnarly Pak was built to carry boards better. It is the most simple, rugged and comfortable,  skateboard and snowboard carrier ever.
Fully unwind after a long sesh', Eat and drink on the go, better yet keep trekking snow until you find that ideal spot -We've got your back. 
Specifically we've GOT your board -year round from the streets to the sheets of fresh powder. 
LETS GO.







Color options




Easy access



Carry anywhere
Carry Comfortably 




Why IndieGoGo
We’re small but well versed in manufacturing, three generations of sewing has taught us a lot about crafting quality results both in-house and with contracted capacity. The components of each Gnarly Pak are bought in bulk, the more we order  the lower our manufacturing cost are. We’re on IndieGoGo to lower our cost of manufacturing and pass on the savings to Every Backer in need of a Third Arm to carry their skateboard and or snowboard.
The goal is to share our craft and DELIVER a great solution, we want the Gnarly Pak board carrier on the backs and in the minds of doers around the world.
We are ready 
-Grab you board and rally your friends to back the birth of a brand bent on putting straight forward quality goods in the hands of individuals who love to live life Gnarly Pak’d. 
Thank you for backing our campaign, enjoy the Rewards!












Whats next Gnarly Pak?



FAQ


DOES GNARLY PAK FIT EVERY BOARD? CURRENTLY BOARD WIDTHS 7.5” TO 11”. DURING THIS CAMPAIGN, THE G LACE IS AVAILABLE FOR WIDTHS GREATER THAN 9". 
CAN YOU WASH GNARLY PAK? YES, YOU CAN. DAMPEN A CLOTH, ADD MILD DETERGENT AND GENTLY APPLY TO THE SOILED AREA. LET AIR DRY.
WHERE CAN I GET A GNARLY PAK? HERE DURING THIS CAMPAIGN AND AFTER ON WWW.GNARLYPAK.COM. IN ADDITION WE ARE COMING TOGETHER WITH SHOPS ALL OVER THE WORLD TO MAKE THEM MORE AVAILABLE.
WHAT COLORS ARE AVAILABLE? BLACK, CAMOUFLAGE, PURPLE, BLUE.
DOES THE GNARLY PAK FIT ON A LONG BOARD? YES, WE RECOMMEND USING THE G-STRAP ATTACHMENT WITH LONG BOARDS, ELECTRIC SKATEBOARDS AND SNOWBOARDS.
WHAT IS THE HANDLE ON THE SIDE FOR? THE G-HANDLE IS THERE AS AN ALTERNATIVE CARRY OPTION. THERE ARE MULTIPLE WAYS TO COMFORTABLY WEAR AND USE YOUR GNARLY PAK.
WHEN I PUT ITEMS IN THE POCKET WILL THEY BE UNCOMFORTABLE? THE POCKET WAS SPECIALLY DESIGNED ON GNARLY PAK TO FIT IN THE SMALL CURVE OF YOUR BACK MAKING IT A GREAT LOCATION TO ‘FILL THE GAP’ BETWEEN YOUR BACK AND GNARLY PAK. IT WAS DESIGNED SO THAT YOU HAVE A PLACE TO PUT YOUR SMALLER ITEMS THAT YOU NEED TO TAKE WITH YOU I.E. PHONE, KEYS, WALLET, SKATE TOOL, ETC. IF THE POCKET IS OVERLY STUFFED IT WILL ADD WEIGHT AND/ OR BECOME UNCOMFORTABLE WHILE WEARING. FOR ADDITIONAL CUSHION, YOU MAY ALSO CONSIDER USING THE ‘HIDDEN’ POCKET LOCATED BEHIND THE MAIN POCKET. BEWARE THIS POCKET DOES NOT CLOSE ITEMS PLACED IN THIS POCKET MAY FALL OUT WHEN TURNED UPSIDE DOWN.
WHAT IS THE MATERIAL ON THE INSIDE OF GNARLY PAK? IT IS AN ABRASION RESISTANT MATERIAL WITH A DUAL PURPOSE TO MAXIMIZE THE DURABILITY OF THE GNARLY PAK AGAINST GRIP TAPE AND BOARD SLIDING.
DO YOU HAVE A SLING STYLE GNARLY PAK? WE ARE DEVELOPING A SLING STYLE GNARLY PAK THAT PROVIDES ADEQUATE COMFORT AND BOARD STABILITY THE CURRENT GNARLY PAK PROVIDES 3 DIFFERENT CARRY POSITIONS INCLUDING A ‘DUFFLE-LIKE’ MANNER.
DO I HAVE TO USE THE G-STRAP AT THE BOTTOM? YOU DO NOT HAVE TO USE THE G-STRAP HOWEVER WE RECOMMEND USING IT IF YOU ARE RUNNING, RIDING A BIKE OR INVOLVED IN ACTIVITY THAT COULD CAUSE THE BOARD TO ‘BOUNCE’.

story:
The Aiper Flash 150W is the Most Reliable, Robust and Solar Rechargeable Portable Power Station for all Your Outdoor Adventures.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NPhwlFkmzfE&amp...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-X_Unk6K788

That’s not a marketing soundbite—that’s exactly what the Aiper FLASH 150W stands for and offers you: a multi-purpose portable power station that you can take and use anywhere and which literally allows you to charge all kinds of devices that you’re likely to need in a fast, simple and reliable way.

If you’re prudent and like to have some essentials at home to prepare for emergencies, or if you’re into off-the-grid living, then the FLASH 150W is perfect for you. When the power is out, or when a natural disaster or other emergency occurs, you can use it for any urgent need at home, whether it is to keep your lights on, a vital medical device that someone in your family can’t live without working even if there’s no power, or to charge anything, really.

If, on the other hand, you’re an outdoors enthusiast, then the FLASH 150W is your perfect power station sidekick when you’re camping, for example. It’s the smartest and most convenient way to keep all your electronic essentials working when you need them if you’re in the wild and just wanting to keep these minimum essentials working and ready to be used.

If you’re a traveler, then you’ll be happy to know that the FLASH 150W is compact and light enough (weighing only 3.8 lbs) to take anywhere and be ready to charge your devices wherever and whenever you need them. 

Great, so you already know that you can use the Aiper FLASH 150W in more ways than we could describe. So, what about charging it? That’s also simple and efficient: charge it with a wall charger, with your car (with a car-mounted charger), or using its solar energy(charge with a solar panel for seamless solar charging outdoors) ! How cool is that?

In order to cover all the essential charging needs you may have, the Aiper FLASH 150W has the following ports and connections:

The Aiper FLASH 150W is equipped with an LCD Display that shows you the status of each port so that you know exactly what you can use and rely on when it comes to charging your devices. Still, despite the LCD Display and all its powerful features, this very special power station features a low level of power consumption when in ready mode, and it also features an automatic adjustment of the power delivery when it connects to a device. Yes, we’re all for efficiency!

All these features wouldn’t mean anything if you couldn’t rely on them—and what’s the point of having a portable power station if it doesn’t work properly when you need it the most?

That’s why we designed and built the Aiper FLASH 150W with reliability in mind. We have only used high-quality parts and technology to make it as durable and robust as it should be in order to provide you a stellar performance every time you use it: its outstanding battery life means that you can use it up to 300 cycle indexes and less than 20% battery loss. That’s a performance that beats 3 to 4 times what competitor products can offer you!

We’re not just committed to your convenience—we’re also committed to your safety! That’s why we have designed the Aiper FLASH 150W with key safety features and a BMS or Battery Management System that:

  • make the battery usage be more efficient
  • switch the FLASH 150W to auto-sleep mode when it is connected but does not detect any workload
  • with its integrated short circuit protection, prevent overcurrent, over temperatures and short circuits
  • monitors battery temperature combined with an automatic high-temperature alarm to cut off circuit
  • smartly adjusts the temperature to keep the device from overheating
  • feature separate control per each output port to ensure that other ports continue to work even if one is in a short circuit or maximum output status

In addition to that, the FLASH 150W’s case is also water resistant up to IPX4 standards (rain, dust, and sand), and it is built with UL94-V0 high-level fire-proof material.

  AiperPower at Interstyle 2019/The Exhibition of Board Culture & Fashion. 

视频2

Our mission is to provide safe, innovation and convenient energy solution to our consumer at anytime and anywhere.

With carefully chosen and rigorous testing, Aiper dedicated to provide full range of portable power solutions to meets today's variety requirements. For home, businesses, recreational vehicles, camping or hiking, you can always find a highly efficient and cost-effective solution from us.

Aiper, make sure your daily life always be powered on.

This project is promoted by Green Inbox

story:
Our Story

As a community service project this March I will be going down to Tamarindo, Costa Rica for two weeks during my spring break to help out the LlanÃ­to elementary school and an organization called CEPIA (a non profit organization that supports children, teenagers and their families.) The LlanÃ­to elementary school,  a 3-room building with dirt floors, is in desperate need of school supplies, sports equipment, and money for renovations. I will be working with the school to help out the children there and also the children and families of CEPIA. With CEPIA I plan to do things like teach soccer, organize activites , and help with their library.


The Impact

With your help we can change lives! These children and families living in the poor community are in desperate need of things we take for granted, like pencils, pens, and paper.


What We Need & What You Get

In one month I plan to raise $1,300 for this cause. The money will go toward travel and a sizable donation to the organizations Iâ€™m helping.  I will update you on the specific amount, but the goal here is to be able to give them at least $500.  This could buy supplies for a year for this school!  You can help out by donating any amount of money â€“ even $1 goes a long way.


You can also help by donating actual school supplies or sports equipment. I have a box on the front porch of my house, and will send this address to friends via email.  Feel free to drop off donations to the house as well via the mailbox.  I will be shipping all supplies to Costa Rica on March 5.

story:
The AROO system fits the widest variety of vacuum bags:

One adapter: Slips on easily, quickly deflate multiple vacuum bags moving along with a single EZ Adapter   The other adapter: Peel and stick ease of use with a built in anti-leak valve of its own, the Adhesive Adapter. AROO HD Travel Compressor: Rechargeable simple heavy duty power compressor in your hand.

 

 

And with the Samsung power cell you can pack up to 60% (or more) in the same amount of space without worrying about dirty clothing odor migration. Which means you get awesome and fresh clean clothes in one carry-on with industry beating rechargeable compressor run time and speed

 

 

This Mud Run had... a bit of MUD!?!? (haha!)   But that story is for another day (good job BRIAN)  How do you get those clothes home?  Sailing vacation?  How many bags have fallen overboard?  The stories we've heard...  Skiing?  And YOUR suitcase is the one sitting in the slush...Ugh!   Weather?  Some of those exotic locations have really cool outdoor airports - but occasionally there are torrential downpours.  How long until all that rain seeps into your suitcase?

Don't bother with all that!  Seal it and forget it!  DONE!

 

 

The benefits are endless - really!

Stash yesterday's gear in an odor- and water proof sealed vacuum bag of your choice and say "smell ya later" to any sort of non-plastic laundry "smell thru" nightmare—and "later-gator" to wet clothes in the event of an accidental spill on your bag. Your clean fresh clothes remain separate and dry.  How important is that? :) 

 

Choose the bag YOU prefer (every vacuum bag has a vacuum port and they're different).  Both our adapters are so easy to use.

One slips on most vacuum bags, the EZ Adapter.

One sticks onto the vacuum bag port for the trip, the Adhesive Adapter.  

NOTE: The adhesive adapter has a built in valve INCLUDED within the adapter!  It's an active valve that is much stronger then the vacuum bag for additional port leak free protection.  A great port for, ...when "it really matters"

 

 

BONUS: Unique to the AROO Power Bar HD is a needle valve adapter.   Now you can take your soccer ball, football, volleyball (deflated in your suitace) to Cancun and blow it up when you get to the beach!  Nice.

 

 

  • ADHESIVE ADAPTER - works with generica port and the older Space Saver port. 
  •  EZ ADAPTER - works with generic bags and IKEA bags.
  •  BONUS - the adhesive adapter has a small built-in valve.  It's great for additional anti-leak insurance.  Additionally, you could turn any sealed bag into a vacuum bag in a pinch!  How great is that? :)

 

 

 Stepping up from 2500mAh, the AROO Power Bar HD offers 3000mAh, the AROO Power Bar offers 2500mAh.  Both are Impressive.

 

 

Simple micro-USB charging.  A lot of power in a compact space.

 The AROO Power Bar offers 2500 mAh and the HD version offers 3000mAh

 

The AROO Power Bar HD pricing, the AROO Power Bar is available too.  See Perks for more info.

 

 

 

 

 

We ship almost immediately after your order on inDemand!

 

 

 

 

One of our hallmarks is the steel can crush test.  

 

 

Comments:

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Our challenges are few as we've been successful in the past and don't anticipate problems. That being said, a hurricane did affect overseas areas and slowed our receiving of items in our last campaign, although the ship by date was kept. There are unforeseen challenges. Taxes and tariffs are the responsibility of the backer. We'll do all we can to overcome any challenge.

Comments:

 
 

Risks & Challenges
Our challenges are few as we've been successful in the past and don't anticipate problems. That being said, a hurricane did affect overseas areas and slowed our receiving of items in our last campaign, although the ship by date was kept. There are unforeseen challenges. Taxes and tariffs are the responsibility of the backer. We'll do all we can to overcome any challenge.

story:
You are the author and hero of your own story, and an adventurous life is a life well lived. Everybody’s story is unique and worthy of being put on paper. Don't forget today's magic. Separate what's important from the noise. Record the things that matter.

The Basecamp Journal is packed with features that help you 'create adventure' and capture the details.  Inside are prompts that will inspire you to plan the adventures you've been dreaming of, lists to help you pack, and plenty of pages to plan, sketch, and write your story.

To handle any adventure, the Basecamp Journal can be purchased on its own as a paperback or housed inside a Colorado-made, regionally-sourced, leather cover.

The paperback journal is printed with vegetable-based ink on FSC certified paper that has post-consumer wastepaper content and is acid and chlorine free. Printed in Denver & bound in Arizona, the journal is American-made, cover to cover.  

The premium leather cover is made from a regionally-sourced hide.  Each cover is completely unique as we have included the scars, patterns, and brands that were part of the animal the hide is sourced from.  They are chrome tanned, stitched with a hand-cranked leather sewing machine, and iron-branded to perfection.  These beautiful covers are designed and crafted with love by one of our very own Feral Mountain Co. ambassadors, Josh Hughes.

All products used in the production of the journal, down to the thread, are sourced in the United States.

Feral Mountain Co. is a locally owned outdoor gear shop in Denver, CO. We were founded on one simple principle: “create adventure.” In 2016, our founder left his corporate job because he has always been passionate about connecting people with the outdoors and wanted to find a path for doing it professionally. His personal motto has become our mission statement, and it informs every decision we make.

Our relationship with our customers is collaborative, not transactional. We don’t have corporate policies, we drink a lot of beer on Feral’s porch, and all really big decisions are made in consultation with the shop dog. 

Everything that we do is purpose-driven, and because we want to create new products that reinforce our mission, we’re constantly brainstorming to find creative ways to get more people outside. We’ve had more bad ideas than good ones. Everything is always on the table. The reality is that sometimes people need a little push to create adventure in their life, and we’re always looking for new ways to provide that nudge.

The Basecamp Journal was created to be that nudge.  We hope that this journal serves as a source of inspiration for new experiences, and as an effective tool for recording the amazing journey that you are already on. Now get outside and create some adventure.

Thank you for considering the Basecamp Journal as an adventure companion! We've worked very hard to bring you the very best product, and we're honored that you stopped by to take a look.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute today, but still want to help the cause?

Help us get the word out! Tell a friend or use the Indiegogo share tools to get the Basecamp Journal in front of more people. These simple gestures go a long way in helping us grow our community.

Thank you for the love!

story:
UNDERWATER HOCKEY

 We are the Canadian Men's Elite Team underwater hockey team. We put in long hours of training and considerable sums of money to compete in a completely unfunded sport. Underwater hockey is a game that is played on the bottom of a swimming pool, using a mask, snorkel, fins, glove and a short stick.  Push and/or pass a 3 lb coated lead puck along the bottom, trying to get to your opponents goal. The only thing stopping you: six opponents and that pesky little requirement for oxygen!

It is now played in dozens of countries throughout the world. World championships are held every 2 years.

Because it is played in water at the bottom of a pool, it is a 3 dimensional game: your opponent can come from any direction, including above you! Breathhold ability, finesse, puck-handling, passing, speed and teamwork are imortant skills. The puck is passed by rolling it off the edge of the stick and flicking it forward.

We need to raise funds to meet our goal of competing in the Quebec City Tournament.

The Canadian Mens Elite Underwater Hockey Team

Adam Jocksch

Charles Savard

Delaney Kitching

Emmanuel Caisse

Eric Cardinal

Jordan Fryers

Kevin Woudstra

Marc-Denis Riuox

Matt Richling

Nick Hermes

Vincent Poire

With players spread from coast to coast the cost of getting practice and competition time becomes a big factor in our ability to build a truly competitive team. With your help we can get another step closer to the 2013 World Championships in Eger, Hungary.

We Need Money and/or Airline points

  • This fundraiser is to make our Quebec City tournament reality.
  • We also hope to take advantage of your genoristy for our main event in Hungary.
  • We are offering several small perks to show our appreciation!
  • Funds from this fundraiser are primarily for transport cost (West to East).
  • You can designate money to our team or to an individual (without Tax receipt)
  • If you would like a tax receipt please make your donation payable to CUGA

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Travel points can really help us as it is our biggest cost
  • Send this to anyone who may be able to help
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Thank you to everyone who takes the time to read and/or support our needs. All donation come with access to the NDT Canadian development page.

story:
MASHABLE   |   TECHCRUNCH   |   STUFF

 

 

 

​

​

Earn credits that can be refunded or applied to additional accessories that will be introduced throughout the campaign.

 

Click here to learn more.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

-------------

 

Special thanks to:

Gordon from South London Maker Space
Matthew Foglia 
Scott Schultz
Alex Fuller
Ran Ma

About Extreme Fliers

We are a small group of inventors, engineers and of course, drone enthusiasts. 

Micro Drone 3.0 is a great product but also it is a platform that continuously evolves with a pipeline of ideas to create new functionality through modules, be that serious stuff like a smart module for monitoring air quality, night vision camera or fun modules such as a nerf gun shooter, we have the engineering experience and know how to develop new and exciting modules which snap on to the Drone. This is just the beginning and we can’t wait to see what you all comes up with!

Why Crowdfunding

What started as a personal passion, Micro Drone has evolved into a product that has developed so much from it's users. With Micro Drone 3.0 finally here, the exciting thing about the coming months and years is building on the platform and furthering the technology. We can't wait to see what we accomplish together. Since Vernon first demonstrated Micro Drone 2.0 at Techcrunch Disrupt NY in 2013, we realised that building great technology is within our collective reach. We have the ability to hire top engineers for product development all over the world, so we also want to share our plans and allow users to be part of the process. You get to be involved with other users who believe in us and share our vision. You have really inspired us and we have learnt so much about advanced technologies, from rotor theory, electronics and industrial design. We micro-sized it and applied this to Micro Drone 3.0 to create highly desirable sophisticated features. We then tweaked and perfected the concepts, building countless prototypes to make it consumer friendly and bringing together the best ideas to create the next model. 

We want you to be the first to get your hands on Micro Drone 3.0 and we want you to share your feedback and comments. With your help, we will be able to finalise tooling to go into production.

 

FAQs

 

 

Q: How do I pay the $20, $30, or $50 flat rate shipping fee?

A: For a single order please add $20 for shipping when you pledge. For the multiple orders please add their corresponding shipping amounts. For those who have not added the shipping fee, no additional action is required at this stage, we will reach out to everyone near to delivery time to finalise the shipping and reconfirm delivery addresses.

Q: Is the professional 2.4Ghz Remote Control included in the single order perk level?

A: Yes, the controller is included in the package.

Q: If Micro Gimbal stretch goal is reached, how do I get one and how much will it cost?

A: We need to reach $250k to start production of the Micro Gimbal (so far we have already smashed through the $200k mark in just 2 days). It will retail for around $99 however we will be offering special pricing to our backers when it goes on sale so you will be able to pick one up for around $50.

Q: What is the flight time for Micro Drone 3.0? How long does it take to recharge the battery?

A: We won’t speculate or exaggerate the potential flying time of the final production unit so here is what we are currently achieving: without the camera module attached we are able to get up to 8 minutes continuous flying, with the accessories the flight is around 6 minutes and when we use the Expansion Pack and Camera we are able to achieve 7 minutes (because of the additional lifting power). This is what our current actual working prototypes are achieving and this should improve in our production models. From our experience we were able to understand the limitations of battery technology and have designed super user friendly removable batteries that seamlessly swap out without having to connect any wires. The recharge time will be up to an hour, extra batteries will also be available (and affordable). At TechCrunch Disrupt we met an MIT research group who have discovered an incredible way to rapidly charge lithium batteries which is exciting. A USB recharging dock is included in the package.

Q: Is there a video of Micro Drone 3.0 flying?

A: Yes, to be open and transparent we have been demonstrating Micro Drone at all our events since CES 2015 to show how it flies. Everyone who saw us was amazed by the level of stability and maneuverability we have achieved, from the Throw to Launch, Smart Orientation, ability to fly in a straight line, in windy conditions and circular banking. We are putting it out there to show the impressive things it can do, as well what it can’t do and sharing our vision of the things we are working on for the future! Search “Micro Drone 3.0” on Youtube where there are videos posted by people who came to see it (here is a demo at CES). We will also be sharing videos which talk about how we created these features in detail as the campaign progresses.

Q: Does Micro Drone 3.0 only stream video or can it also record?

A: Micro Drone 3.0 can both stream video to a smartphone/tablet as well as record onto an onboard Micro SD memory card.

Q: How loud is Micro Drone 3.0 in flight?

A: We are using high grade endurance motors which are the quietest available (the same coreless motors used for vibrating smartphones). Feedback from Micro Drone 2.0 has been that users really liked how quiet they were (this model was not much louder than a whisper in flight), Micro Drone 3.0 has bigger motors which are a bit louder. We will produce a video to give you an example.

Q: Is it possible to acquire additional batteries to be shipped with Micro Drone 3.0?

A: We will be creating an additional perk for batteries you can pick up prior to shipping. Additional batteries will be available for $15 a piece.

Q: Does Micro Drone 3.0 fly autonomously and have a ‘follow me’ feature?

A: We are working on this and find it very interesting but outside of the lab such technology is still a long way off. In 2013 we built prototypes that used sonar and IR sensors to attempt to fly autonomously which we demonstrated here, however this didn’t add much more stability due to the many variables using it in the real world. We have focused on making the Drone more Automatic choosing sensors which work reliably and make controlling the Drone easier. We think future autonomous flying will be achieved using vector based computer vision and LADAR where the device knows what an object is. Having smashed our second funding goal, with your support we will be able to make a great level of further development into this.

Q: Can the camera module take photos? What is the resolution of the HD camera module?  

A: The camera module can take both photos and video. The photo resolution is 1280 x 720 pixels and image file size for each photo is typically between 30KB and 100KB. The video is shot in 720p (1280 x 720 pixels) and its recording rate is approximately 100MB/s.

Q: What formats are the video and photos?

A: The video records as AVI format with an MJPG codec and a frame rate of 30fps with a 1280 x 720 pixel resolution and 14.6 Mbps bitrate. There is also a Microphone and the audio codec is PCM with 128Kbps bitrate and CBR bitrate mode. The photos it takes are JPEG format with a 1280 x 720 pixel resolution and lossy compression mode.

Q: How will Micro Drone link video with my smartphone/tablet?

A: Micro Drone 3.0 becomes a WiFi access point that your smartphone/tablet tethers to over a secure connection. Once this connection is established our app will be able to automatically configure and display the video stream coming from the drone to your smartphone/tablet.

Q: Will there be a carrying case for Micro Drone 3.0 available for purchase at some point?

A: We have had a lot of requests for this and we will reach out to backers to see if this is something we should make! My initial thoughts is making a beautiful, glossy, white, hard case, with the ability to attach to your belt. Please let us know your feedback: email v@extremefliers.co.uk

Q: Will there be replacement blades available? If so how much will they be?

A: Yes, there will be spare blades available, their price will be announced closer to our production date. We will offer parts at an affordable price, for example spare blades for Micro Drone 2.0 are only $1.99 and delivered world wide.

Q: Where do you ship to and will I need to pay import duty?

A: We will be shipping Drones directly to backers from Hong Kong to all countries. Backers will need to pay any customs charges on arrival according to your local country's rates.

Q: What is the range on Micro Drone 3.0?

A: With its dual control, Micro Drone 3.0 can be flown using either our professional 2.4 GHz remote control or a smartphone/tablet over WiFi. With the 2.4 GHz Remote Control the range is 300ft (~91m). The camera module will be able to record video to an onboard Micro SD memory card up to this distance. Live streaming to your smartphone/tablet can be made up to 50ft.

Q: What happens when the battery runs low on Micro Drone 3.0?

A: We have designed an early warning indicator where the onboard LEDs flash rapidly when there is less than 30 seconds of remaining flight time.

Q: Are the protective bumpers shipping with Micro Drone 3.0?

A: Yes, we are including these in the set.

Q: Will it be possible eventually to have a 1080p resolution camera for Micro Drone 3.0?

A: Yes! We designed modules to snap on with magnets which means we will be able to offer a wide selection of cameras (Fish Eye Lens, 1080p, Night Vision and more). Camera technology is getting lighter, more advanced and we will be able to continuously upgrade the modules without having to change the Drone.
 

 

Risks and Challenges

Having worked on Micro Drone since 2011 and successfully produced two models, we have complete confidence in the delivery of this product. Combining all the experience, feedback and tacit knowledge and working alongside industry veterans, we have focused on the small things that matter, checking off each step in meticulous detail. We have touched every part of the process from the industrial design (from the way magnets seamlessly attach the modules) to securing reliable production partners who can build Micro Drone at scale. Taken together we believe we will be able to not just deliver the best small size Drone to date, but one which is also user friendly.

Having seen other crowd funding campaigns, we understand the issues hardware makers face. Micro Drone 3.0 has undergone extensive testing and we have a working product which will be ready to start production after the campaign has finished. We have provided a conservative shipping date of November and we will update backers as this progresses. Our key component suppliers (PCB production, Battery production and Injection moulding) can typically work within a 3-4 month turnaround and we have a great relationship working directly with each supplier who have scheduled production time for Micro Drone 3.0 to fulfill initial demand from Indiegogo.

We are excited that Micro Drone 3.0 is finally at the stage where we can offer it to users who share our vision. We want to build a community of users and one of the challenges is to build an ecosystem that rewards and incentivises our users. Once the first units of Micro Drone 3.0 are in the hands of our backers, we will be making a sustained ongoing effort to work with developers to create new modules and come up the best things for a small personal drone - this is a super important initiative for us. To do this we're going to build a pool of talent, provide design mentorship and give developers calls to action with special events. We will also provide ways for developers to get real rewards for developing third party modules. So, if you are an independent maker you will become a really important part of what we are doing and if you are a user, you will have a Drone that continuously evolves with new, exciting and compelling ways to use it.

------------

 

Are you ready? 
It's time for Micro Drone 3.0!

 

 

 

​

The Premier Crowdfunding Agency

www.agency20.com
